11111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The sky became blue, the wind calmed down, except for the wind around raging Blake. The ground and grass, which were voided and burnt to ashed, slowly healed back. Blake found it strange. Then, a flower began to grow, wait a minute...a flower? out of nothing? Yes. It was closed, but kept growing, growing huge, as tall as a human. The petals opened slowly and a woman was standing there. The flower began to reverse, finally disappearing as it appeared. More ashes and burnt ground healed back.

She stared at Blake, who was still at Dark form (and around him the nature's healing had no effect, he was standing on ashes, the wind was swirling around his body). The woman was almost as tall as him (Blake stood at 1.85 mt, and the woman was at 1.80 mt for sure), had naturally green hair, and aqua eyes. She was dressed in a greek-like robe, with some golden parts.

She stared at him, and Blake asked

-"Who are you?"-

-"I'm your mother"- The woman said

-"Don't try to pull my leg. You're not my mother. I don't have one."- The woman walked toward him, Blake stood in a guard stance, after seeing Blaze all weirdos were the same to him. The woman kept walking toward him and Blake moved slightly backwards, prepared to use god speed at any moment.

She stood very close to him, and noticing his stance, she said in a soothing voice

-"I won't hurt you. I'm not like him"- Blake got surprised at her mentioning Blaze, but he still didn't trust her

-"I'm not falling for that. I asked you, who are you? If you don't respond I'll fight you like I fought Blaze...and if I'm not wrong you're not even a woman, you're a succubus, aren't you?"-

-"My name is Lith, if that's what you're asking, and about who am I, I already told you..."- The name triggered Blake's anger... Lilith was his mother's name, and she's for sure the person he hates the most (except for Blaze but he isn't a person)

-"Enough games"- Blake used the god dash and tried to kick her, surprisingly, she dodged it. Blake dashed toward her again and kept punching and kicking, Lith dodging most and blocking the ones she couldn't dodge. Blake kept like that for about 10 minutes, and then, he said

-"Will you fight or not?!! I don't have time to spend with Blaze's minor servants"- Blake said

-"I didn't come to fight you. I'm not hurting you"-

-"Whatever"- Blake began to walk away, but she appeared in front of him.

-"Why don't you believe me?"-

-"No good person can have such powers, and the fact you know Blaze proves it more, and you telling me that you're my mother is annoying. I don't have a mother and I'm not a little child that needs one"-

-"You are a good boy and you have the power"-

-"I don't recall ever calling myself good, I just fight for the people I care about"-

-"I know...your life has been hard"-

-"What can you know? And what are you supposed to be?"-

-"I see everything. And I've watched you even before you were born"- Blake got surprised but he hid it

-"I know you're surprised. And no, I have nothing to do with Blaze, though I'm the mother of all Earth's living beings"- Blake began to walk backwards. He thought that if he was facing a kind of goddess he was screwed

-"You're not screwed"- Lith added

'What?! How the hell did she know?! Blake thought

-"I can read your mind and your heart. You're hurt"- She walked toward Blake, and this time he didn't fight. She extended her hand and Blake lost the dark form, falling dismayed, but Lith caught him in her arms, and he began to glow, his wounds began to heal and he slowly opened his eyes

-"I told you that I wouldn't hurt you"- Lith said

-"And so...are you Gaia?"- She did a ^_^ face and giggled

-"That's one of my names. Greeks called me Gaia, Egyptians called me Isis, and so. Only Atlants knew my real name"- Blake pushed her off after he regained energy, she, reading his mind again, said

-"There's nothing wrong with needing affection. Humans were created as sentient beings, and love is one of their needs"-

-"I never had a maternal figure. So, I find kind of awkward that stuff"- She hugged him suddenly And Blake was thinking 'What is this for?!'

-"Despite I'm mother of all people and living beings, I'm specially the mother for the orphans, whose don't have a human mother. And I'm hugging you to prove you that there is no harm"-

-"It's OK, but may you stop reading my mind? It's kind of annoying..."- She giggled and nodded. Blake was feeling strangely warm and felt his energies increasing.

-"So...are you the deity my grandmother talked me about?"- She nodded

-"Anyway. Why do you appear to me? You must've heard that I said I didn't believe in God"-

-"You said you didn't know what to believe in. And you were right when saying why everyone would think God had to be a man"-

-"Wait? Are you just an earth goddess or are you...?"-

-"I'm Goddess"-

-"Err...if you are so powerful why didn't you destroy Blaze or save my father?"- Lith's face saddened, and said

-"I can't kill him. Almost nobody can, only someone born with the power of light and darkness..."-

-"Aren't you the Goddess?"-

-"Someone called Omega is more powerful than me"-

-"What happened to him?"-

-"I'll tell you with the story"- She said, and continued

-"There have been several wars in Heaven, the one you call Blaze appeared by the third one. He was made nearly completely immortal, not even the greatest archangels were able to destroy him. Only one last creation of my Father was able to fight him back, but he wasn't able to kill him, only to seal his power... his bloodline has continued up until your birth...

Other ancestors of you were powerful but not enough to destroy Blaze, one of them, who lived in Mesoamerica, became its king. He was called Quetzalcoatl by the Aztecs and Kukulkan by the Mayans. He saved his people from Blaze, damaging him severely with his light powers. Blaze took more than 100 years to recover from that, and waited for the next ones, waiting to find another descendant that could break his seal. It's been over 2000 years after that. And you are the one with the power..."-

-"What?"-

-"I'll tell you later. You need to wake up. Joana needs you."- She said as Blake felt like blacking out...

Background Music: Stratovarius - Infinity


Blake slept again, still there were about 6 hours left before school...

Blake woke up in the same place he had fought Blaze, and knew he was dreaming, though he couldn't manipulate things like in ordinary dreams. He suddenly felt the ground shaking, and the place, which resembled a garden, burnt to ashes again. The blue sky turned to red bloody, the white clouds became black and began to flash thunderbolts.

The rocks and dust were lifted up by the winds, which was swirling violently and roaring. Blake felt a tremendous power, but it wasn't Blaze's. He turned around and saw a silhouette on top of a big boulder. The silhouette disappeared and suddenly appeared in front of him. Blake couldn't believe what he saw...

Background Music: System of a Down - B.Y.O.B


Blake looked at a replica of him, or at least it seemed to be. The "false" Blake had his hair rising up, his eyes had no irises nor pupils, his muscles were bigger and tighter, his veins became noticeable, even his nails grew and it seemed his canines became longer. The guy was even taller than him. They stared at each other and the dark one growled, attacking Blake, who, instinctively, fought back.

Blake said to him

-"So, you are my dark side...finally I meet you..."- The dark Blake just replied with a grunt and they punched each other. As obvious, they had the same fighting style, though Dark's was more violent and aggressive, but also lowering his guard. Blake for the first time saw how he looked like when he went dark. Blake found the low defense weakness in his opponent, but it wasn't too useful, there were little chances to attack since Blake had to block all of his hits. Blake confirmed that the dark was stronger than himself.

They struggled and connected fists, but Dark was getting the upper hand, overwhelming Blake in every aspect, speed, strength, resistance, agility. Only that he had a low defense. Blake was keeping up until Dark charged up a dark energy ball and shot at him a powerful beam, the impact was so powerful that it went through the mountain and Blake with it.

Blake got up and tried to stand, but in that moment Blaze appeared again

-"Did you think you were safe?"- Saying that, shot a beam right into Blake's face, lifted him up and began to punch him. Blaze hurled him against the rocks, smashing him against the remains of the boulder, then, he threw him down and pinned him down with his left arm, charging a beam with the right hand. But a beam hit him, destroying his arm. Dark stood there, aiming his hand at Blaze. They engaged into a very violent combat, destroying more of the place they were. Dark hit Blaze with powerful blows and the wounds burnt with a black fire (as opposed to the golden one that appeared before). Also, Dark hit Blaze with a beam that went through his chest, and Blaze retreated.

Blake still struggled to stand up, knowing he had still a fight. Dark walked toward him, and aimed his hand at him. Blake closed his eyes. Nothing happened, instead, he felt his body fixing, and opened his eyes. Dark shot at him a different beam, a light grayish one, he did so until Blake was healed. Then, he stared at him and walked away, vanishing into the shadows...
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Blake sleeps, again...

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The place suddenly changed. Blake seemed to be in a street, a familiar one, though he couldn't remember, and looked up, the sky was now...golden? There was no sun, but the whole sky was glowing in golden and also, there were very few clouds. The wind was soft and felt warm.

-"Why did he...help me?!"- Blake muttered, talking to himself, when a voice answered

-"Because he needs you. If you die, he'll die as well. That's why he protected you from Blaze"- Blake couldn't believe what he heard and turned around to see a man, who had darker skin, a scar on his left cheek and an identical scar to Blake's in his eyelid (though Blake was in right and this man was in left). The man had medium log black hair and deep black eyes. His eyes had a sharper form than Blake's and gave him a colder look. This man was dressed with the same leather jacket Blake wears, but has a golden glow around him.

-"...Father?..."- Blake stepped back

-"It's been a long time, hasn't it?"- James said. Blake was speechless for a moment, then he said

-"Wha-what are you doing here? am I dead?"-

-"Of course you aren't. The world would be screwed if you were"- James said

-"The world?"-

-"You should know. Lith talked with you..."-

-"Forget that. Where...how...why...?"- Blake asked, and James laughed

-"You know...I'm officially dead, to your world...but in the other, it's another story..."-

-"But...how?"-

-"Because I brought him back"- A female voice said. Then Lith appeared, Blake stared at her and his father and said

-"You REALLY need to stop doing that..."-

-"Like father, like son..."- Lith said

-"Whatever...then...you resurrected my father all of sudden or what?"-

-"I brought him back here right after he died, and said his last words to you"- Lith said

-"Why didn't you tell me? I knew you were dead but I always had the hope for you to hear me from somewhere. I've asked you for help!!"- Blake had different feelings mixed. James knew it, he knew perfectly Blake was a tough boy, but that was after suffering a lot. James walked toward him and hugged him, saying

-"I've never left you alone my son"- Blake felt strange, he had never felt like that.He felt a deep sadness, rare in a guy who learned to get over so many things. Blake didn't even recall the last time he'd felt like that, except for the moment Robin died.

-"B-But...why you...never told me...at least a signal of you being somewhere?"-

-"I've watched you from above Blake. But I had to let you grow by yourself. You need to be strong"- Blake pushed him away and felt now a different emotion, a mixture of sadness and rage, and said

-"HOW STRONG DO I HAVE TO BE?! Hasn't my whole life enough?!! I lost you, the only person who ever cared about me. I lost Robin...Grandma Irma died..."-

-"I know...but she at least was happy to meet you. Mom could never raise me, but raised you instead"- James said

-"That doesn't matter anymore. I'm alone...I'm in the point I can't lose anything else, so, what now?"-

-"Blake. You're not alone"- Lith said

-"I've been for my whole life, and having you up there doesn't help very much. What have you done for me?!"-

-"Remember your childhood? Whenever people gave you food, whenever you found money. That was me, taking care of you"- Lith said, and hugged Blake

-"And I've protected you, almost always..."- James said

-"Almost? When?"-

-"I prevented you from dying. Lith gave me the ability to see the future and I saw most of your childhood and teen age. I was happy to know I had changed the future. And when you got beaten up, I prevented people from killing you, and most of times I healed your wounds"-

-"You said almost, which means you haven't helped me always..."- Blake said

-"Well..."- James scratched the back of his head -"I admit, I haven't protected you always because...other people has done that"-

-"And that's the point. Blake, even without us, you're not alone. That girl, Joana, your girlfriend, truly loves you. You have friends, who worry about you, and so do your pets...And if you say you can't lose anything else think better about it..."- Lith said

Blake bowed down and James looked at him, he said

-"Don't be like that. What I meant is that since you met Joana she's protected you...and she has a really awesome strength"- James added

-"And, after your shrunk odyssey, the second time you fought Blaze, I was the one giving you the energy. I was giving you my energy for you to fight at his level. That warm light was me. And the first times you faced him I prevented him from taking you away"-

-"Yeah...A new friend called Ryan said that. I'm not sure how did he know it but he said you prevented Blaze from killing me last time, though...it's strange...Blaze wanted me alive..."- Blake said

-"He was bluffing about killing you...He was going to do the same he did last time before this one, take you with him..."-

-"What for?"- Blake said

-"I'll have to explain that later. You need to rest. Remember Blake, the world needs you...everyone need you...specially Joana..."-

-"Why?"- Blake asked

-"Remember...never forget who you are*, and remember what do you fight for..."- James said as vanished, and so did Lith, after saying

-"We'll talk later. Now rest baby"- Lith said

-" 'What do you fight for?' What's that supposed to mean?"- Blake mumbled, and then, he felt again that blacking out feeling and, while sleeping, muttered 'Never forget who you are'. Blake woke up, and looked around, everything was dark, he looked at his digital alarm clock. 1:24 AM, and he had began to sleep at 1:10 AM. He recalled that all what happened lasted about two hours...maybe the old saying was right, that "a dream is enough to dream a whole life" which meant that in dreams can happen a lot of things more in little time in the real world. Blake sighed, and heard Joana's voice (He was sleeping between her breasts, as he always did when he was shrunk years ago)

-"What's wrong?"- She said, sleepy

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
That night, Blake slept again...

Background Music: Rockman Zero 3 - Return to Zero ( http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4c46cbx-t... )


Blake got up, and appeared in a different place. That place resembled a greek temple, made out of a transparent blue marble-like material, with gold inlays, and the floor seemed to be made out of crystal...though all of it looked ancient, kind of worn away, eroded...it looked...older...from a further past than Ancient Greece's...Somehow Blake felt that it was familiar. Then, a little light ball appeared, flying, it past Blake and remained floating in front of him. The light ball shone and a blinding light flashed. Blake opened slowly his eyes to see his father standing before him.

-"Wha...What is this place?"- He asked

-"Do you know?"- James replied

-"No...but...it feels...so familiar...I know I've never been here...but...I feel I know it..."-

-"This is where your ancestor was born..."- Lith said, appearing from thin air.

-"This? So...is this some place of Atlantis?"- Lith denied with her head

-"That was your earliest human ancestor, but he wasn't always a human"-

Blake got a confused face, and Lith explanied

-"He used to be a powerful angel. His name was Azrael. He was one of the very few highest ranked angels"-

-"You mean an archangel, don't you?"-

-"That's right"- Lith replied and added

-"When the war began, Azrael lead angels in battle, but after what happened...after the curse..."-

-"What war? What curse?"- Blake asked, surprised

-"I'll bring that up in the appropiate moment...But what I'll tell you is that he was the other one who the light and darkness powers...well...he became the only one after what happened long ago...But anyway, he fought the Fallen One and Omega 17"-

-"Who's the Fallen One?"- Blake asked

-"You know him...they call him 'Blaze'...he's got many names through time...In Atlantis he was called Sariel...In Greece Thanatos...In America your ancestors knew him as Tezcatlipoca...And for a long time he kept a low profile, but after America's conquest he took the name of Blaze..."-

-"So...Blaze is an ancient demon isn't he?"-

-"Not exactly, but I'll explain that later..."- Lith said -"As I was saying...Azrael performed a curse, similar to Blaze's...a more perfect version...still different...not evil...Azrael turned his body into a human one, retaining his full power...and prophecies were told...No matter how hard he tried, he was near to destroy Blaze, but just near...the Prophecy said that a further descendant of him would be th one. Azrael lived as a brave and proud Atlantis warrior, defending that land until the day of his death...In difference to Blaze, he aged, though slower than average, he lived 1150 years..."-

-"And I thought nobody could surpass 80 or 90..."- Blake said -"So... I'm descendant of an angel...and, why do you think I'm the right one to beat Blaze? And why isn't he revived as an angel like you did with my father?"-

-"Because a part of what he did was that he'd reincarnate, his soul and his powers would be kept by his bloodline... And none of your previous ancestors have had the power level you've reached, well, maybe some, but even the ones who reached higher powers were just single sided, either light or darkness, never both. You're the only one who has used both, and even some didn't have any power... Your father for example..."- James scratched the back of his head

-"Well...I never surpassed human limits... I was like you before fighting Blaze for the first time..."- He said

-"You used light powers not much ago, and that proves that you're the one who will defeat Blaze. You use your dark powers too, though they're untrained...but those good people will help you to do that"- Lith said

-"I see...and so...you say that my bloodline was kept in America and that it descends from an Atlant warrior, who used to be an angel...well...If you've explained that much why can't you tell me more about Blaze or that war you spoke about?"-

-"There are more things for you to understand, but they'll be told at their right time. Now you have to concentrate in training. You have to develop your powers. I'm sure you will"- She said as she vanished

-"You can do it Blake. I know you can..."- James said and left, transforming into the light ball and flying away

Blake woke up, this time in a more peaceful way (or maybe he was getting used to the sudden return of his spirit to his body)

-"It's temporary. I can't break the curse on you but this will help you"- James vanished. Joana gasped and was totally amazed. The voice she had heard years before was the same...

-"Umm...Blake...what were you thinking?"- Joana asked him

-"Wel...I was thinking about our last night talk. I wanted to teach you, but at my size it'd impossible...Now...well even if it's an illusion I guess I can train you for a while"-

Blake stood before her and she said

-"Umm...I can't fight you..."- Blake fell backwards anime style, and then he said

-"WHAT?!"-

-"I can't attack you..."- Blake closed his face with his hand and said

-"It's an illusion body. You won't hurt me. Now, let's begin with basics"- With that Blake taught her his stance, the way to throw a punch, a kick and made her to practice those basic moves. After an hour she learned basic stuff. Blake decided it was time to prove her skills and fought her (As being his body an ethereal one, the hits didn't damage Joana, though she still could feel them, and he'd still feel the hits too). Blake fought a weakest as he could and was surprised by Joana's strength

-"Damn...Now I understand why you defeated Ivan with a single punch..."-

-"Are you OK?"- Joana looed at him worried

-"Yes. Remember, it's just an illusion, no real damage is dealt..."-

-"I told you I wasn't that weak. You went too easy on me..."- Joana said playfully

-"Is that so mistress?"- They resumed fighting, Blake using his average level (the normal one, stronger than average people, no superpowers). Joana matched him though Blake was a bit faster. Surprisingly, it seemed Joana wasn't bad at all in brute strength (She has played basketball, volleyball and even soccer...her body is soft but firm and well toned, and her thighs are thick...and she's strong, believe me...). After three hours, Joana was tired, while Blake hadn't used really much energy at all. They laid on the grass (They were in a nearby forest, slightly away from school and the first place the fight vs Blaze happened) and watched the sky. Still cloudy, though there was a few sunlight between clouds.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Suddenly, a female voice was heard...

-"I guess I must explain some stuff here"- Everyone turned to a green haired woman who appeared out of nowhere, surrounded by a strong golden shine for a moment. It vanished after a few seconds. Everyone was surprised/confused except the Ryans and Blake.

-"Wha-What are you doing here?!"- Blake asked

-"Is that the way to speak to a goddess?"- Lith asked

-"Ermm...I'm not much into religion you know"- Blake said scratching the back of his head. Lith giggled and sighed, then denied with her head

-"Like father, like son..."- She said in a joking tone

-"Well...goddess...what are you doing here?"- Blake said

-"I promised I'd explain you"-

-"I thought it's be at my dreams again... you've already appeared twice in there"- Blake said

-"I need you all to understand. The danger is worse than you think"-

-"What is it?"- Joana asked

-"The demon you call Blaze...he's after Omega"-

-"Yeah I've heard that, but I still don't know why"-

-"It's a very long story. By now I can only tell you some parts, I'll tell you the rest in the appropriate moment"-

Everyone nodded in agreement except for Blake, who said

-"You said that before. Why can't you tell it all?"-

-"Believe me. I know why. And I can make no mistakes. If you die...forget it"-

-"Well. Darkheart has spoken a bit. So, I guess you've come to clear it, didn't you?"- Ryan K. said. Lith nodded

-"To begin with. The true God is a man...well...was a man"-

-"Was?"- Claire asked in surprise

-"He was called Chaos, though many civilizations called him in many different ways"-

-"Chaos..."- Blake muttered, having a sudden flashback of a time he couldn't remember

-"He was the Lord and the Creator of the Universe"-

-"You speak as he no longer was here"- Joana said

-"That's right. He created me long ago, he was accompanied by his brother, the one who'd you know as Satan, though he used to have another name at that time...He became ambitious and wanted to rule everything. While Chaos wanted to create beings to share the happiness of living, The Devil wanted to enslave them and make them worship him. However, we only learned of that 100,000 years ago..."-

-"So the Devil pretended to be good...no surprise why everyone call him a liar"- Claire said

-"The Devil had also created angels and some life forms, until..."-

-"What?"-

-"100,000 years ago. He decided to take over the whole universe, and the war began... It was a brutal war that lasted almost 20,000 years, we were forced to fight angels vs angels, until Chaos himself defeated him and sealed him away in Tartarus, a dimension he made just for that...

He came back after 30,000 years (50,000 years ago), and he created a new species to destroy us angels. He made the demons, beings of darkness that stopped at nothing but complete destruction, they attacked us again. Omega, his mightiest demon, was the one commanding his forces along other powerful demons, and the war against them went on while Chaos went to work on a secret project. After 20,000 years, he sent out a new legion of powerful angels that were able to match the demons' power, but not even they were enough against Omega. Chaos worked for 20,000 more years, and he came back with a powerful sword, made out of his own blood, infused with the purest light and darkness...

However, Lucifer made a sword of darkness and his own blood as well, both weapons intended to kill gods, Chaos destroyed countless demons before taking on his brother alone, he rejected our help, and they fought They stabbed each other with their weapons, and a blinding light shone for a moment, then, it faded..."- Her voice faltered as if she wanted to cry

-"I immediately went to his side, He was laying there...He said he was about to die...and that the only way to save existence was to give me his remaining powers. He then said that I had to be careful, that evil can't be destroyed, but can be kept at its minimal. He grabbed my hand and smiled at me and vanished into sparks. I knew he would never come back..."- Lith stopped for a moment, attempting to keep herself from crying. Blake put his hand on her shoulder and stared at her. He knew how it felt, he knew how it felt to lose his father but never thought that a goddess would feel like that.

-"Then I found the one you call Blaze and Azrael as babies, they had a little neck-chain with a golden dog-tag where their names were written. Something told me that they were the last archangels created by Chaos before dying, and I raised them as if they were my own children. They were raised while the war continued, even without Lucifer, Omega still commanded the demons, now as their king. Azrael and Blaze eventually became commanders"-

-"Whoa......Blaze used to fight for good?"- Blake asked surprised

-"Believe it or not. Blaze used to be good. And he had different powers..."-

-"Different?"- Joana asked

-"You see, me and angels fight using light...Demons use darkness...but Blaze and Azrael...they had both..."-

-"Wait what?"- Now Blake rose an eyebrow

-"They were among the most powerful angels ever known...Then, it happened, thousands of demons appeared, Omega was leading them and Blaze was standing at his side...and looked different..."-

-"You meant Blaze looked different before?"- Ryan H. said, intrigued

-"Yeah. Anyway, the one called Blaze had betrayed us, and the only one who could fight him was Azrael..."-

-"I see...but why the way you speak Blaze's not his true name..."- Blake said

-"It is not. Before, he used to have another name, which he discarded upon becoming a demon. Back to the story, Azrael defeated a large part of the demon army, and Blaze retreated to Earth, which was the only accessible place from Heaven to the physical universe, in an attempt to corrupt all the other life forms to rise against the angels. They fought in Atlantis, and Azrael sealed Omega's soul, turning his body into stone and dividing it into 6 parts, 7 counting his sword. Without Omega and the Devil's sword, Blaze was left alone to take on Azrael, but he also had his power sealed, and he has been wandering around the Earth ever since..."-

-"So...he needs Blake to break his curse?"- Ryan K. asked

-"Yes. He needs Omega's pieces including his sword, and Blake in full dark form in order to break the seal"- Lith replied

-"I see...so that's why he wants Blake to become dark...he's been pushing the limits"- Ryan K. said

-"Wait, what happened with Azrael?"-

-"He used up too much of his own energy, the nearby humans used a spell to transport him to a Mayan priest, who attempted to cure him, but was unable to, and when Azrael passed away, he rescued his soul and infused it into his daughter's womb... and thus, Azrael's bloodline managed to stay alive..."-

They all were in silence for a while. They had just learned of a hero nobody remembered, who sacrificed his own life to give the others a chance to live. Blake was feeling strange upon learning that he was the descendant of an angel. Lith then commented that Blaze is also sadistic and likes to use psychological torture, he has observed humans for thousands for years and knows how to press their buttons, and she tells Blake that it's actually intentional from Blaze's part to bring out the darkness in him, which is what he must be careful with.

-"We'll need to stay alert from now on.The sole presence of Blaze triggers Blake's dark state too"- Ryan H. said

-"Don't worry, I'll protect you..."- Joana said hugging Blake, whose illusion body had begun to disappear, and Joana put him in her chest pocket. Both Claire and Tabitha glared at her, though nobody seemed to notice (well, the Ryans noticed it but decided to let them to see how far they would go)

-"That's all for now...I'll come again at the appropriate time"-

He called it crescent moon because of the form it resembled). Blake punched her in stomach and stood in guard. Karina regained her stance and said

She turned around to see what did Blake try to do, and all of sudden felt a lot of punches in her body, almost at once. Blake said

Blake and Karina got healed back by Kagome. Then Ryan H. came in, and said to Blake

-"By what Lith says, you're different. We have inner dark powers but we've mastered them. The light powers are provided by the armors, which we're not totally used to yet, as it drains a lot of energy solely keeping the fusion form. Your case is far different, you have both inner powers naturally, and have the natural ability to fuse them, thus not requiring additional energy to keep it. Also, I've seen that as long as your transformation keeps, your energy flow is regular. Only if the transformation deactivates you get drained...

So. You are going to transform into your dual form for the first time, and will learn to master it. It's the key to destroy Blaze"-

-"N-No...I...It-It...can't...be......"- Blake clenched his fists and the wind swirled around him. Then, his hair rose up, his pupils and irises disappeared and Blake screamed toward the sky. It was a very loud scream, though it could be felt the grief in it...Rocks began to lift up and the ground shook, and formed several cracks. A hole formed between the clouds in the sky as a tornado formed around Blake, who stared at Blaze in anger. He growled and surprisingly, spoke

-"Blaze. No matter what, I'm going to kill you"- And dashed towards him, punching him violently, but Blaze also fought back and it turned out they were at the same level. They fought at god speed and the mountains around got destroyed. Each time their fists and knees or elbows clashed against each other, the ground shook. And after a poweful clash that sent them both away, Blake walked around (still in dark state) and noticed, there were dead bodies on the ground, and weren't unknown ones.

Blake's irises and pupils flickered several times, appearing and disappearing quickly, until Blake's eyes turned to blue and his hair turned to silver. Blake's irises and pupils disappeared again and he stayed in that unknown state for a moment, then, he gasped and all the movement around him calmed, he dismayed and fell down...

-"You know, when I was a child, I just lived 5 years with my father,,,until the day he...he died...After that, his wife threw me out of the house and I began my life in streets. But I barely survived by my own. It was very difficult and the only sources of food I knew were some fruit trees and vegetables at the woods. I even stole to get some food to not die by starvation. But, I met a guy while fighting other street boys to defend my food. He was 11 or 12, while I was 5, and helped me. Later he became my first friend ever. When I asked him his name, he said that he had several ones, but prefered to be called Robin..."-

-"That's the same way the angel introduced himself!"- Joana exclaimed

-"Well...as I was saying...He became my friend, and taught me to defend myself. I had already been taught by my father but it wasn't too much since I was just 5. We either worked or stole food to survive, and we slept in parks, with newspapers when the weather was cold. If it was raining, we went under bridges or under newstands kiosks. Things weren't easy. I realized that when Robin thought I was sleeping he went in nights to work on something, and that sometimes he gave me the food that was supposed to be his. And sometimes we faced other street boys who wanted to take away whatever we had. He and I fought to defend our right to live.

Particularly, one gang was the one that caused us trouble, their group was known as Los Tiburones, the Sharks, in Spanish..."-

-"Los Tiburones? I thought that gang was extinct long ago..."- Joana said

-"It wasn't at that time, but they had been already been weakened by other gangs like the Salvatruchas, other gang of central americans. Few groups remained, and oe of these was the one that caused us trouble. We engaged in several fights, and the ones who always began the attacks were a guy who everyone called McGregor and a latino-looking guy. He was called El Lobo, which means the Wolf, they both were about 14 or 15.... And Robin was the only guy in all neighborhood who was brave enough to face them. I also did when I met him, but he didn't want me to get involved.

In one of our fights, about their supposed territory, the park we slept in, I got badly beaten, and I got unconscious. Robin said that they were about to kill me but he took the hits instead. The guys smashed his left arm with baseball bats and steel tubes. Somehow he took me to a hospital, and when I woke up we were both at a hospital. Robin lost his arm that day, the doctors said that it was too damaged and that it wouldn't heal back. After two or threee weeks they discharged us. Even when such a loss, Robin didn't seem to care much about it, and even still trained me.

Months later, McGregor and El Lobo appeared while we were resting in an abandonded building to challenge us to the definitive fight, they said it'd be in the park we used to sleep in. He said he'd go to finish it once for all. I wanted to go, and after some insistence, he said it was OK. But while we were walking, he hit me behind my neck. I blacked out. When I woke up, I ran toward the park and could see the fight. Robin was fighting the two guys at once. Even with only one hand he kept up and it seemed that it they were 1 vs 1 he'd win. But fighting two and one handed was overwhelming him. I rushed there and punched El Lobo in the chin.

Then I kicked him in the stomach and turned around to attack McGregor, but he deployed a knife and slashed at me..."- Joana gasped when Blake said that

-"I barely dodged it, and the slash hit my right eye, though my eye wasn't damaged. After that, McGregor grabbed me by the hair and threew me away against a trashcan and said to Robin

'Hey, street dog!! wanna see how a street rat must be treated?' He rushed to kill me...with the knife...and...and tt-then...it happened..."- Blake paused for a moment, as his voice faltered. Joana put her hands on his shoulders and stared at him, Blake cleared his throat and said

-"I'm okay...well...as I said...it happened..."-

-"What?"-

-"Robin took the fatal hit...McGregor stabbed him in the abdomen...and then, he and El Lobo laughed and walked away, I passed out for who-know how long... I woke up, and noticed a fabric wrapped around my head, covering my right eye. Then I saw Robin, who was very pale, and then, he spoke, he said

'Don't worry...just run away...'

'Robin...why?' I said

'You have lots of life ahead. Don't waste it. You...can be some...thing...someone...gg-greater than..this. You can be better...' He replied

'Robin...'

'I know what I tell you. And I understand why your father did the same... you're different...you still have to find your own path...your own life...Someday, you'll leave streets life behind, and will be...maybe you...some...day...'

And after coughing blood, he...he slowly went cold...and...his hand fell to the ground..."- Blake's voice faltered again, and turned away from Joana for a moment, took a deep breath and said

-"Then it happened...I screamed to the skies...I...I no longer cared about anything...I had lost everything again...lost my father, lost a friend who was a brother to me...I...I felt...fury...absolute fury...the desire to avenge their deaths...Robin's death...I...I wanted to kill... I unwrapped the fabric around my head and used it to wipe off Robin's blood, then, I wrapped it around my head again..."- Joana stared at him with her eyes wide open

-"I ran...nowhere to go...nowhere to live...nobody to care about...I ran....not knowing where, my instincts guided me from there on...I...I confronted the guys again...I took McGregor's knife...I...I slashed his throat, and I stabbed El Lobo in the chest..."- Joana gasped and said

-"But...how? You were damaged, and...how could a child beat teenagers?"-

-"I was in dark state for the first time ever..."- Blake answered, he added

-"The other guys got badly beaten, I think I cut one's hand...and the others had just some deep wounds and bruising...

After that...I...I ran away, I had nowhere to go...I can't even remember how much I ran...until...I blacked out...Then I was found by an old woman who raised me the rest of my childhood, even when she was just as poor as me. You know that story... I learned that she was my grandmother, and that she could never meet my father after losing him during some moment that she didn't tell me, though it seems that my father was a baby at that time. She died when I turned 10, and after that I returned to streets, though this time I went to school..."- Joana hugged him and said

-"You´re not evil Blake. I feel it."- Blake pushed her away and said

-"Yes, I am. It was my fault that Robin lost his arm...It was my fault that they killed him...I was the one supposed to die that time...I was the one who killed the guys...And it was my fault my father died...I shouldn't be alive right now..."- Joana hugged him again, very tightly this time and said

-"Don't say such things!! I think that both your father and Robin thought it perfectly and still gladly gave their lives to save you. Don't you see it? You're necessary!! Even God...well...Goddess has come to tell you that...they need you...and...I need you too..."- Blake was speechless, and she tightened her hug and kissed him.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Ryan H. stood in front of Blake, and said

-"Blake, as Powerman said already, you need to master both powers, but there are some things before that. Mastering a single power is alreay difficult, and you NEED to master two. This is the real training, though the training you underwent before allowed you to transform to light form. It will be very difficult and maybe painful. Do you accept?"-

Blake nodded, and Ryan H continued

-"First. Before even getting in ligh and darkness, you must control raw energy..."-

-"Raw energy?"- Blake asked

-"Call it vital energy or ki, or pure energy. The simplest form of energy usage, and is the most common type of energy used. You need to learn this before learning advanced techniques, or specialized attacks, such as Dark and Light in your case. Others have Element power"-

-"Understood, so, do I need to reach some level to be able to shoot beams?"- Ryan H denied with his head

-"You have already more than enough physical power to handle simple techniques, and for the moment, the physic has outgrown the energy part, so, first we need to make them even, and as your body became stronger by fighting, your energy mastery will grow by using energy attacks"- Ryan H. said, and walked until he was next to Blake, and added

-"You must focus your mind. It'll be difficult the first time, but the more time you practice the easier it will become to you. Try to gather a part of the energy inside you and place it in your hand..."-

Blake extended his open right hand forward

-"When you gather enough, try to shoot it at this..."- Ryan H said as a test dummy appeared. Blake's hand began to glow in sky blue, and Ryan H said

-"Now shoot it!!"- He was expecting a small amount of energy to be shot at the dummy. Usually beginners could only form energy balls

Blake aimed at the dummy and the glow in his hand became brighter, he tried to shoot but nothing happened, the glow decreased instead, and then it became brighter again, this happened several times, Blake became angry at this and finally, could shoot, but he shot a massive beam. It disintegrated completely the dummy, but also damaged severely the training field. Everyone had the O.O faces, and heard a thud shound, Blake had fallen to the floor, unconscious.

-"He blasted almost all of his energy in one shot"- Ryan K observed, Joana immediately ran to his side, and while lifting up Blake, she heard Ryan H thinking out loud

-"What was wrong this time?"- Karina walked to where they were and said

-"Maybe I'm not right, but the last times Blake went dark, he had already this ability. I think that maybe the dark form somehow keeps control over Blake's special abilities, which is what is preventing him from use energy properly. Even in his light form, Blake hasn't any special trait except for flying, though dark Blake can too"-

-"Hmmm..."- Ryan H scratched his chin, thinking

-"In one of his dreams fought his dark side, but he almost lost. Besides, it's not a separate entity like our inner demons, is a true part of his own soul. Taming it must be more difficult"- Ryan K. said

-"Though not impossible"- Ryan H said. The way he said it made Karina and Joana shudder, like feeling what was coming next

-"Joana. Please, replenish Blake's energy. He has no physical damage so it'll be easier for you"- She nodded and both of her hands glowed in white. Blake slowly woke up, Joana hugging him very tightly. After a moment, Joana released him and he stood up, he asked

-"What happened?"-

-"It seems that you have a bad teacher"- Ryan K. joked, though Ryan H glared at him

-"Your case is quite different from conventional ones. It was my fault not to have seen it before. Blake, I'll try to adapt the training to your current condition, and it will be somewhat an upside down version of the ordinary training"-

-"Upside down? If I can't do simple things, how can you expect me to do difficult ones?"- Blake asked

-"You will see... First, you need to transform into Dark form"- Ryan H said

-"WHAT?! I CAN'T DO THAT AT WILL YET!!"- Blake yelled, and suddenly, a blast almost hit him from above, missing by mere inches. Blake turned around and stood in fighting stance, Blaze landed on the floor seconds later, saying

-"You will transform"- Blake clenched his fists and tried to hit Blaze but he vanished, and appeared about 3 meters away from him. The Ryans engaged against him but Blaze shot two red beams at once, piercing through them. Blaze dashed and grabbed Joana by the throat, he began to strangle her, and charged a dark (purple) beam in his other hand, he released her involuntarily when Blake appeared and landed a punch on his face.

Blaze quickly looked at him, and noticed that Blake was in a weird state. His veins had become more visible, and somehow his hair was partially risen up. Blaze smiled and said

-"You know you can't defeat me unless you go dark"- Blake engaged against him and couldn't deal serious damage to him, though he was stronger than before. Blaze disappeared again and reappeared, grabbing both Joana and Karina, and said

-"Do you know what's what I hate about humans?"- He clenched both hands around their necks, and a strong crunch was heard. He had just broken their necks. Blaze added

-"They are so DAMN fragile, see? little strength and they're broken already"- He threw their dead bodies away, and licked the blood from his right hand, which had Joana's blood.

-"At least this blood tastes so sweet... and it's warm..."- He said. Blake couldn't believe what he just saw, he fell to his knees, and shouted in anger toward the sky as loud as he could. He clenched his fists, and slowly stood up again. He said coldly

-"I don't care anymore. I'LL KILL YOU NO MATTER WHAT!!! I NO LONGER CARE ABOUT THE OTHER IDIOTS OR ABOUT YOUR FREAKIN' PLAN!!! I WILL JUST KILL YOU!!"- Blake shouted to the sky again, and the wind swirled around him, but not like the last times, this time it formed a violent tornado around him. Blake's hair rose up but kept waving, resembling the movement of a flame, his veins became thicker and more visible from the skin, his muscles grew slightly and tightened, he slightly grew in height, to 1.95 meters (normal height, 1.90), his eyes became pupils-less and this time, his canines lengthened slightly.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
As Blake transformed into his dark state, Blaze stood in front of him, watching, in a waiting attitude. However, Blake's dark state lasted just for a moment, and felt like being ripped apart from himself. Blake had reverted to his normal state. He looked at his hands, for some reason, they were covered in blood. Confused, looked in front of him, at Blaze, who just smiled, and slowly vanished. Much to his surprise, Blaze was no longer there, but Blake's darkness was standing in there instead.

This Dark Blake looked like what Blakes was going to transform, but his skin had a darker and grayish tone, and had the scar in the right eye (While Blake hasn't it because he's in a copy of his real body). Blake felt an immediate rage, like the urge to kill him, because it was what Blaze was looking for, clenched his fists and stood in a fighting stance, while the dark one was just standing...

Back to reality... (WTH?!! Reality?!!)

Everyone were looking at Blake, who was enclosed in an illusion field. Ayrton said

-"Isn't a bit too cruel to make him believe that Blaze actually killed Joana?"- A vein popped in Karina's forehead and the consequent punch was heard. Now, with a bump on the head and tears of pain in the eyes, he asked

-"What was that for?!!"-

Blake, powered by his inner light, was keeping an even fight against his dark side. Both beared heavy wounds but Demon Blake healed faster. This was slowly giving him the upper hand, though Blake was as brave as always, and kept fighting no mater the pain, he knew he HAD to stop his darkness.

After several barrages of punches, Blake stood up and thought 'I have to think...of fhis guy... as Blaze... and I've got to kill him... just like Blaze...' He dashed at inhuman speed and clashed his fist against Demon's. For a brief moment, the fists seemed to have merged, but it didn't last long, as Demon Blake dashed back and screamed in pain. His hand was smoking, and growled in anger at Blake, who was surprised as well.

-"No mercy"- Demon Blake said as he began to rise his power, shaking the ground and swirling the wind around him. Black lightning bolts flashed around him violently. But after a few seconds, it stopped and Demon Blake looked at his hands, and shouted

-"What the hell is going on?!! I'm more powerful than this!!"- Blake smiled, and his body shone with a blazing golden aura. He dashed at an amazing speed and connected lots pf punches in mere seconds, getting to hit Demon Blake's face, and abdomen repeteadly, to finish the combo with a powerful kick that sent him away, and before he made contact with the rocks he was going to crash into, Blake fired a powerful golden beam from his left hand, and the golden aura vanished. There was a great explosion.

Blake, breathing heavily, said

-"At least it's over..."-

-"HEH!!!"- Was Demon's loud answer. After the smoke faded away, Demon Blake stood, with severe damage, the right half of his face and the right half of his body down to the waist were completely destroyed. He smiled as he regenerated, though it happened very slowly. Blake said

-"Hmph. It seems that you've reached your limits..."-

-"Stupid!! I have no limits!! I am the darkness, I am the power, and soon, I'll rule this place!!"-

-"What it has no limits is your arrogance. You said that I've enclosed you for most of my life. Then, I'll make sure to banish you to the darkests of my soul"- Blake said, to which Demon Blake answered witha violent metallic roar, and they charged toward each other. Blake again glowed in a golden aura and his fist pierced through Demon's fist, cutting his arm cutting it in a half, and bleeding. Demon Blake roared in pain and punched Blake in the face, not even moving him an inch, and he anwered with a powerful punch in the chest that sent him away.

Blake's aura faded again, and walked toward his opponent. He kicked him in the ribs and said

-"I changed my mind. There's no sense in keeping you."- Blake aimed his hand at his damaged enemy, and was about to fire a powerful beam to destroy him, but was stopped by a hand behind him. Blake turned around and saw Powerman

-"Powerman, what are you doing here?"-

-"I've come to help you, and to prevent you from doing something stupid"-

-"What?"-

-"Didn't you hear Lith? She said that you need both light and darkness to defeat Blaze. You can't destroy him while Blaze is still alive..."- Powerman said, and Blake suddenly fell to his knees, grabbing his own head in seeming pain.

-"The power... It... took over... I... I... Light was right..."- Blake said, and Powerman raised an eyebrow, saying

-"What does that mean? Who's light?"- Blake stood up, regaining composure, and replied

-"Just as the guy you see there, there was a good one. As he is darkness, the good one was light. He helped me, but told me that power was dangerous if not handled properly... He warned me..."- Powerman stared at him for a moment, and Blake aded

-"The use of power, corrupted me... I... I'm no better than my dark side. I acted just like him. I wanted to kill him in the bloodiest way possible... I wanted to rip his arms apart... I wanted to brun him to ashes with this new power... I'm not the one Lith is looking for. I can't do this"-

Powerman sighed, and said

-"Blake. Maybe I don't know you that much, but I know when I see a bad guy, and you aren't one. By what I've been told, I see that you have a lot more of difficulties than a normal person. You're young. And yet, you have a heavy responsability over your shoulders. I might be wrong, but it seems that you've suffered quite a lot. Rage is a natural part of ourselves. We must control it so we don't hurt the ones we care about, but sometimes, as a glass full of water, it just overflows. Sometimes we can't just help it. It takes a lot to learn to control it"-

-"Thanks"- Blake said, and shook hands with Powerman

-"Why don't you go back to the real world? I think you've had enough of this"- Powerman said

-"Errmm... I... I don't know how... I don't even know how I got here in the first place..."-

-"Hey!! I'm still here!! This isn't over yet!!"- Demon Blake shouted angrily. Blake sighed and his golden aura ignited again, quickly, he punched Demon upward and reappeared above him, sending him down with a powerful punch. Demon Blake crashed down like a meteor and created a very large crater.

Blake flew back to where he was and his aura disappeared as quickly as it had appeared. Powerman said

-"Let's go"-

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Blake is himself again

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Minutes later, when they got to their room, Blake laid on the bed. He noticed the heavy wounds he got who-know-when. Joana sat next to him and stared at him. After a few minutes of staring, he said

-"You look worried. What happened while I was out?"- Joana sighed and said

-"To make it short: Your dark part took over. It became a crazy berserk and attacked everyone. Many of Ryan's friends faced you and had a very violent and difficult fight. Jak and Powerman were the only ones who could put up a fight against it. Until, Jak weakened it by fighting with nearly the same strength..."-

-"Wait a minute... He took over?!! I was fighting him inside my soul to prevent that!!"-

-"He must have gained control when you left consciousness"-

-"He said he was challenging me for the 'Throne'. I should've known he'd lie. I was the one fighting to regain control by what it seems. He also can't be my instincts"-

-"What happened?"- Joana, genuinely worried, asked

-"Well, while the darkness was wreaking havoc, I found myself in a strange place that turned out to be the insides of my soul. I fought a guy that looks like me when I transform"- He said and Joana kept looking at him, knowing that there was more, Blake sighed and continued

-"Well, the fight was... He was kicking my ass. Until another weird one appeared, claiming to be the light part of me. He fought him and healed me. He wore strange clother by the way. Whatever... We fought together but only could fight evenly against him, and he kept growing stronger. Soon, he overwhelmed us. Somehow, the light one fused with me and gave me new powers, and I used them to fight him. We were even again, but he began to get weaker, I guess I now know why. I almost killed him because he got me very angry, but Powerman appeared and stoped me, and so, I'm back he... Hey!! What are you doing?"- Blake exclaimed as he felt Joana's hands on his shoulders

-"I hate you so much, demon..."- Blake muttered. Joana's hands glowed in white and she started healing Blake's wounds

-"Huh?"- She asked when heard Blake's murmur

-"It's nothing... Let's just say that my dark side is a jerk"-

-"A jerk? I thought you'd call him evil"-

-"He's more of a jerk than of a real evil guy"- Blake answered,

-"Why?"-

-"You don't want to know"- Blake said and gasped when he noticed Joana's face very close to his (mere inches from his)

-"I DO want to know"- She said softly, Blake gulped and muttered

-"Dammit"-

-"So?"- She asked, while having both hands on his shoulders (still healing) and her face very close to his,

-"Ehm... let's just say that if I ever act weird, you can slap me or punch me with all rights"-

-"What do you mean by weird? And why would I slap you?"- She asked innocently, Blake gulped more and said

-"My dark side... he..."-

-"What?"-

-"He's a freakin' pervert!!"- Blake screamed, and panted, saying -"At last, I said it..."-

-"Why is he a pervert?"-

-"Why are you asking so many questions? I can ask too, for example, where did you get that healing power?"-

-"I'll answer if you answer my question"- She said playfully

-"That's not fair"-

-"Everything is fair in love"- She kissed him, and after that, asked

-"So, what happened with your dark side?"-

-"I told you... he's a jerk. He's a pervert... He... said he wanted to take over my body so he could... whatever... and get away with it"- Joana was waiting for the complete answer so he said

-"He implied that he wanted to... grope you........"- Blake closed his eyes expecting an angry answer or even a slap or a punch (like when Karina hits Anthony for being a pervert). He slowly opened his eyes and saw Joana, who wasn't even blushing (He had become red as a tomato, more noticeable now that he has white skin). She caressed him softly and said, while blushing

-"I wouldn't mind if you did that"- Blake got even redder and said, with faltering voice

-"But...he...wants t-to do it h-himself... It wouldn't be me... I-It's not like I-I would anyway..."-

-"He's your instincts, isn't he? It means that you really want to do that..."- Joana said

-"Please, stop that"- Joana smiled and said

-"Well, your healing is done, why don't you sleep for a while?"-

-"That reminds me, you owe me an answer... You made me tell that my dark side is a sick jerk, so now tell me. To my knowledge, you had no powers...."-

-"Lith borrowed me her powers"- Joana said, and despite lying, Blake didn't notice, and accepted it. Joana asked

-"You don't like me having powers, do you?"-

-"It's not that. The feeling of power makes you confident and cocky. A strong willpower is needed to handle a great power... just, don't get yourself killed..."- Blake said, and Joana hugged him, saying

-"I won't get killed if you are with me..."-
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Demon Blake is a jerk

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
-"Whatever..."- Blake said. Joana laid nest to him. Minutes passed and Joana noticed that Blake was tired but didn't sleep. She asked

-"Are you ok?"-

-"Just can't sleep..."- Blake answered. Joana remembered that since she moved with him 2 years ago, She always fell asleep before Blake, and the few times she didn't, Blake hardly slept. She never asked him about that but once Karina told her that he suffered insomnia. She knew it because once Blake had told her himself. Also, the stressful life he's had doesn't help either. Joana spoke to him

-"Blake..."-

-"What is it?"-

-"Why aren't you sleeping?"-

-"Why aren't you?"- He answered

-"I wanted to make sure you rest"-

-"Well... I simply can't sleep. It's natural. Since I was a kid I just can't sleep most of time"-

-"It's not natural. You should sleep with no problem"-

-"It's been like this since I was 5, there's nothing to do..."-

-"Why you never told me?"-

-"*Sigh* I didn't think it was something important to tell... And there's nothing you can do to help anyway, as I said, I've been like this since I can remember"-

Joana remained thoughtful for a moment. She knew that Blake's insomnia had to have a cause, and a remedy. She wondered, and reviewed many things she knew about Blake. The most recurring terms were the death of his father, his loneliness, Blaze... She thought that there might be no answer, however, she reviewed in her ind again and wondered what could it be. After a while, she had an idea

-"Hey Blake"-

-"What?"-

-"How about entering your original body for a while?"-

-"Did you forget that it's shrunk?"-

-"Yeah I know, but it might help you"-

-"I had my old body before and still couldn't sleep"-

-"Pleeease"- She said sweetly, and Blake sighed

-"Okay, where is it?"-

-"Here"- Joana opened a drawer and showed Blake's tiny body surrounded by a cian sphere. She said

-"I know that you'd say 'Is that how you keep my old body?!' So I put this barrier around it, you can't tell me that it's not safe or that it's gathering dust"-

-"Yeah, yeah, whatever..."- Blake stared at his former body, and after the barries vanished, he extended his hand and touched it. Immediately, Blake became golden ghost-like energy and entered the shrunk body. Blake opened his eyes and looked at the now giant to him Joana. He said

-"I have bad memories about this size"-

-"Awww..."- Joana cooed and brought him near her hazel eyes

-"I missed you"- She said

-"But I wasn't gone"- Blake relied

-"No silly, I missed you like this. This is the Blake I know. I like your black eyes better than the green ones..."-

-"Well, I have to admit that this body feels better, maybe because this is my real one. However, I still can't sleep."-

Joana didn't reply, but put him in her arms, and cushioned with her chest. Blake asked, confused

-"What are you doing?!"-

-"You don't know?!"- Joana was surprised, then she asked

-"Have you ever been lulled?"-

-"Nope..."-

-"Do you know what is it?"-

-"Not really... I only know that has to do something with babies"-

-"How did you sleep when you were one?"-

-"My father once said that I slept by my own"-

-"Usually, babies are lulled so they can sleep"- She said as she hugged Blake a little tighter

-"If mothers do that, then you can understand why I never..."-

-"Awwwww, you poor little thing"- Joana hugged him and softly rocked him. The motion began to make effect and Blake yawned, then, he heard her singing some old Spanish lullaby, but he was too tired to hear it whole, and soon he was sleeping, snuggling against Joana's large breasts. She smiled and thought

'James was right. Blake needs a lot of affection no matter how old he is.' She laid back with Blake on her chest and the room was illuminated in a strange, unnatural way. Everything had a slight golden tint, and she heard a voice inside her head

-"Joana. No matter what you do, don't lose the physical contact with Blake while he's sleeping"-

-"What?"- She answered in her thought

-"Whenever Blake sleeps, you must not lose the physical contact with him. Your powers are greater than you think, and you're the only one who can protect him"-

-"Protect him? From what?"-

-"Many things. Just keep that on mind"- The voice said as the golden light vanished as quietly as it appeared. She already knew that voice, and in her thought, she said

-"I will, James. Thanks for trusting me. I won't let anything happen to your son..."-

Joana, seeing that maybe Blake would slip if she fell asleep, decided to put him in her cleavage. Done that, she slept as well...

When Blake was limited to human abilities, Karina was faster than him. While Blake was shrunk, she was the strongest human fighter who confronted Blaze (arguably, because Alexander once fought her, Ferdinand, Ayrton and Anthony AT ONCE, and dominated the fight), and despite having only normal human abilities she was the only one who could keep standing until Blake's arrival, two years ago. In difference of Joana, Blake rarely helped out Karina in a one on one fight. However, if she was against more, or the guys were dangerous, Blake and her would fight them together (Another difference with Joana... When he appeared, he fought the guys alone)

Tabitha, on the other side, had been a normal cat her whole life. Though she and Max faced some animals like rats (which can put up a fight against even dogs, and are quite brave), skunks, foxes (Rocky hates them) and scorpions, besides others. Also, stray cats and dogs that tried to steal their food. Tabitha excels at hunting, and is far better than Max. She was also the fastest pet. Now that she is an anthro, her senses have gotten a great boost, and her speed surpasses even Karina's and Blake's. Her attack method is with her very sharp claws (Though she can't use them in her fight against Karina)

Having greater speed, reflexes, and jumping abilities, her only drawback was the stamina. She had those abilities with practically a normal person's stamina, which decreases drastically the time she can fight seriously (Felines have low stamina... seriously, not even cougars or lions can fight for too long. Blake got up early in the morning. About at 2:00 AM, it was still dark. He managed not to wake Joana up. -"What a way to say thanks... I saved you twice and what's all I get? A 'get back and don't disturb' "-

-"Actually, your help just made things worse with my girlfriend..."-

-"You knew you needed to tell her about yourself. I'm your instincts, I knew perfectly what was going to happen. You needed to tell her that sometimes you need to relax"-

-"Weren't you supposed to be evil and be conspirating against me to take over my mind?"- Blake sarcastically asked

-"Nah. I'll do that later... Anyway, if you counted how many times I've tried to take over against the times I've saved you, you would kiss my feet"-

-"The few times you tried to take over were when you screwed up... AND I kiss nobody's feet. "-

-"Not even your girl's?"-

-"I'm not into feet... thanks..."-

-"Then what about her 'orbs' ?"-

-"Do you ever think about anything else?"- Blake replied annoyed. Demon Blake smiled, and mocked

-"Awww... the boy is so innocent that hasn't even a taste for girls... Snap out of it!! You grew in streets!! You should be drooling at the mere thought of your girlfriend's 'fleshyness'..."-

-"Well, I'm you... so... you're actually a perv..."- Blake sighed and decided to ignore his internal darkness. He had found a good spot for training anyway. He started practicing, transforming into his light power, and glowing in the aura. He said to himself

-"This technique is multiplying my power x4... let's see if I can go further..."- Blake then started to focus and the aura's flaming movement became more electric like, spikier, more violent and faster. Also, golden bolts flashed around Blake. He jumped upward at high speed and tried using his air dashing moves. He nearly could fly, yet requiring previous impulses for he dashes, but they were faster and longer. Blake also tested his strength. But after just 15 minutes, he fell to the ground exhausted, he said, breathing heavily

-"Damn!! I can't believe I lasted that short... I really need to improve this... at least... I multiplied my power x8..."- Blake was about to take a juice can, when a golden light illuminated the area and Lith appeared. Blake said

-"Too late, when I needed some help you were somewhere else..."-

-"You didn't need my help. You just needed to tell her that you needed to relax as well..."-

-"Uh-huh..."- Blake growled, sarcastically saying in his mind 'Where have I heard that before?'
