12.content:
[STORY CONTINUES FROM THIS CHAPTER http://www.writing.com/main/interact/ite...

Back to Rose's homeworld, about 10:00 AM

Joana, Jak and Jasmine were still sleeping in their rooms. But they began to wake up after hearing some noises, specially Rocky's growl. Joana woke up and nearly fell off the bed when she realized Blake wasn't there. After hearing the noises, she started to suspect something bad... would Blake have gone to fight by himself? She also wondered why he didn't wake her up, and remembered that the last time Blaze attacked, Blake wasn't intended to wake her up either. She got up and dresses while thinking

'Blake still has to learn that he can't do everything by himself...'

When she walked outside her room, she encountered with Jak and Jasmine, the latter said

-"I have a bad feeling about this... uh... where's your boyfriend?"-

-"I was wondering the same..."- Joana answered, strangely sounding worried and sarcastic. She stared at Jak, who felt it and replied

-"Don't look at me. I don't know... but, I don't think Blake would leave unless it was something important..."-

-"Yeah, but, I can't feel his presence anywhere..."-

-"What?"- Jak was surprised.Blake had told him before that she had unknown means to find him, he was still trying to figure out because he evaded all of her 5 senses and she still was able to tell where he was.

-"It's a bit complicated... but almost always, I know where Blake is... except when I'm sleeping, as you see..."-

-"We better stop wasting time and find out..."- Jak said as he started to walk, followed by the girls. Minutes later, they reached the entrance and after looking in the distance, gasped, seeing three unknown (to them) men. Blake's pets Rocky, Max, Tabitha and D'Artagnan were standing before them.

-"So... this is the best that Shinonome Ryan could get?"- Said a scary man, who was completely white skinned and had long black hair, with amber snake-like eyes.

-"Hmph... they seem like some strange experiment failures..."- Said another man, whose skin was pale but not completely white as the other one's. He was dressed with a blue long jacket, and an armor seemingly made of bone. He had red eyes and long black hair.

-"Just kill them already, Orochimaru"- Said the man in the middle of the other two. He had swept back brown hair, with a strand hanging. He was dressed in a what looked like a long white jacket over white samurai-looking clothing. Joana gasped, as she recognized two of the three men as Sousuke Aizen and Naraku. The other man's identity had just been revealed.

-"It will be my pleasure"- Answered Orochimaru, who charged toward the animals. Instead of dodging him, Rocky stood and punched him with great force. The cats immediately slashed him several times and D'Artagnan connected some kicks. Orochimaru was very surprised, and after wiping off the blood in his face, he opened his mouth, and another Orochimaru came out. Rocky, Max and Tabitha had very confused looks.

-"You simply can't win, animals. I can't die!!"-

-"You call us animals... then, what are you, snake guy?"- Rocky replied, angering Orochimaru

-"How dare you?!!"- He charged again with great speed, this time punched Rocky, but he didn't deal as much damage as he expected. Instead, Rocky bit his arm, instantly breaking it. Orochimaru simply tore it off and kicked him, sending him some meters away. Max and Tabitha took the chance, slashing Orochimaru several more times in the body and face. He punched Max with his left arm and Tabitha immediately ran to his side.

He again came out of his damaged body, with a new one. He walked threateningly toward Max who also got up, and exchanged several punches and kicks. Meanwhile, Rocky had gotten up as well, and dashed toward them

Orochimaru was so focused on fighting Max that he didn't see Rocky coming. He had rushed toward them at very high speed and headbutted Orochimaru, sending him away against some trees. Max laughed, saying

-"I think you took a little too seriously the 'bull' part in 'pitbull'..."-

-"Heh... that will teach that freaky snake guy..."-

-"I AM NOT A FREAKY SNAKE GUY!!"- Orochimaru screamed, as he walked toward them with another new body

In that moment, D'Artagnan kicked him but Orochimaru grabbed his foot, punched him in the face and sent him away. He also grew a snake tail instead of his legs and slithered at great speed, punching Max and Tabitha. However, he still had a hard time fighting Rocky, whom wasn't as much affected by his punches. They kept fighting like this when D'Artagnan appeared, but this time, he slashed him with his weapons, which consisted of two tonfas with sickle blades.

-"So that's how you want to play it then, huh?"- Two snakes came out of his shoulders and attacked D', however, it was useless against his shell. Rocky took the chance to bite and tore them off. Orochimaru then extended his hands and more snakes came out of his sleeves, some of them got to bite Rocky despite his efforts. Max and Tabitha attacked them but Orochimaru used the snakes to trap them instead, the snakes wrapping tightly around the cats. D'Artagnan intevrened cutting the snakes with his sickle bladed tonfas. In a swift motion, he thrusted the blades into Orochimaru's chest, while Rocky tore off his left arm and the cats inflicted several slashing wounds.

The three anthros were struggling against the ninja. Not allowing a chance for him to emerge from his body. However, his torn arm turned into several snakes that attacked them. And he used that chance to come out of his damaged body again. This time, larger snakes (boa-like) emerged from his shoulders and wrapped themselves around all of the anthros. Then, the snakes rose into the air and smashed down their victims. Orochimaru was about to repeat this when a voice said behind him

-"I'd think it over before doing that again"- Blake said.

-"Master!!"- Tabitha exclaimed gladly

-"Don't worry. Thanks for holding off this weirdo... Now, I'll take care of this..."- Blake said, almost readint his pets' worries.

From the mansion. Joana was surprised to feel suddenly Blake's presence. She was also surprised by how suddenly he appeared out of nowhere. She was starting to walk toward the place when Jasmine stopped her, saying

-"Maybe he can really take care of this... Trust him..."-

-"I TRUST him... I don't trust the freaky snake guy..."- Joana replied, and heard the angry scream of said person

-"I am not a freaky snake guy!!"-

Then...
12.title: Chapters 251+

choices: -"Well... can't say I didn't tell you..."-
121.content:
Blake punched Orochimaru in stomach, sending him away several meters. He grabbed all of his pets and vanished, quickly reappearing before Joana. She immediately exclaimed

-"Blake?!! Where the heck were you?!! You had me worried!!"-

-"I have no time for this. Long story. Take care of them"- Blake then walked closer to her and whispered

-"Please... don't use your powers unless is strictly necessary... Blaze has no knowledge of them..."- Joana opened her eyes wide, because she realized Blake didn't remember when they met Jak and Jasmine. Blake had gone into the fusion form and Joana grew giant to fight Blaze... however... Blake doesn't remember anything. To prevent further trouble, she nodded. Blake vanished and reappeared where Orochimaru was. He said

-"What makes you think you can beat me alone, huh? Your pets were barely scratching me..."-

Blake answered nothing, and only stood seriously. Orochimaru smiled

-"Let's see if you're really that strong. C'mon, fight me with all your power!!"- He said as he charged toward Blake

-"All my power? You're wrong. I don't need that much to beat you. I won't even fight seriously..."- With that, Blake dodged his punch and connected a powerful kick, sending him more than 100 feet away. Orochimaru then opened his mouth and a snake came out, from the snake's mouth came out a very long sword, that extended quickly and tried to pierce Blake. He simply dodged him with little movement. Blake grabbed the blade and pulled it toward him, effectively pulling Orochimaru toward him, punching him in stomach again.

Blake also sank the blade into the ground, and kept attacking Orochimaru like he was a simple punching bag. The snake in Orochimaru's mouth retreated as well as the sword, with some difficult. He then performed some strange poses with his hands and called

-"Earth Clone Jutsu"- Another Orochimaru appeared, this one made of mud. Blake said

-"At least you should have tried better to confuse me..."-

Both Orochimaru and his clone charged toward him and this time, they landed some punches on Blake, but much to their surprise, Blake didn't move even an inch. And he had no damage. Blake punched through the mud clone, destroying it. Orochimaru looked with wide eyes. Blake turned around and connected several combos of punches and kicks, to end with a powerful mid air upward kick that sent him away out of sight

Meanwhile, where Joana and the others stayed...

-"Hor did he do that? I was sure those guys were pretty tough..."- Jak was surprised, he thought that he'd need to transform to face those enemies.

-"Maybe it has something to do with Blake leaving in the night..."- Jasmine said

-"He... he had a different look in his eyes..."- Joana said, and Jasmine looked at her confused, Joana added

-"I had never seen him like that. He looked... confident... He always was serious in a fight, and somewhat conscious that he could lose... but now... he looked like he could do anything..."-

Blake stood, his back turned to Aizen and Naraku. The latter, grunted and rushed to attack Blake as well, but he was surprised when Blake stopped his incoming fist with his bare hand, without even looking. Then he swiftly landed a powerful kick on Naraku's chest, cracking his armor. He stared at him and muttered

-"Is it possible... another lame hybrid?... No... He isn't one... his presence is different... almost... opposite?"-

Naraku reformed his hands into pincers and attacked Blake, who stopped them with his bare hands. Naraku then grew a scorpion tail and tried to sting Blake, failing, because Blake kicked him, and with his now free hands, ripped it off. The tail fell to the ground. Naraku laughed, and changed into an insect-like form, only keeping his humanoid torso. He grew dragonfly wings, scorpion pincers and tail, and insect feet. Blake's expression was cold, and emotionless.

Using his wings, Naraku flew at great speed trying to attack Blake, but he dodged it with little movement and ripped off two of his wings. Then he connected some punches into his humanoid torso and gave a powerful kick that cracked his insect part's exoskeleton. Naraku kept laughing and said

-"You're so gullible... Heh... You should think over before ripping off my parts..."- All the parts Blake had ripped off wriggled as if they were alive and wrapped themselves around Blake's neck, wrists, arms, knees, feet and torso. Blake said nothing, and Naraku changed his lower body into a large centipede like form. He also grew more arms with pincers and tentacles. He used the latter to wrap around Blake, but even already binded, Blake had no problem to crush with his hands and rip apart Naraku's tentacles. He laughed

-"You are a slow one, aren't you? I can't understand why are you this strong, but in the end...you'll be a good lunch..."- Said that. all of the parts torn from Naraku's body enveloped Blake, and brought him inside his body. Joana gasped and started to run toward them, decided to use her powers even when Blake told her not to. Jak and Jasmine ran with her as well, as all of them thought Blake was in literally deep trouble. But they stopped when heard Blake's voice

-"Hey Naraku... I am not the gullible one... In fact... you are the gullible one..."-

-"What??!!"-

-"Haven't you heard? They say that eating mexican gives you an upset stomach..."-

-"Nonsense... I'll digest you no matter where you're from..."-

Inside Naraku, his tissue was starting to envelope Blake, in a web-like fashion, to absorb his nutrients and energy. Blake let the tissue make contact with his skin and then said
121.title: Blake fights Orochimaru...

1211.content:
[Background Music: Bleach, Fade to Black OST - Track 20: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Iz-Yh6o5c... ]

Immediately, Blake transformed into light form, his hair rose up and his eyes turned golden. The tissue enveloping him started to burn at contact, as well as everything inside Naraku that touched Blake's body. Outside, Naraku groaned in pain and spat out lots of fluids. Then Blake's voice was heard again

-"You should be more careful with what you eat Naraku..."- Inside Naraku, Blake rose his hand and fired an upward golden beam. Outside, Naraku opened his mouth and a golden beam came out of it, severely damaging his own face. Then, many lightbeams shone inside the demon. Then, a fist punched through, and burned what it touched in Naraku's body. Blake came out as if nothing had happened. He added

-"How did you like that? Want another taste?"- He grabbed his left wrist with his right hand and charged a powerful energy beam that when fired, totally blew Naraku's upper body. Then, the lower half collapsed to the ground, apparently dead. However, Blake kept the transformation. Joana ran to his side, saying

-"Blake... don't do EVER that again... You had me so worried"-

-"I had to. I knew since the first moment that Naraku was aiming to absorb me to become stronger... too bad... I think I gave him severe indigestion..."- Blake laughed at his own joke. Joana kept staring at him, and asked

-"Why are you still transformed? Didn't you say that it uses up lots of energy to keep your light form?"-

-"We'll talk about that later... But for now, go back to the house. Naraku isn't dead yet..."-

-"What?!!"-

-"Even if he was, there's still Aizen..."- Blake looked at him from the distance.

-"Blake... what did you do all these hours?"-

-"You'll know soon enough..."- Blake answered, then turned around and stood in a fight stance
1211.title: Eating Blake may give you an upset stomach...

12111.content:
Naraku's body reformed slowly. He took his full humanoid form again, and said

-"Why you?!!"-

Blake felt that this was no longer a one on one fight, and with precise timing, he jumped upward, getting Naraku and Orochimaru to hit each other. Blake landed on the ground and turned to see his two opponents. They were deeply angry, specially Naraku. When they prepared to charge toward him, Aizen appeared (using shunpo/flash step), and said firmly

-"Stop you two already. It's clear that you're no match for him"-

-"Shut it Aizen!! I'm just getting started"- Naraku said

-"Me too..."- Orochimaru said

-"Enough!!"- Aizenm who was standing on the air, landed on the ground. His presence brought forcefully both Naraku and Orochimaru to their knees. He looked threateningly to Blake's eyes, saying

-"You may not be an ant. But you're just a bigger bug that I still can crush anytime..."-

-"You shouldn't underestimate your opponents. Naraku just learned that the bad way"- Blake said, not intimidated by Aizen even the slightest

-"When you're a god, everyone else is just weak"-

'The strongest wave of deja vu just hit me... I wonder... where have I heard that before?' Blake thought, sarcastically. He knew Aizen had been watching his fight, and that's why he had used very few techniques. Aizen effectively underestimated him, and that's what Blake wanted. He disappeared, and Aizen felt a punch in his stomach. Blake then reappeared behind him and kicked him. Aizen turned around and looked at Blake, then, he wiped off the blood of his lips' corner

-"A front attack against me, without even a weapon... you sure are a courageous man... however... you're also a fool..."- Aizen said as he used shunpo and attacked Blake, much to his surprise, he dodged him. Aizen was starting to analyze his fighting style

'That move... it isn't shunpo nor sonido... how does he do that? Can he move at that speed with no spiritual energy?'

-"I don't need my zanpakuto for this..."- Aizen used shunpo again and this time punched Blake, sending him several meters away. He said

-"Was that all what you've got?"-

Blake simply stood and dashed at him. Aizen was able to dodge him and to connect powerful punches and kicks on him. When he was about to smash down Blake to the ground, he grabbed his fist and Blake was the one who smashed Aizen down to the ground.

-"Blake has just gone mad... how the hell does he think he can face Aizen alone?"- Jak said

-"Aizen is faster... but... as strange as it sounds... Blake isn't fighting seriously yet..."- Joana answered

-"What?!!"- Both Jak and Jasmine had o.o faces

-"When Blake fights Blaze, or when he fought me, he gave off more energy in his presence. This time, Blake seems to be using as least as possible..."- Joana explained

'Would that have something to do with the aura he spoke about?' Jak thought, and sighed 'Blake, don't dare to die...'

Aizen was fighting bare handed as well, but he was dealing heavier damage. Blake's attacks seemed to be not enough to damage him properly. Blake's resistance surprised slightly Aizen, who defeated most of his enemies with little effort. After an extreme exchange of punches and kicks Aizen kicked Blake, sending him down, and creating a large crater with the impact.

[Background Music: Bleach - The tables have turned http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=11vALBfUC... ]

He said

-"Just another bug... you are unarmed, and aren't worth my time..."- He slowly landed on the ground, just to see that Blake wasn't there. Then, Blake reappeared above him and said

-"Gold as the sunlight... the light that pierces through darkness... burn the enemy down to ashes..."- A huge golden light was fired from his hand, while his other hand was grabbing his wrist. This beam was totally different from ordinary ones, it was a triple beam, a large one with two smaller ones that create spirals around it. Also, in difference of the other energy attacks, this seemed more fire-like (Like Blake's golden aura)

The explosion was enormous, and effectively, left everything that the explosion touched burnt to ashes, except Aizen, The same couldn't be said about his clothes though...

-"What kind of attack was that?!!"- Aizen reflexed 'He did use an incantation... but... I have never heard of such Kido spell... It was also... a high leveled one...'

Blake was standing a few meters in front of him. Joana and the others were in shock

-"Since when Blake can do that?!! 4 days ago he couldn't even form an energy ball!!"- Jak exclaimed

-"Definitively... Blake, wherever he went, went to improve himself..."- Joana said, now with more hopes and faith on him

-"You have all the rights to be proud"- Jasmine patted Joana's shoulder. They kept watching while healed Blake's pets, which had bravely fought Orochimaru and gave him a run for his money.

-"Just luck..."- Aizen said. Blake dashed toward him and both again engaged into a high speed combat. Aizen kept the upper hand but Blake got to fire energy balls at point-blank right into his face and chest. Aizen then said

-"Hado #31: Shakkaho"- He fired a red energy ball at Blake. Blake dodged it without much problem

-"Hado #33: Sokatsui"- Now he fired a blue energy beam. Blake barely could dodge it and Aizen was already in front of him

-"Bakudo #4: Hainawa"- A rope made of yellow energy entangled in Blake's arms, and Aizen said

-"I knew I didn't need much to defeat you..."-

-"You thought this was all?"- Blake said, and then he started to glow. A golden aura surrounded his body, and the energy binding on Blake's arms dissolved as a rope exposed to fire. Aizen could perceive that Blake's power was rising, and he grabbed his zanpakuto, saying

-"I can't let you live. No more games..."- He slashed at Blake but his blade was suddenly stopped. Lith appeared between Blake and Aizen, blocking the zanpakuto with a finger. Aizen tried to attack the woman but she dodged the blows with no problem. Blake asked

-"Lith... what are you doing here?"- Lith extended her hand and a very large sword appeared, it was nearly 6 feet long. This blade was very wide, double edged, and the metal was black, very shiny, as if it was polished. But at the same time, it didn't look like any metal known. Blake said

-"You want me to use that?!! It's too heavy and big!! The metal looks weird anyway...."-

-"Use it, please..."- Lith said, handing it to Blake. He, reluctantly, grabbed it. It didn't feel as heavy as he thought. She disappeared. Blake said to Aizen

-"If you wanted a sword fight, you got it!!"-

-"Since when does Blake wield a sword?!!"- Everyone back outside the house wondered

Blake's sword looks like this: http://www.tantra.ph/mudha/images/nikrat... But with a hilt like this http://www.blade-empire.com/Kit_Rae/Kilg...
12111.title: Naraku comes back!!

choices: Joana can't take it anymore and goes to save Blake...
121111.content:
Aizen was confident on that he'd cut that sword like butter because it was just a metal sword, but when he slashed at Blake, he stopped the attack with the wide blade, using it as a shield. Then, he hit Aizen several times with it (the wide side, not the edged sides). Then, Blake slashed Aizen's shoulder, and he was surprised to be cut by a non spiritual blade.

-"Someone told me that even gods can die. And you aren't even one, Aizen..."- Blake said, disappearing and reappearing in front of Aizen, trying to pierce through him. Aizen stopped him with his zanpakuto and countered slashing at Blake. But, despite he seemingly was slashed in two, disappeared and when Aizen turned around, Blake was there, this time Aizen said

-"Attacks vaguely similar to Kido... a sword that can cut through spiritual beings... and... a flash step movement... Who ARE you?"-

-"Blake. And I'm nothing you've seen before..."- He said as he disappeared, Aizen realized he couldn't predict where would he appear due to no spiritual energy usage. Still, Aizen could react quickly enough, and slashed Blake in the chest. But Blake had grabbed the blade. Aizen opened his eyes wide for the first time. Blake then glowed in the golden aura and delivered a powerful punch right into his face, followed by several slashes. Yet, most of the wounds were superficial.

Blake's aura changed from its gently flaming form to a more violent, and more jagged. Also, instead of flowing outward, the aura started to flow upward. He disappeared again, and Aizen felt lots of slashed on his body. Deeper than before, but far from being severe wounds. Blake reappeared and Aizen said

-"Hado #63: Raikoho"- He fired a thunder-like yellow energy beam that Blake blocked with his sword. Then, Blake started to spin his sword and threw it at Aizen, who dodged it by standing on the air with no problem, he said

-"Did you expect to hit me with that?..."- Blake wasn't there, then he heard

-"Purge... light of the heavens... banish from existence those who worship the wicked god*..."- Blake was below him and fired an extremely wide beam that went upward as a pillar, trapping Aizen in the middle of it. Aizen was badly burnt this time, however, his hands glowed in green and healed himself.

Blake took the chance and punched him, but got slashed in the chest by Aizen, who then said

-"Shatter... Kyoka Suigetsu..."- Blake punched Aizen and he used shunpo to get away, he repeated the command

-"Shatter..."- Blake dashed at him with his aura and puched him in the face. Aizen wondered why wasn't it working until he recalled that Blake wasn't looking at his sword. Then, he said

-"I don't need to release my zanpakuto to beat you..."- He pointed his hand at Blake and said -"Bakudo #9: Geki"- He fired a red beam that engulfed Blake, who said

-"What's this supposed to do"- As he attacked Aizen with his sword. Aizen now said

-"Bakudo #9: Horin"- A rope-like orange beam wrapped itself around Blake's arms. Aizen summoned another and binded Blake's feet. Then, Aizen said

-"A mere human can't break two Binding spells at once..."- Blake then powered up his aura, this time turning even spikier and electric-like, in contrast to its usual fire-like appearance. Blake said

-"You're wrong... I am no mere human..."- With that, he broke the energy entangling him, and started to fire several golden energy balls. Aizen put his arm in front of him and said

-"Bakudo #39: Enkosen"- He created a round shield of yellow energy, but it broke after more than 8 impacts of Blake's energy ball attacks. Then, Aizen aimed both hands and Blake, saying

-"Hado #73: Soren Sokatsui"- He fired two powerful blue energy beams. Blake shielded with his sword but the beams exploded at contact. Suddenly, Aizen heard behind him

-"Purify, Soul Vanisher... Bring the judgement of light..."- Blake said, with his open right hand on the ground, as a symbol started to form on the ground, around Aizen. (It looked like this: http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_m1ALyYSRw9U/St... but made of golden light) Aizen found that he could no longer move his feet, nor perform shunpo.

-"What the...?!! What kind of binding spell is this?!!"-

-"Consume the darkness, sentence to death... Incinerate, heavenly lights!!"- Six pillars of light rose from the ground, and a seventh came from beneath Aizen, then, it extended over all the others and the whole symbol. After a while, it slowly decreased in width until it disappeared.

Aizen had sustained major damage but he still wasn't too heavily damaged. Blake on the other side, was tired, and breathing heavily. That last technique consumed lots of energy, and he combined it with his aura state to power it up. Aizen again healed himself and said

-"Such powers wielded by a mere kid. No wonder you're running out of energy after this. I'd tell that green haired woman that she shouldn't send kids to do a god's job"- Blake was angered by that and aimed his hand at him, firing a golden beam.

-"Bakudo #81: Danku"- A transparent barrier appeared in front of him -"This can stop any spell up to level 89"-

The barrier shattered when Blake's beam struck it, which surprised Aizen 'A beam with no incantation... and it was above level 89?'. He was interrupted when Blake dashed toward him, glowed again in his aura and attacked him, Aizen dodged him and slashed with his zanpakuto, cutting a deep wound in Blake's right shoulder.He also aimed his hand and said

-"Bakudo #30: Shitotsu Tatsen"- Three beams linked by light were shot at Blake, pinning him against a rock. Blake couldn't break free this time. His energy reserves were really low. Aizen walked threateningly toward Blake, with his zanpakuto ready to take his life...

*This reference is not meant to be Aizen himself, since the techniques Blake uses were taught by Lith, and were created thousands of years ago. Just to prevent confusion, Blake actually is using incantations for these techniques

choices: An enraged Blake fights Aizen... or will he?
1211111.content:
Aizen stopped when he felt a slash in his face. He turned around to see a very angry brown haired girl, who was aiming her hand at him. Blake said

-"Don't fight him... Joana..."- But before he realized, Joana was next to him, she carried Blake and disappeared. Aizen used shunpo to appear in front of her, a few meters from the house. Jak and Jasmine were behind him in fighting stances, as well as Blake's pets

Rocky and Max were the first ones to attack, but Aizen punched both of them and then, was about to attack Tabitha, but his fist was stopped by D'Artagnan, who attacked him with his sickle bladed tonfas, just to find that they couldn't cut him. Jak got to punch him in the distraction and Jasmine fired an energy ball at him. Joana was the only one not fighting because she was protecting Blake, and with good reason. Blake had become Aizen's main target, after seeing his abilities, mentally labeled him as a possible threat.

Aizen again used shunpo to dodge everyone's attacks and stood in front of Joana

-"You better leave that boy if you value your life..."- He said, unseathing his zanpakuto

-"Over my dead body"- Joana said, carrying Blake on her back. She readied two energy beams in her hands

-"That can be arranged..."- Aizen answered. Blake, who was nearly unconscious, opened his eyes wide, aftr hearing Joana, and he used his speed to attack Aizen, shouting

-"Lay a finger on her and you're dead!!"- Blake managed to turn into light form and use the aura despite he was severely wounded. Joana was very surprised by his reaction... and remembered Blake's past...

Blake was struggling against Aizen who simply smashed him down to the ground, and fired a Shakkaho (red energy ball) at point blank at him. Blake stood up, panting, and again glowed in the aura. This time, his aura was even more jagged, and moved erratically. Blake punched Aizen in the face as he pierced through his chest with his zanpakuto. Blake's aura disappeared, his hair reverted back to normal, and he fell backward. Joana screamed...

Lith appeared suddenly before Aizen, and looked at Blake. Then, she said to Joana

-"Heal him. He's still alive"- She nodded and disappeared, carrying Blake on her back. Aizen went after them but Lith stood before him, and placed a very powerful barrier around the whole house.

-"Let me tell you something... There's only one thing more dangerous than a god... an angry mother, who happens to be a goddess..."- She said as she vanished, punching Aizen while using her high speed.

Meanwhile, inside the house, Joana was desperately healing Blake.

-"Why?!! Blake has been so many times so close to death... why?!!"-

-"He did his best. Joana, by what you told me, he's willing to do anything to keep you from harm..."- Jasmine kneeled next to her and added her own healing on Blake. Jak said

-"He sure trained a lot... I thought we were equals in fighting abilities but it seems that he improved a lot. Joana, Blake's doing the best he can... you can't ask more of him..."- Jak saw tears running down Joana's cheeks, and gasped when saw Blake opening his eyes, saying with a faint voice

-"Don't cry..."-

Joana hugged him tightly when she heard his voice. Surprisingly, Blake's healing speed boosted when Joana did this, and she wasn't even using any healing technique at the moment (it was interrupted when she lost concentration). Blake stood up after Joana released the hug. He said

-"I'm sorry about this... I knew I should've multiplied my power further..."-

-"What do you mean?"- Joana asked

-"I can control a technique that had remained unknown: When I'm in light state, I can use an aura, and it multiplies my power, speed and strength at the cost of lots of energy and durability. It ends up weakening me. Currently I can multiply my power up to 5 times with no problem. But, if I want to beat Aizen I must multiply above 7 times... and I don't know how long will I resist..."-

-"You don't have to fight him alone"- Jak said

-"Maybe... but if things get ugly, at least everyone else will be able to escape..."-

-"I don't think Joana would, as I wouldn't leave my Luigi-boogums either"- Jasmine said

-"Fighting somebody like Aizen is worlds far from what we've known... I'm afraid to say that he's stronger than anybody we've fought so far... I feel that Aizen fights as an unrestrained Blaze... Yet... he looks familiar... like I knew someone like him in a further past..."-

-"You mean he's stronger than Blaze?"- Joana asked starting to feel scared

-"Nope. Stronger than Blaze's last fight's power level. If he was to fight seriously then he'd be probably just as strong or even stronger..."-

-"Well... we better go outside... I don't know how much Lith can hold Aizen off..."-

-"LITH WHAT?!!"- Blake exclaimed

-"Lith is fighting Aizen so we could get back here and heal you"- Joana answered, as they rushed outside the house, until they found the barrier. Blake said

-"We can pass through it, only enemies are affected by this barrier. However, I suggest you to stay here"- Blake said. But he didn't walk out, he was watching Lith fight against Aizen in air. It looked like an even fight. And Lith wasn' even armed. yet, she used lots of advanced techniques and in difference of Blake, she didn't say any incantation.

She also moved at extreme speeds, roughly equaling Aizen's, something Blake failed at (Blake's advantage is that Aizen couldn't predict where he would reappear, instead, he used his superior speed to immediately attack Blake. Lith's movement also shares this trait, but is so fast Aizen can't use his speed to keep up. Blake's inability to fly also kept him from air fighting properly)

Aizen was slashing at her until she stopped his blade and fired a thunderbolt from her other hand. When Aizen fell, the ground under him reformed into spikes. He quickly recovered and Lith said

-"If you can't keep up with this, then you aren't worth to be called a god..."- Lith then raised her hand and thunderbolts, along fire and ice started to rain. Aizen dodged ith with some difficult and was considering that he might be fighting a real goddess. But, he said

-"Bakudo #73: Tozansho"- He was surrouded by a blue inverted pyramid made of energy. Lith fired an emerald beam at it, piercing it. The whole pyramid collapsed but Aizen had disappeared. Suddenly, Lith felt a sharp pain. Aizen's zanpakuto stabbed her from behind. She fell to the ground, and Blake felt an immense rage... also, images flashed back to his mind...

Blaze... Lith... and lots of unknown people, in an unknown place... Blaze stabbed Lith with a strange sword...

Blake grabbed his sword, and rushed outside. Aizen looked at him saying

-"You healed fast... but your efforts will be useless... this goddess wasn't worth her title..."-
1211111.title: A true Goddess vs Self-proclaimed God

choices: WTF?!! Blaze, Nostory and Seth vs Naraku and Orochimaru?!!
12111111.content:
[Backgrund Music: Bleach - Invasion http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bb3NUxXt7... ]

Blake attacked Aizen with his sword. Aizen stopped the attack but felt that Blake was stronger and wasn't transformed. He punched Blake, sending him down against the ground. Blake dodged Aizen's attempt to stab him and blasted a blue energy ball at him.

Blake dashed and tried to stab Aizen again, but he blocked his sword with his hand. Aizen felt some pain when noticed that the sword was cutting through his hand. Then, Blake took out the blade and thrusted it into Aizen's chest, then, he said

-"Stab his heart... burn him to nothing... explode, mighty blade!! Reduce him to nothing by using my soul!!"- Blake transformed into light form, and glowed in his aura. Then, his sword started to glow in golden light. Aizen found that he couldn't take it out... Then he muttered...

-"Damn..."- There was an immense explosion, and an enormous golden light pillar rose from the place where Aizen and Blake were. Many thunderbolts flashed violently around it. The light pillar slowly decreased, until it disappeared. There was now a very large crater, with Aizen and Blake standing on it. Both of them were badly burnt. Blake took his blade out of Aizen's chest, and dashed backward. Aizen pointed his hand at him, saying

-"Bakudo #63: Sajo Sabaku"- Chains made of yellow light appeared and binded Blake's torso. Aizen said

-"Your physical strength can't break a level 60 Binding Spell..."- He was aware that Blake had broken a level 80 Bakudo with a mere energy blast, but he was confident that without energy attacks, Blake would be nothing. He didn't know that Blake's specialty was hand to hand combat.

-"You sure?"- Blake's aura changed from its flame-like form to the more jagged electric-like form, this time Blake's muscles tightened, and his golden irises were glowing. Blake unleashed all that raw power to destroy the chains that were binding him. Then, he punched Aizen with great force, drawing blood. This time, Aizen used shunpo to get a point blank attack behind him, but he was surprised that Blake had dodged his sunpo and he fired his own energy beam behind him...

-"You still want to fight even after that self-destroying attack?"- Aizen smiled and said -"Hado #88: Hiryugeki Zokushintenraiho"-

A blue electric-like beam was fired from his hand and Blake had no time, nor strength to block it. Instinctively, he extended both hands, and prepared for impact... But... there was no impact... The beam was slowly entering Blake's hands, and being absorbed into him. Soon, the whole beam had been absorbed by Blake, who healed back completely. His aura now had some remaining lightning bolts around. Before they did anything else, a gigantic carnivorous plant rose from under Aizen and trapped him.

Lith appeared next to Blake and said to Aizen

-"You think a mere sword can hurt a goddess? Even you, Aizen, are just a small life trying to linger for longer... even you fear death..."- Then she looked at Blake, and said

-"When did you learn to absorb light based attacks?"-

-"I didn't... I just... did it... somehow... I had the feeling to do it..."-

-"That's impressive... Very few angels were capable of absorbing light based attacks... Azrael was one of them... Blake, leave this to me... now that you're fully healed and replenished, go back to the house... I have an account to settle with this self-proclaimed god..."-

-"But, Lith... I thought he had killed you... and... I didn't think you could fight like that..."- She laughed and said

-"Of course I can. Once I was an archangel myself, and I am the commander of Chaos' 4th Legion"-

-"Ok, I guess you're right"- Blake returned to his normal form. When he turned around, Joana and the others were running toward him, and Joana hugged him very tightly

-"Blake!! You had me really worried this time!! I thought you had destroyed yourself to stop Aizen!!"-

-"...c...can't...breathe...need...oxygen..."- Blake said faintly, and Joana realized she was hugging him too tightly

-"You really need to stop doing that..."- Blake said after gasping for air

-"Let's go then. Lith sure can handle this..."- When Jak finished the phrase, the carnivorous plant was sliced and Aizen disappeared using shunpo. He stood in front of Blake, and said

-"You aren't going anywhere..."- He was interrupted when Lith landed a kick on his face, sending him a great distance away...

They started to run but in front of them appeared Orochimaru and Naraku, they smiled evilly

-"You aren't going anywhere... we're not done yet..."- Orochimaru said, as snakes started to come out of his back and shoulders

-"We have business with you..."- Naraku said, but a fist punched through him, and an evil voice was heard

-"I'm sorry, but that's my prey..."- Naraku fell to the ground, revealing Blaze's presence, he smiled, and said

-"I know you've missed me so much, didn't you, Blake?"- Blake had an angry espression. Blaze continued

-"Who are those guys anyway? New friends of yours?"- Orochimaru tried to attack him but Blaze dodged him and punched through his stomach. From Orochiamru's bowels, several snakes started to come out and bit Blaze lots of times. Blaze laughed and asked sarcastically

-"Are you trying to poison me, lame human?"- Orochimaru opened his eyes wide when Blaze smiled, revealing his fangs, and aimed his open hand at his face, firing a purple energy blast. However, a scorpion tail pierced though Blaze's shoulder with its stinger. Naraku's voice was heard

-"I feel you're a demon... that's good... I could use a little appetizer before the main dish..."- Naraku grew lots of tentacles to wrap themselves around Blaze, and engulf him in his own flesh. Blaze was inside him, smiling evilly. Outside, Naraku had grown a very large centipede-like lower body, with six dragonfly-like wings, a gigantic scorpion tail, and lots of additional pincers, and tentacles.

-"Didn't your mother teach you not to eat anything you see?"- Blaze started to power up, using his raw power to damage the insides of Naraku. He managed, with no difficult, to rip open Naraku's tissue, and walk out. Naraku healed quickly and said

-"You'll be part of me sooner or later... And what a better moment to have a snack"-

-"Then eat this!!"- Two purple energy beams struck him from above. Nostory and Seth had appeared

-"Just what I needed..."- Jak said, angry and annoyed

-"We needed those freaks as holes in our heads..."- Blake added

-"At least they're fighting each other..."- Jasmine said

There's no need to get your hands dirty with these lame attempts of demons..."- Blaze said, as he vanished and started to perform a punches and kicks combo on Orochimaru. he then kicked him but Orochimaru opened his mouth, a snake came out of it and a sword started to extend forward, piercing right in Blaze's chest. Naraku for the first time, grudginly, admitted he was right... But he hated to, and started to release a purple mist. Blaze stayed where he was, while the environment around him was quickly dying and disintegrating, and laughing, said

Blaze fired another single handed beam, completely blowing Naraku's arm, where the miasma was coming from. He regenerated it and Blaze grabbed him by the throat, he started to tighten his grip, saying

Aizen also found that his hypnosis was useless against her. Much to his surprise, despite the massive amounts of energy she was using, she didn't look tired at all. He then decided to make a risky move, he put his hands together, saying

-"Bakudo #99, part 2: Bankin!! Shokyoku Shiryu ..."- Fabric started to cover Lith, binding her arms, throwing her to the ground, and stacked to it with iron shafts forming a X shape

-"Nikyoku, Hyakurensa"- Metal bolts appeared and stabbed Lith...

-"Shukyoku... Bankin Taiho!!"- An immense metal cube appeared and fell down right on Lith, smashing her. The force of the impact created a small earthquake and cracked part of the ground.

-"Hmph... Goddess... Maybe you weren't worth the title after all..."-

1211111111.content:
-"Who are you?"- Aizen asked

-"Name's Blaze... but if you don't get out of my way, I'll be your executioner..."-

-"I can't let you. I have business to do here. I came to kill my enemies, and the likes of theirs..."-

-"Is that so?"- Blaze said defiantly

-"I don't care if you killed those two, but, don't think I'm at the same level..."-

-"Then show me what you've got!!"- Blaze laughed maniacally as he dashed toward Aizen, punching him in the face, and sending him away. Blaze disappeared and reappeared right in front of Aizen, he delivered another powerful punch that even created shockwaves. Aizen slowed down by making friction against the ground, leaving deep marks on it. He grabbed his zanpakuto and said

-"Shatter K..."- He was interrupted when Blaze grabbed his weapon, and clenched his hand, breaking it. Aizen for the first time gasped

-"What?! Didn't you command it to shatter? I'm so nice I did it for you... now what?"- Blaze said. Aizen used shunpo to appear behind him, but when he slashed, Blaze was no longer there. He reappeared in front of him, both hands extended, and fired a purple beam at him. The explosion was big, and lots of dust blocked Aizen's sight. Blaze attacked him from above with more purple energy beams that created even more explosions. Aizen quickly escaped, just to find Blaze in front of him, he said

-"Neither you knew I wasn't at the level you thought..."- He fired a large beam with both hands. The smoke and dust dissipated and Blaze said

-"Garbage taken out... now, down to business"- Blaze said, when a dual blue beam perced through him, he fell to the gorund, Aizen used shunpo to appear behind him. He said

-"It takes more to kill a god..."-

-"You're right..."- Blaze said as he vanished and reappeared in front of Aizen. His wounds healed themselves, Aizen thought

'Healing without any technique? He seems to be of the same species of that teenager and that woman..."-

-"I am a god myself, but I serve a higher authority..."- Blaze said, everyone were in shock with Blaze saying such a thing

-"Blaze, the guy who claims to be a god serves someone else?"- Joana exclaimed

-"Omega 17..."- Blake muttered, then he saw more images in his mind:

An unknown place, that looked unwordly... Blaze... in strange clothes... Lith... A brown haired angel with a large sword and purplish armor... A fully armored demon... wielding an immense sword... three dead angels... a beam... piercing through his chest... the image of Blaze firing it... the feeling of death... the anger...

Blake fell to the ground, nearly dismayed, worrying Joana

-"Blake!! What happened?!!"-

-"N...it's nothing..."-

-"Blake..."- Joana said

-"I think so much hits on my head have had some effect... I'll be okay, but I'll need a good rest after this..."- Joana didn't trust Blake's answer. She felt that Blake was different, she senses that Blake felt fear... anger... but couldn't understand why... the sole presence of Blaze didn't cause this. Blake definitively saw something...

Back to the villains, Blaze said

-"This fight is nonsense. You can't beat me... so, step aside and leave this in the hands of the pros..."-

-"Why don't you make me move then?"- Aizen said, blocking Blaze's incoming fist

-"Okay then..."- Blaze said, as he started to power up, a purple aura surrounded him, and purple lightning bolts flashed around him. The wind swirled violently, and the ground around him sank into a small crater. Aizen did so as well, without an aura, but the air around them felt heavier and thicker. Both adversaries kept increasing their powers and Aizen stopped

-"Well then... it seems you're worthy... Aizen... join us..."-

-"WHAT THE...?!!!"- Everyone (even Naraku, Orochimaru, Nostory and Seth)

-"You want to become a god? Then follow me... I'm also searching for ultimate power..."-

-"We'd need to recover the Hogyoku first..."- Aizen said

-"Hogyowhat?!! Forget about that!! I need to release Omega 17... the evil god... he will grant us unlimited power..."-

-"Why are you so sure?"- Aizen questioned him calmly

-"I've worked for him for thousands of years... Some bastard sealed him and most of my own power..."-

-"What do you mean?"-

-"I have only access to a small part of my true power... obviously, with all these years my power in this body has increased..."-

-"Body... aren't you a spirit?"-

-"I got this body to prevent being killed by those bastards... Anyway, a body is useful..."-

-"How? The only thing it does is to bind your powers..."-

-"Are you stupid? The body might limit you at some degree, but with training you get over the limits... and it protects your soul from damage..."- Aizen was now surprised

-"Haven't you wondered why that boy put up so much fight? His attacks damaged directly your soul, as you have no body to protect it!!"- Blaze exclaimed -"He's descendant of an old fellow of mine... and that bastard's specialty was soul damage..."- Aizen opened his eyes wide at this information 'How didn't I figure it out before?!!' He thought to himself

-"So, all we need to do is to kill those guys and get away with it?"- Orochimaru said while walking toward them

-"Most of them... but I need the guy who kicked your asses alive..."-

-"Why?!! He's the most dangerous!!"- Orochimaru exclaimed

-"Because he's the Key to release Omega... He's the angel of darkness... the one that will bring apocalypse..."-

Blake opened his eyes wide when Blaze said that. 'So... Alexander was right... Is it really my destiny? Was I born to solely revive the evil being that threatens to destroy the world?'

-"Are you okay?"- Joana's sweet voice snapped Blake's thoughts

-"Yeah... I think..."-

-"You better get ready... we'll have to fight all of these guys..."- Jak said

-"I know..."- Blake said. But Joana felt that something was wrong with him... something in his voice felt different...

So, Blake, Joana, Jak and Jasmine stood in fighting stance against their enemies...
1211111111.title: Aizen confronts Blaze, Nostory and Seth

-"I'll have to use my powers... I can't let you fight them alone..."-

-" *Sigh* Ok then... It seems I have no other choice..."- Blake said, and Lith suddenly appeared, she said

-"Aizen, did you think that a metal cube was enough to stop me?"- With that, both he and Lith disappeared, leaving Blaze, Orochimaru and Naraku vs Blake and Joana. She said to Blake

-"Fight Blaze... I'll take care of those two..."- He nodded, and dashed backward to get away from Joana (for safety). Blaze immediately reappeared in front of him.

-"Are you ready to become the Key?"-

-"Nope. I'm ready to kick your ass!!"-

-"We'll see about that..."-

Blaze dashed toward Blake to punch him, he dodged and started a long combo of punches on Blaze. Then, they started high speed combat, which Blake was able to keep up with. Blake kicked Blaze, sending him about 100 feet away. Blaze reappeared in front of Blake smiling, he dashed and tried to attack Blake from behind, but he countered with an elbow hit. Then, punched Blaze's stomach. Blaze fired a purple energy ball, the explosion sent both fighters away.

They dashed toward each other and started fighting hand to hand, and they were still even, Blake's 13 years of fighting were matching well against the millenniums Blaze had of experience. This time, Blaze sensed that Blake wasn't getting tired, and that his energy flow was more controlled.

-"I see... you have really trained this time... BUT..."-

-"But what?!!"-

-"It won't be enough to beat me..."- Blaze's red eyes glowed for a moment, and this time, Blake got the tip. Blaze punched him and Blake blocked with his arms in an X shape. Blaze definitely was using more power. Now all Blake was able to do was to block and perform a few counter attacks. Blaze started to laugh while punching and kicking

-"What happened?! You seemed happy about reaching this fighting level..."-

-"I'm not happy... and this isn't my full power..."-

-"You are at your limits right now... You aren't going to beat me with that power"-

-"Totally wrong... and... yeah... I'm not going to beat you... I'm going to KILL you!!"-

[Background Music: Nemesis Theory - Show no Tears http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bjzujfDrQ... ]

Blake transformed into his light state. His hair rose up and his eyes became golden. He dashed toward Blaze, punching him, disappearing, and connecting a knee hit on the back of his neck. While falling, Blake connected an impressive combo on Blaze, and right before he landed, Blake punched him, sending him downward, and creating a deep hole in the ground. Blaze quickly emerged from it and attacked Blake, but he was no longer there. A golden beam struck him from behind and Blake continued with a barrage of energy balls, each one hit their target. The continuous explosions created lots of smoke

Blaze was surprised to see lots of silhouettes, to his knowledge, Blake had not control over high leveled techniques. And much more to his surprise, a golden energy beam hit him from the left, and immediately was punched by Blake in the stomach. Blaze took the chance to fire a point blank energy beam at him but Blake dodged it, his hand glowed in pale golden light and punched Blaze with greater strength, sending him away out of sight. The smoke and dust dissipated and suddenly Blaze appeared a few meters in front of Blake

'That was no ordinary attack... that punch damaged slightly my soul... where the hell did he learn that attack? Abaddon... Azrael... bastards, I hate you so much...' Blaze thought, as he kept fighting Blake. They were definitvely roughly at the same level, Blake with the upper hand. He shot again a barrage of golden energy balls at Blaze

Blaze deflected an energy ball that nearly hit Blake, and started shooting lots of powerful purple beams, Blake then started to glow and his flaming aura surrounded his body*, he used his enhanced speed to dash toward Blaze, kick him upward, and connect a high speed combo while they were in air. Blake kicked Blaze downward but he managed to grab Blake's foot, so both of them fell to the ground. Blaze still took the worst part of the impact though. He wiped off the blood of his left lips corner, saying

-"It seems you can already use that light power properly... but as I told you, you won't be match for me!! Darkness engulfs all!!"-

They engaged again into high speed close combat, Blake was punching and kicking Blaze a lot, until Blake shot an energy ball, barely missing Blaze, but raising lots of dust and smoke due to the explosion. Blaze emerged from it and fired his own purple energy beams at Blake, he dodged them with no problem and used his high speed to disappear and quickly reappear behind Blaze, punching his back (to damage his vertebral spine). Then, he appeared in front of Blaze and with a swift move, he hit Blaze's nose upward with his hand and said

-"Destroy... ancient lights... erase the souls of the fallen ones..."-

Blake shot a gigantic pale golden beam, right into Blaze's mouth... The beam pierced through Blaze's head and enveloped all of his body, disintegrating it, his head burnt as well... then... there was nothing left except the ashes of what just some moments ago was Blake's nemesis...


*Blake's aura somewhat gives a hint of the power increasing he uses:

- When it's a golden gently flaming outward, the power Blake uses represents no problem and it means he can use it for long periods of time. Currently, the only stable output Blake can handle for long time is x3

-When it's still flaming, but more jagged and STILL outward, it means that Blake is using an increased amount of power, he still hasn't problem handling it but it will last significantly less than the previous output. Blake has this aura currently when multiplies his power to x5

-When the aura becomes even MORE jagged, electric-like and starts to flow upward, it means that Blake is forcing his power to more than he can handle. The more power he forces, the worse the side effects will be. When Blake reaches this status, his power gets a great boost, but at the cost of a short time to fight, dangerously lowered stamina, insanely high energy consumption just to mantain the aura, also, any damage he receives in this state is far worse than it should be. His muscles become extremely tight, his veins become more noticeable, his eyes glow, different from before when they were just golden colored. Currently, x7 and beyond make Blake go in this state.

The more Blake increases his energy, strength, and mastery, the more power multipliers he will be able to handle. Blake is still at a very early stage of the usage of this technique, though, it bears mentioning that at his very first light transformation when Blaze clones attacked, Blake's power was quickly drained by a x2 multiplying aura. However, at the time it was an unknown ability, and Blake had no knowledge of how it worked

Blaze was definitively against the ropes in this fight. He miscalculated Blake's real power. He started to shoot several purple beams as a distraction, and disappeared. A very powerful dark purple ball was charging in his hands, it was nearly black, and fired... It was an insane barrage of fire-like dark purple beams, Lith looked above and before she could form a barrier, Dark Blake appeared 5 feet below Blaze. He extended his hands and formed a small tornado around them, attracting all of the beams toward him. Lith opened her eyes wide and muttered

-"That's... the attack that killed 2 million angels 10,000 years ago...****"- She was going to scream because she thought Blake would die, but much to her surprise, Dark Blake was stopping all the beams that were to kill everyone. Blaze's red eyes also opened wide

-"Impossible..."- And more to his surprise, Dark Blake slowly absorbed them all. -"No human can use Kyushu..."- (It means absorption. Angels can only absorb light attacks which are weaker than themselves, with a few exceptions, while the demons can absorb nearly otherwise fatal dark attacks. Blaze used this when Ryan attacked him with darkness the night he attacked with hundreds of clones of himself)

Blaze was still in surprise when he realized Dark Blake was no longer there, and appeared behind him. He turned around in total shock

-"I lost sight of him... That was definitively no Shoshitsu*... it was... Rakurai...**"-

Dark Blake now had clearly gray skin (before, it was normal but with grayish tone) His fangs also were more noticeable. His claws were now black. He roared and attempted to attack Blaze, but he dodged the attack using Rakurai. He then heard a deep booming sound and Dar Blake appeared at his left, an energy ball was charging in his left wing and shot a powerful black beam at Blaze. There was a large explosion, and Blaze was burnt. His voice faltered

-"...This... is nonsense... this can't be happening... It doesn't matter how much others try to imitate a demon... there's no way someone besides a demon can use Yoruhane...***"-

Dark Blake extended both wings outward and they started to radiate a black fire-like aura. Suddenly, a barrage of countless beams was shot at Blaze, each blast hit him and they caused a larger explosion that shook the whole world. After the explosion, an immense pillar of black energy rose and lingered longer. Blaze was now laying on the ground and his eyes glowed in bright red because of the anger.

He flew toward Dark Blake but he got stabbed in the stomach instead, by Dark Blake, who swung it while it was stuck in Blaze, cutting him in two. Dark Blake fired more dark beams from his wings and Blaze was reduced to what seemed to be liquid ashes. They reformed and once again, Blaze was there. He shouted at Chaos

-"If you say that using demon techniques is low, then... why did you create a demon?!!"-













* Shoshitsu = Vanishing. The fast movement angels and some humans use. It has a swishing sound and it's simply to move so fast that one can't be seen. The speed depends on the user and how much energy they have, if the user is tired his shoshitsu ability will decrease.
** Rakurai = Lightning Strike. A fast movement exclusive of demons. It's faster than Shoshitsu and consumes no energy, so the speed depends merely on the user's own ability. This movement in difference of Shoshitsu, isn't ordinary. While Shoshitsu is simply a fast movement, Rakurai might be described as moving through space (not IN space) at high speed. Shoshitsu can be predicted by skilled users, but Rakurai is unpredictabe. Besides Abaddon and Azrael, Rakurai was a forbidden technique and any other angel who acquired this ability was banished. Lucifer created this technique and was its first user ever
*** Yoruhane = Night feather. Powerful dark concentrated beams fired from the user's wings. Apparently, a demon exclusive ability. Only high class demons can fire it from a single wing, as Blake just did...
**** Of course that the version that killed 2,000,000 angels was performed by a 5x times stronger Blaze, still, Ultimate Genocide quite packs a punch. Blaze is so far, the only one who can use it. Sorry for abusing of these notes...

By the way, I had these techniques in store but they were unnamed. I felt that simple self-explanatory names wouldn't fit, and, as cliché as it may be, I chose japanese. My native language is Spanish but I never thought it'd be cool for naming techniques... and if I were to use them then it would seem as copying Bleach... So, while these names might not be as good, it's the best I could think of. I'm open to suggestions on this topic

-"I have to ask, who are Abaddon, Chronos, Uriel and Raphael?"- Blake asked

-"They... they are my brothers..."- Lith answered -"Abaddon and Chronos were the first ones created by Chaos"-

-"Are all of them archangels?"- Karina said

-"In that time, there weren't called archangels. Archangels are the angels created by Chaos, currently there are very few ones. However they were the highest ranked ones. Abaddon and Chronos were given the command of the 2nd and 3rd Legions. I commanded the 4th myself, Uriel and Raphael commanded the 5th and 6th legions. By the time Lucifer betrayed us, I was a teenager... The First War lasted over 2,000 years, and Lucifer used his angels to fight us"-

-"I thought that Lucifer used demons to fight"- Joana said

-"Lucifer tried to defeat light with light. Abaddon fought him alone, until Chaos arrived and destroyed Lucifer's army. Then Lucifer and Chaos fought, and Chaos used dark powers to defeat him. He sealed Lucifer, and told us that only few ones can use darkness without corruption. He also congratulated Abaddon, who fought nearly evenly with him, a god. Then, he granted him the power of Death..."-

-"I thought death wasn't because of angels..."- Jak said

-"It didn't mean that. It meant, that Abaddon was given the power to destroy demon souls. He received a new armor, and what would be his signature weapon: His twin chained sickles. Their chains were embedded into his forearms, and could change their length at will. With those weapons, Abaddon could either drain energy, rip souls, destroy them or absorb them"-

-"I remember that Blaze said something like that... by the way... where was Blaze at all this?"- Blake said

-"All of this happened 100,000 years ago... Blaze hadn't been born yet..."- Lith said, and added -"Chaos also granted Chronos a gray suit, with a lighter gray cloak on. He gave him a staff and granted him the power of Time. Chaos said that nobody should travel to future, nor past. Chronos could see both, but couldn't do time travel, his time manipulation still allowed him to make everything but him slow, or to compress time in a place, making it so that while it was just a week in the rest of the world, in a certain place it would be from months to years.

He didn't grant special powers to the others, nor me. He said that all we needed was to rest and to train for the next years. 'Evil will always find a way to return' he said. Yet, he changed the schemes or our army, passing the command 1st Legion to Abaddon, and the 2nd to Chronos. Another angel took the 3rd Legion and Chaos himself created a new division: the Zero Legion.

This new division was smaller than the regular legions, and all of its members were very high leveled. Chaos reunited the strongest angels from all legions except for us, because he wanted us to command the other legions. Chaos was of course the commander, but in difference of the other legions, there was no vice-commander. Instead, Chaos kept a personal bodyguard, who had the second highest rank in all 7 legions... higher even than commanders themselves, only below Chaos himself"-

-"And you're gonna say that Blaze was that one, huh?"- Anthony said, seemingly, wasn't paying much attention. Karina kicked him, and Lith continued

-"It wasn't him. At that time, Chaos hadn't chosen one. He said that he'd have to wait. More years passed. Until a day, 48,000 years later, someone entered, and destroyed part of our home... He was a being we had never seen. His skin was black, and had dark gray hair. He introduced himself as Amon, he released Lucifer and an army of dark beings attacked us. Lucifer said that he'd come back and that he'd be the ruler of Universe. Nobody could pursue him because his army was giving us a hard time, then, Lucifer revealed that he had found the way to kill us, and so, created the demons, with the sole purpose of destroying us.

And so it began the Second War. It was far worse than the first one, and it lasted over 20,000 years. Chaos decided to do something and asked us to keep fighting, and he left. This last battle had been the worst one, we were fighting seemingly endless amounts of demons. Abaddon used extensively his soul destroying ability to help, and also, he absorbed many demon souls. He used their energy to recharge himself, and to keep fighting.

Chronos also used his power of time to kill many demons in short time. This war was so destructive that if it had been fought on Earth, it wouldn't have lasted. Still, the humans found out about our conflict..."-

-"That's right, many cultures mention something about a conflict in the heavens..."- Karina said, everyone else nodded, and Lith continued

-"Some people were able to perceive what happened here, also, the course of the war affected slightly Earth's weather, making it more rainy, dark, and frequent thunderstorms. While we defended Heaven with all we had, Abaddon fought Lucifer for a second time, but this time, Lucifer turned the tables when showed his new form, he abandoned all of his light powers, and turned himself into a demonic being. He thought that he'd win instantly, but since Abaddon also had gotten stronger and absorbed many demon souls, Lucifer still had a hard time, despite he had the upper hand this time

The sickles of Death gave Abaddon a great advantage, he managed to stab Lucifer with them, and proceeded to absorb Lucifer's energy. The continuous energy drain weakened him, and Abaddon then tried to kill him once for all, by ripping out his soul. Abaddon nearly succeeded but Lucifer's top demons attacked him and the sickles got out of Lucifer's body. Then, he tried to kill Abaddon when Chaos finally arrived, he had forged a weapon, from the combination of the purest light and darkness, a powerful sword to put an end to the war.

Chaos revealed the Sword of the Heavens, and with it, he sealed away all of Lucifer's army. Lucifer managed to escape, and swore revenge. Some time later, he came back with a new army of demons and modified his own sword, formerly called the Silvermoon Blade, into a sword of corrupted darkness. The Blade of Destruction. Its power equaled that of Chaos' sword, and he attacked Heaven again, this time, Chaos fought him in a remote place, and they ended up killing each other..."-

Lith's voice faltered when said that, and paused for a moment. Her tone evidenced her sadness

'I'm not into nails nor hands...'

'Neither am I. But I'm sure you'll get your reward...' Blake's darkness answered

'You perv...'

'Heh...' Blake's darkness laughed

'So you took over?!! How?!! I didn't even call your powers!!'

'I told you... ever since you've been with her, I was finally unleashed, and the more you're near her, the more freedom I'll get... Paradoxically, she also harms me when I'm outside...'

'You don't know how much I hate you right now...'

'THIS wouldn't happen if you had been like any other person and let me be free from the beginning!! But nooo, you HAD to be cold, to bind me and throw me in the deepest and darkest part of your soul... expecting that I'd never come back... and what's more? You actually need me!!'

'If I master the light, not anymore. So as long I can get over this, you can kiss goodbye your freedom because I'm going to kill you, bind you, kill you a second time, chain you, burn you with fire and acid, and then throw you to the deepest and darkest part of my soul...and close the door!!!'

Blake's dark side scowled and seemingly, went away. Blake sighed, and noticed that while he was cursing his dark side, he had already done 3 of Joana's nails, and came to realize that they were painted black

-"Uh... what's going on here?"-

-"What?"-

-"Why are your nails black, did you just become goth or something?"-

-"No, but a little birdie told me that you like black..."- Joana answered playfully

-"...Ermmm... whoever that little birdie is, doesn't know me... I like black in clothing and most of things... but in this... I'd prefer your nails unpainted**..."-

-"Well... it's not like they will remain like this forever..."- Joana said, realizing that Blake was being honest, though she couldn't understand it too well

-"Alright..."- Blake sighed and finished the last two nails. Joana briefly checked them, and hugged him tightly. Blake blushed more than normally, and more when Joana gave him a big and long kiss....


*Despite the damage was done to the spare body and spare organs, they need time to heal back, in the mean time, Blake isn't getting out of his real body...
** Actually, that is a real trait of myself, for some reason, I don't like that much painted nails, lipstick, makeup, or high heels in Joana. I know it's weird, but I prefer natural beauty, and with that I don't mean that I don't like hygiene. Let's just say that I prefer Joana's everyday look rather than her formal/party one

Some minutes ago...

Blake was done painting Joana's nails, and before she said anything, Blake said

-"Alright, that's over... but listen to me, I am NOT painting your toe nails..."- He was telling that to both her and his inner darkness, Joana just giggled, then she grabbed him and kissed him. She then said softly

-"I know... but now, how about spending a bit more of time with your favorite girl?"-

Blake blushed, but tried to hide it, though Joana had obviously seen it. Then Jasmine came in, with Jak. She said

-"Wanna play hide and seek?"- Joana nodded immediately, and grabbed Blake, who was already facepalming himself.

-"Well, you know how it is, just like the last time..."- Jasmine said, and Joana grabbed Blake to place him between her breasts

-"Another wave of deja vu... I wonder..."- Blake mumbled

The girls closed their eyes and started to count, immediately, Jak flew out of his girlfriend's cleavage while Blake jumped out of Joana's*. Then both guys ran under a drawer, and following their previous hide-and-seek game experience, they climbed up from the inside, so it would be harder for the girls to find them (I don't mean that they got INSIDE the drawer, they got into a small space which is under the drawer but above the floor... I hope this is clear)

-"Don't ever use those words in that order EVER again... Now, thanks to you, I'll have nightmares on top of my insomnia..."-

-"The funny thing is that the only one whom you didn't give a 'cough' was Tabitha..."-

-"If you changed species, I guess you'd act weird as well..."- Blake said, and Jak's face froze on some unknown thought, Blake said

-"I know... I won't say that ever again... Nightmare fuel..."-






*I know it might get old, but Blake hasn't learned to fly yet. However, given Blake's development, I think it's necessary to remind it. Anyway... Joana can't fly yet either...

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Zenn stood in the last room of his hunt. Jaxx's room. He knew he was going to kill Jaxx this time. He was not going to another dimension. Jaxx stood, just as creepy looking as always. Zenn slowly formed his blades in the air and grabbed them. They were pretty long. If he pointed them straight down they would be only millimeters away from the floor.

"Zenn... How nice of you to drop by for a visit." Came Jaxx's voice omninously. "Where should I send you this time?"

"Not this time Jaxx. This time I put you where you belong." Zenn said and began his charge. Jaxx just tied him in black flaming ropes. Zenn fought and tried to break out but to no avail.

"You are almost ready. One more and you can destroy him." Jaxx said to him and opened a portal. He broke the ropes and hit him with an odd beam. He then kicked him in the chest and sent him into the portal. "Soon Zenn. Soon it will be your time."

Zenn's vision went from that if a dark omninous room to a girls bedroom. Just really big. He was about 3 feet above the ground. But to his shrunken self, it was a long fall. He hit the bed and bounced onto a bar, then started falling again. A platform formed under him and he rode gently to the ground. He saw Joana and Jasmine searching for their boyfriends and immediately sprinted under the bed. He started mumbling strings of curses with Jaxx peppered into them. Then he saw a movement under the dresser. It was a foot from a person his size. Then a foot from the huge person came into a view. He jumped and dug his blades into the bed and held them for dear life. Jasmine stuck her face under and he went into complete silence. She pulled away, not noticing anything. He decided the best thing would be to keep together with the other two. He sprinted over to the dresser unnoticed. Jak and Blake both looked at him with a face of surprise.

Jak dropped down and went into the open to call to the girls. He got their attention and Zenn jumped into action. He roundhouse kicks Blake and sprints over to the other side of the dresser. He begins flamestepping and jams the blades into the back of the dresser. He then, once again, held on for dear life. By the time Blake got up from his surprise attack and Jak pointed to where he was it was as if he had disappeared. The four began to search for him and after about 10 minutes, Joana saw him hanging. For about two seconds they just looked at eachother. Zenn, with a look of terror, and Joana with a look that she wanted to be a kind smile. Zenn took it as a look of laughter, like she was going to eat him. Zenn and Joana broke out of their staring contest at the same moment. Joana telling everyone she found him, and Zenn jumping across to the wall and preparing to fight.

He launched himself across the gap and slashed Joana's chin. He then kicked off and ran across the dresser. Everyone began heading towards Joana. Zenn was hiding under a piece of paper, and cowering, knowing he was going to be killed. Joana had lost him, and began looking for him again saying "He has to be up here." after a bit a pair of huge hands with painted red fingernails picked up the paper. The other hand wrapped around him before the sword formed. Zenn was now captured.
