1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Who is this guy?

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
-"Alright, let's go straight to the point, who are you and why are you here?"- Blake said, slightly angry

-"Why should I tell you?"- Zenn answered

-"I'll show you why..."- Blake clenched his fists and Jak stopped him, he asked

-"Well, what has been this for?"-

-"Just defended myself from those giant monsters... Not that I have to tell you anything..."-

-"That's it!!"- Blake shouted angrily

-"Wait... shouldn't we... uhh... solve this without fighting?"- Jak was trying to stop Blake, but he answered very seriously

-"I don't think he's gonna answer us nicely... and he has burnt MY girlfriend... that's something I won't forget..."- Blake said firmly, Jak then replied

-"I'm fighting too"-

-"I hope this doesn't sound selfish, but I don't like fighting two on one... if I'm on the 'two' side... and what's more, I'll tell you in less than 5 minutes how tough he is..."-

Jak could almost feel the fire in Blake's look and words, and let him go... though he was confused by what Blake said... less than 5 minutes... he would tell the guy's strength...

Zenn had turned around and walked away, just to feel an impact on his left side, which sent him away (several feet to them, though in real scale, just some inches), he almost crashed into the wall if it he hadn't used his fire platforms again.

[Background Music: Helloween - Deliver us from temptation http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ssI-6Jwwu... ]


He turned quickly to see what hit him... It was a guy, the dark skinned and black haired one. This guy was wearing a brown leather jacket*, a black shirt under it, and black tennis shoes. And it was obvious that it was no accident, Zenn knew that the hit he received demonstrated that he was no ordinary person, and so, he prepared to fight, forming two fire swords in his hands

Blake took his jacket off and threw it a good distance away, without saying anything, he charged at Zenn, and punched him in the stomach, however, Zenn didn't even move an inch. Blake had very little time to react before he got cut by one of Zenn's fire blades.

'It seems it was just a lucky hit... though, he's definitively stronger than average...' Zenn thought, and dashed toward Blake, in the last moment, Blake dodged him, and connected a punch in Zenn's face, though, it didn't hurt him, and Zenn punched Blake back, sending him away (again, several feet to them...). Blake quickly got up and brushed off the dust from his shirt. Then, he seemingly concentrated on something, his hair rose up, his eyes changed to golden and was surrounded by a golden fire-like aura. Zenn was slightly surprised, though he didn't show it. Both guys dashed at each other, and there was a quick exchange of attacks, after it, Zenn was still unharmed, while a wound opened in Blake's left shoulder... not a very deep one.

Blake then dashed and pretended to punch Zenn, who prepared to block, and much to his surprise, Blake kicked him in the stomach, then, took advantage of breaking his defense, and connected a long (but fast) combo which sent Zenn upward with a kick. Zenn braked** with his flame stepping platforms, and when he realized, Blake was slightly above him, and punched him downward, this time, crashing into the floor. He got up, and wiped off a small bit of blood from his right lips' corner. He mumbled

-"That almost hurt..."-

Then he jumped (again, taking impulse on his fire platforms) and slashed at Blake, who blocked, but got his forearms burnt (superficially, still painful). Blake then landed, and said

-"As I said, Jak... I'll tell you how tough this guy is... by fighting at his level..."-

Then he started to glow into a more intense aura, this time, the wind around him swirled and the aura flowed faster. His eyes glowed in golden for a while, then, he disappeared... Zenn didn't know what happened, and found out the hard way... getting hit in the stomach, the chest, the chin, and the back of his neck in an insanely quick combo... he slashed at Blake, this time, cutting him in the right cheek. Zenn noticed Blake's scar in the eye in the brief moments he was in close combat, and knew that this guy was used to fighting...

Outside, Joana sensed Blake's energy changing, and knew that he was fighting. She rushed inside the room and Jasmine followed her, and watched Blake powering up. Joana didn't want him to fight because he hadn't recovered from heavy damage and a heart attack... but Jak flew in front of her, and Jasmine stopped her arms. Jak said, seriously

-"I may not agree with what Blake is doing... but he's doing it for you. I didn't know he was that serious when it was about you... so, at least let him do this..."-

-"And you said he didn't care that much about you"- Jasmine said

-"He does... but not in the way I'd like..."- Joana said and sighed. They walked outside, and only Jak stayed in the room. Blake and Zenn were too focused in their fight to notice what happened... and speaking of that, let's go back to the fight...

Zenn stepped back a good distance using his fire platforms and again, Blake appeared behind him, about to connect a kick, but Zenn countered and thrusted one of his blades in Blake's calf. Then he slashed Blake in the chest, both cutting and burning him, and sent him down with a downward kick. Both guys fell, Zenn landing with his feet on Blake's chest, and tried to stab Blake with his fire sword blades. Much to his surprise, Blake stopped them with his bare hands and pushed him off.

Zenn threw his fire blades at Blake, who dodged them but got hit by another pair that Zenn threw while he was dodging. Then he added a fire beam, which hit Blake and created a small explosion. After the smoke and dust vanished, Blake stood, though burnt and bleeding. His hand glowed and his wounds glowed in golden, and stopped bleeding. Jak and Zenn were surprised by this technique, but Joana knew the truth (yes, she's judging Blake's moves by feeling his energy flow's changes and this tells her that Blake isn't healing)

'He's not healing... he's...patching his body? what kind of trick is that? Energy patches***?' Joana wondered

Blake extended his hand and said

-"Sunlight shards... pieces of heaven... made into knives, piercing the enemy..."- A golden circle made of energy light appeared in front of Blake's hand and shot 7 knives made of light at Zenn, who had barely time to dodge most of them, though 3 of the 7 blades struck him on the shoulders and his thigh. Blake again appeared suddenly before him and aiming his hand at him, shot at point blank 7 more blades (I know, he didn't repeat the incantation, somehow, Blake mainatined the spell to perform it a second time without repeating the incantation... this is a sign of development on light arts)

However, Zenn blocked them crossing his two fire swords, and meanwhile, Blake took from the floor two of the light blades that missed, and said

-"I know your trick... I can pull it off too..."-

And so, they started to fight, each one using their blades, light against fire... a bit paradoxical... Zenn moved really fast by using his fire platforms instead of standing on the floor, and could keep up with Blake's speed, and kept exchanging slashes, until, after Blake blocked Zenn's fire blades, his own light blades broke into pieces (They weren't mean to be used for melee fighting in the first place... Just another improvisation of Blake...) Blake had an 'Damn it...' look, and Zenn sank his fire blades into Blake's shoulders

Blake then, while still having the blade stuck into his shoulders, punched Zenn in the stomach, who, given the situation, couldn't block. Blake kicked him in the stomach with such force that sent him away and got the blades off. Zenn thought 'If this is his true power, I'll have to fight him with all my strength...' Then he jumped up so Blake followed him, and while air fighting, realized that Blake's disappearing was because of extreme speeds... He came to a logical conclusion, and when Blake kicked him in the face, he stuck his two fire blades into Blake's right calf, and quickly forming another pair, stuck them into Blake's right thigh, with a third pair, he managed to cut a deep wound in Blake's leg, and when they fell down, Blake crashed into the ground.

-"You are stronger than I thought, but I don't have time for this... if you value your life you should retreat"- Zenn's fire blades vanished and he walked away. But suddenly, the wind changed and Blake stood (limping) in front of him. He took out the 4 fire blades stuck in his leg and said

-"Actually, I don't value my life..."- He disappeared and reappeared right before him, and Zenn had little time to dodge the incoming punch. He dashed back and reformed his fire blades

-"And I was starting to think you were a warrior... it seems that you are just a reckless troublemaker"-

Blake and Zenn stood in guard stances before each other...


*Maybe I forgot to mention, but Blake never wears his jackets closed.
**Not completely sure of how it's said/written correctly... a conjugator in Internet conjugated brake as a verb...
***Yeah, an improvised technique... Without mastery over darkness, Blake lacks the demonic healing factor, at least while he isn't under his darkness' control. Maybe next time Blake should stick to bandages or duck tape?
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Blake vs Zenn... Part I

choices: -"So... what do we do with the new guy?"- Jak asked
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Blake disappeared and attempted to attack Zenn from behind, but he used his fire platforms to dodge him quickly, and slashed at Blake's already damaged leg. Still, Blake disappeared again and connected a punch in Zenn's chin, he shot a fire ball to counter him, then he said, forming again his fire blades

-"I didn't think you'd move like that with just one leg..."-

-"There are alot of things you don't know about me..."- Blake then extended his hand, and a sword came from who-knows-where into his hand. The sword was none other than the sword Lith gave him, though, it shrank to a proper size for Blake... well... not that proper... but at least is small enough to be wielded... it looks like this: http://www.tantra.ph/mudha/images/nikrat...

-"Hmph... you plan to use a metal sword against fire? You are either stupid or crazy, or maybe both..."- Both guys dashed at each other, ad Zenn thought he'd melt Blake's sword easily. The metal clashed againt the fire, but didn't show any sign of melting. Zenn's fire blades, which were orange/red changed to blue, as he increased his own fire's heat. Blake was keeping up against the two fire blades, though their increased heat damaged his hands and arms, even if he shielded with his wide sword.

Jak observed the fight. he was surprised by Blake's level, and because he was fighting with just one leg and severe wounds...

'Is his real body that stronger than the spare one? Or is this the result of that mysterious training? Maybe it's both...' Jak thought as he saw Blake and Zenn fighting with a lot of mid-air attacks.

Blake tried to punch Zenn, but he stepped back quickly, and when he realized, it seemed that Blake had already planned his next move... While Zenn was dodging, Blake had risen up his sword and struck the floor with great strength, cracking it, and making a small quake*, which knocked Zenn off his feet. Blake appeared in front of him and landed a punch on his face, sinking him into the hard floor. Zenn kicked him and jumped by using his fire platforms to take impulse. He stood high in the air (well... about 2 real meters... though to them it was a lot more...) and when Blake appeared behind him to attack, Zenn dodged him and countered, kicking him upward. He saw how Blake was falling down, and realized of something

'He's... falling? Is this a trick?' Zenn thought

Blake manaed to land safely... well... somewhat... Zenn then realized that Blake was not able to fly, nor had any other way to move in air other than jumping (Well, Zenn can't fly either... but his fire platforms are just as good) He used again impulse on his platforms to descend quickly and attempted to attack Blake, who blocked with his sword, though he still felt his hands burning due to the intense heat. Blake fired a golden energy beam at him, hurling him againt the wall, and cracking it.

Zenn wasn't expecting that, and quickly climbed up (using his blades as alpenstock/ice axes... I'm not totally sure how are those tools called) to dodge a barrage of energy balls. He jumped from the wall and stopped mid air with the fire platforms once more, and Blake attacked him, he connected several punches and with a kick, he tok impulse into the wall, and from there, he jumped again toward Zenn, who already knew what he was going to do, and stuck his fire blades into Blake's shoulders right before Blake punched him. Zenn kicked him downward and shot a fire wave from his hands.

However, Blake countered it with a light energy ball, creating a moderate (to them) explosion. Then, Blake again disappeared and attacked Zen with a kick, this time, Zenn countered with a kick as well, and the force of that impact sent them both away in opposite directions. Zenn quickly got up, while Blake was having a hard time. Seeing him struggling to get up, Zenn sighed and turned around, his fire blades vanished and started to walk away

Blake said angrily

-"This is NOT over yet!!"-

-"This was over before it started..."- Zenn said, not turning around, and still walking away. Blake then clenched his fists and managed to stand up, and felt that his damaged leg was getting healed. He heard a voice inside his mind

'You owe me a big one more' Blake's inner darkness** said

'I don't care...' Blake answered in his thought

'Well, I'm gonna have fun later...'

Blake then started to power up, his aura changed from flowing outward to upward, it became a lot more jagged, and instead of fire-lke, it became more electric-like. Also, Blake's body bulked up a bit, and the muscles tightened a lot. Blake's hair became slightly more spiked, though it still pointed upward. Also, his eyes glowed in golden intensely. Then, he dashed toward Zenn with full speed, punching him in the back with tremendous force, sending him against another wall, and crashing against it, this time, not only he cracked it, but sank a bit into it. He quickly formed his fire blades and didn't see Blake anywhere, then, he felt a lot of sudden punches and Blake was barely visible. Zenn managed to catch Blake's fist and with this temporary stop, he managed to get out of the (now damaged, though not really much in real size's view) wall.

'Where does this energy come from?!! He was barely able to stand up!!' Zenn thought, while dashing backward. Much to his surprise, Blake was in front of him and then appeared behind him, he connected a long combo by punching him from the front and from behind, Blake sent him upward with a punch and fired a wide two-handed golden beam at him. The explosion was considerable (grenade-like to normal scale, mostly like the weakest grenade). Zenn was standing on his fire platforms on the air, his swords crossed, in an attempt to block the beam. He looked at Blake and said

-"This makes no sense... if you were this strong then you were just playing the whole time..."-

-"Heh..."- Blake gave an evil smile, and Zenn saw, surprised, a strange ghostly silhouette surrounding Blake. The silhouette looked like Blake, but his hair was waving continuously upward, and it seemed that his skin was darker. Zenn could feel the darkness in him, and added

-"I see your hypocrisy..."-

-"Huh?"- Blake and Jak were surprised aat the same time

-"You apparently fight with light powers, but your heart is dark..."- Zenn replied, and inside Blake's mind, Blake's darkness smiled, then said

'Don't pay attention to him, KILL HIM!!!'

Blake seemingly didn't hear him, but rushed to attack Zenn, (without sword, in case you wonder), delivering powerful blows that made the room tremble (again, only to Jak, Blake and Zenn), and Zenn had a hard time blocking them, he was surprised at Blake punching his fire blades without feeling any pain.

'What did he mean? How does he know? Maybe Blake is right and this guy is up to no good...' Jak thought while (still) watching the fight.

Blake and Zenn kept exchanging attacks at insane speeds, but this time Zenn was the one against the ropes, his only chance was to take advantage on Blake's inability to fly. And he still made up for that with extreme speeds and incredible mid air fighting. Zenn slashed several wounds ion him but Blake didn't even flinch. Then, after dodging several attacks, Zenn got smashed downward by Blake. He quickly landed on the sloor and dashed to attack once more, but he stopped suddenly, his hair regained its normal shape, and fell to the floor.

Zenn, who was now heavily damaged, walked away, but got kicked by Jak, who was transformed in his Omega form, Zenn thought

'If this guy is as strong as the other one... I have no chance of winning...'

But before any of them did anything, Joana and Jasmine rushed inside the room. Joana gasped when saw Blake's unconscious and really damaged body. Then she gave Zenn an angry glare, and when he realized, a transparent white-ish energy sphere was surrounding him. He tried to break it with his fire swords but he found that they couldn't even pierce the force field. Then he prepared to burn it, and Jasmine said

-"I wouldn't do that if I were you... unless you want to become your own BBQ..."-

Meanwhile, Joana grabbed Blake and felt that he wasn't breathing, and after placing him near her ear, she realized that his heart wasn't beating, and very worried, she healed Blake with as much energy as she could. Blake's body got healed but remained unconscious... and yeah... Blake just had another heart attack... which happened because Blake didn't do as the doctor Powerman said, so, the moral here is: Kids, don't fight with super powers when a doctor tells you that they caused you a heart attack...






*Actually, since they're 2 inches tall, the cracks aren't a big deal to repair... And nobody else other than Blake, Jak and Zenn would have felt the quake...
** I've got some mails from readers asking about this guy's proper name... well, to be honest, it hasn't one... he calls himself Demon Blake, but it's more accurate to call him the darkness inside Blake's soul... or Blake's inner darkness... Dark Blake is partially him, though this term is applied when Blake is taken over by the darkness... also, his personality goes from wild to somewhat controlled... and by the way, Blake calls him a jerk most of the time...

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"I don't know," Jasmine said.
"Well, we can't let him get away." Jak said.

Zenn felt his power kick in and watched the ground recede from his view. He charged him, but felt himself teleport to Jaxx's tower. "Zenn. Good to see you're alive. But, you look a bit shaken, maybe by the children?" came Jaxx's voice with it's usual arrogance.

"Jaxx. Too bad something didn't kill you while I was gone. And you look as much like a freak of nature as you did before. But, enough talk, this time I will kill you." Said Zenn in his own voice. They both took their charge at the same moment, Zenn, with twin fireballs by his sides. Jaxx met him in the same fashion fireballs colliding in a bang and each matching eachothers slashes. Soon, Zenn got the upper hand. Jaxx shoved him away and began one of his rolling barrages*, as he had done many times before. But as he rolled, Zenn formed a platform, which he rolled into. On his back, Jaxx took a few cuts before teleporting in a sizzle of dark fire, he came back behind Zenn, who connected a roundhouse kick like the one he gave to Blake. Jaxx teleported away and began to use a spell with an incantation. "Dark torches of the night, burn me a shield. Block out the light!" he began to be surrounded by dark fire which molded into his shape. Zenn hit him with a beam and it just was absorbed into the shield. He then formed blades and they fought, Jaxx in a beserk mode, while Zenn was stuck in a defensive state. It stated like that until Zenn began thinking, "If I make an incantation, will it work" he began mulling it over in his head, thinking of something to say. "Spirits of fire and light, burn through the night!" a massive beam shot out of Zenn's hand, destroying the shield. Both fell to the ground, Zenn, out of energy, Jaxx, wounded by the thing that had drained Zenn.

"Zenn, I have watched you grow in power, but you have never messed me up like this. I can't help you anymore. The next time I see you will be my last. Go with Blake, Jak and Ryan. They will help you. Once I'm gone, you will face something more powerful than you can imagine. Don't fail me."

-"At least I lasted more than your 30 seconds..."- Jak crossed his arms, in a hero-like pose

-"Actually, you lasted 29 seconds..."- Jasmine said, showing him a watch

-"Wha?!!"- Blake and Jak exclaimed, if they weren't in their girlfriends' cleavages, they'd have fallen face-first to the floor in disbelief...

-"I have the slight feeling that this stopped being a training season..."- Blake said, sarcastically
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Jak wasn't done either!

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"It was fun," Jak said. "Training session turned into a play session..."

"It was ok..." Blake said.

We now go back to the sneaky, yet powerful trio of Seth, Blaze and Nostory.

"It doesn't make sense..." Nostory said. "Jak wasn't ever supposed to have powers. Where did they come from?"

"Hm." Blaze was thinking. "It couldn't have come from Omega 17."

"I seriously doubt that." Nostory said. "It's a light element. And everyone has their dark sides..."

"That's right." Blaze said. "I don't know if that form has a kink, but if it does, Jak would have been experincing the same uncontrollable darkness that Blake had."

"It's not that at all." Nostory said. "From what you told us, Blake had a rough past, which is all the more reason for him to have a dark side. And in Jak's case, he was always optimistc about everything, and he's never mad."

"But like you said," Blaze said. "Everyone has their dark sides, no matter who they are. I don't know when Jak might show it, but he will eventually. Jasmine, does she have a dark sid- Never mind. I almost forgot about Yasmin,"
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: A talk about Jak's dark side.

choices: Lith shows some more things nobody knew...
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
After a while, back to the 2 couples...

Jasmine and Jak had gone to their room to have their clothes changed (specially Jak's...). Despite he was a bit embarrassed because his girlfriend saw him changing clothes, he didn't care as much and made it quick. They went to Joana's room but didn't knock, and just opened the door. Joana and Blake were startled by it, and Jasmine and Jak noticed Blake hadn't put his shirt on, then they noticed many scars and marks in Blake's chest, and when he turned around to get his shirt, they also saw scars in his back. Jasmine and Jak gasped, so far, they had only seen Blake's scar in the eye and some small scars in his arms...

-"That was rather uncomfortable... let's pretend it never happened..."- Blake said after putting a white shirt and a black jacket on (Lith gave Joana's several spare clothing for shrunken Blake, and this one looked just like his spare body's outfit, although he's in his original body right now)

-"B...Blake..."- Jak was a bit shocked, but Jasmine was more, and she said

-"That guy... Blaze... did he do all that to you?!"-

-"He might, but nope... after our first fight, Karina enhanced my body with some of her experiments to make me more durable... thus, I haven't gotten a scar afterwards... this is from before... These were my own fault... each one is a mark of each thing I've done wrong..."-

-"Uh..."- Jasmine didn't quite know what to say, she felt Blake wasn't happy about them, Jak nudged her, reminding her that she should ask him herself -"...But...how did you get so much wounds?! Where were your parents*?!"-

-"It's a bit complicated to explain..."- Blake didn't trust Jasmine as much as Jak, and didn't want to tell what he told Joana some days before, however, before he said anything else, Lith appeared. This time the guys weren't that surprised, and even Blake said nothing about it

-"I can help"- She said

-"I guess you're going to tell them... I guess you've seen it yourself..."- Blake said, and Lith denied with her head

-"Sometimes, words aren't enough. I'll show you all what happened..."-

-"HUH?!"- Blake got it faster than the rest, she was going to show them how things happened, and they'd seen themselves. Blake added -"But... it isn't right!! They don't really want to know!!"- Blake wouldn't have minded as much as if just Joana saw it, and Lith, reading his thoughts, said

-"Try to open your heart a little... do you still think you can't trust them?"- Jasmine and Jak stared shocked at Blake (Jasmine had been previously afraid of Blake's dark form, but after speaking with Joana and seeing how he was outside battle, she got a better image of him). Blake froze, and felt like petrifying and cracking, he muttered

-"You mustn't say such things!!"-

-"It's alright... they know that things haven't been nice for you... And both of them are your friends..."- Lith answered

-"I...uh...."- Blake only considered Jak as a friend of his, Jasmine was more of a friend of Joana's, and the sudden interest in him made it wall weirder. -"We won't gain anything from seeing my past again..."-

-"It will help. You'll find out later..."- Lith said, and after aiming her hand to somewhere in the middle of the room, a rectangle made (more like rectangle-like, it flowed like some sort of flame) of golden light appeared. It showed first Blake some days after birth (NOT naked), as soon as Blake noticed that, he started waving his hands, trying to fan away the olden screen thing

-"THAT'S TOO EARLY!!!"- He shouted

Jak laughed a bit, and both Joana and Jasmine thought baby Blake was cute (I know most of babies are born bald, but that was not my case... strange as it may sound, Blake was born with black and wavy shoulder-length hair already...). Lith also laughed, but quickly changed to a more serious expression, and the image focused on people who they didn't know. All of them were caucasian, there was a middle aged man with black hair, two younger men with brown and black hair, a blond one, as well as a blonde woman, and another black haired woman...all of them looked disdainfully at him from another room. They also noticed that Blake's father was sitting next to his crib...

-"Who are they?"- Nor Joana nor Jasmine or Jak knew. However, Blake clenched his fists when he saw them. Lith said

-"Those people... are Blake's family... from his mother's side..."-

-"But... why do they look so mad about Blake?"- Joana asked. Lith said 'Shhh' and they heard their voices**...

-"What are you waiting for?!! That child must not live!!"- Said a young man (In his early 20's) with brown hair

-"We can't do much if his father is here..."- The middle aged man answered

-"How long will you allow him to live, Father? Until he grows enough to kill us instead?!"- The blond man said

-"Patience, my sons... One day, he will be alone, and then, he'll die..."-

-"He's nothing more than a dishonor to our family, just think about it, an impure among us!!"- A blonde woman who looked to be in her late 20's said

-"But our father is right... If we try to kill him now, the child's father will oppose resistance..."- A thin woman, in her early 30's said, she had short black hair

-"We can take him on!! We're 7, he's just one!!"- The brown haired man answered

-"We can leave no evidence..."- The middle aged man said -"I know, that the child is not one of us, and that he will become a threat in the future... but he need to wait for the right moment..."-

-"I've had it, father!! It's been 8 days and he's still alive!!"- The brown haired man said, and grabbed a knife. He walked into the room where Blake was and attempted to kill him, just to be stopped by James, who shouted angrily

-"What the hell do you think you're doing?!!"-

-"This is the end, James, you and your son won't live to see the end of this day!!"- They started to fight, exchanging punches and kicks, and James kicked him out of the room, trying to minimize the violence Blake had to watch. Soon, the brown haired man got up and tried to stab James, but he stopped his hand, and the other men and women intervened, stopping their brother, and the middle aged man muttered

-"Are you stupid or what?! Now he knows!!"-

-"I DON'T care... I know what's going to happen, you'll let that child live, and one day he will return, and we will no longer be able to stop him... It'll be our doom..."-

-"Shut up!!"- The blonde woman said to him

-"I can see it happening... You will regret not killing him when you had the chance!!"- They dragged the brown haired man out, and all of them left... James was a bit nervous as well, and held Blake in his arms...

-"Blake..."- Joana said, and noticed Blake had closed his eyes, and clenched his fists

-"That's just wrong... 2 days old?"- Jak was really surprised at this, and felt that the understanding he had about Blake wasn't anywhere the real problem's depth... it was less than the tip f the iceberg

-"That's not all"- Lith said, and showed more things, such as that before that day, Blake was left alone (until night, when James came from work), and nobody went to feed him nor calm his cries. By the second day, Blake stopped crying...

-"But... if he wasn't fed... how is he alive? I know babies need a lot of care, specially in their first days... Lith sighed sadly, and said

-"As the people you saw, Blake's mother hated him as well... that's something Blake knows for a long time, and hadn't told to any of you..."-

-"It's not like I needed a mother at all... I'm alive, so, I did well..."- Blake said, and tried to stop Lith from showing ore of his past -"Can you stop showing what happened when I was a baby?!"- He then whispered to Lith -"It's too personal and embarrassing!!"-

-"It is necessary... I know that you would never tell this yourself..."- Lith said

-"But who gave you the right to do so?! I know you're a goddess but not even you have right to show things like these to others!!"- Blake didn't noticed, but it hurt Joana, Jak and Jasmine a bit (The fact that Blake apparently classified as the same as anyone... in the sense that Blake didn't want them to learn about him...)

However, Lith's answer was a much more serious one -"I'll show you why I have the right... Not because I'm a goddess..."-







*Although Jasmine knew Blake's father was dead, she knew nothing about the rest of his family, thus, assumed his mother was dead or something...
** Blake's mother's family used to speak in Spanish whenever it was a serious discussion between themselves. In this memory, Lith used some of her godly powers to change it so they heard their voices in english... don't ask how...
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Lith shows Blake's story to joana, Jak and Jasmine

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The image showed Blake as a baby again, laying down in his crib, but no longer crying, as he understood nobody was going to pay attention to him...

-"Since your biological mother hated you, I had to take matters into my own hands..."- Lith said, and they watched Lith appearing in Blake's room

-"Wait a minute!! That has to be fake!!"- Blake said -"How come nobody noticed the green haired woman in my room?!!"-

-"They couldn't see me. I can make it so I can only be seen by whom I want to"- Lith replied. Blake, as well as Joana, Jak and Jasmine were confused about her presence in Blake's room. Blake crossed his arms and said

-"Well, you appeared when I was a baby, so what?! That doesn't give you right to anything..." Blake said, and remained silent to see what would Lith do at such an early time...

Blake was, as said, laying in his crib, and was very pale and looked weakened. He hadn't been fed since he was born (And by this time, James thought his wife would normalize and take care of Blake as a mother would... or should do...). Lith took him in her arms, and Blake, strangely in a non-naive lapsus, realized what was next, and said

-"ALRIGHT!!! THAT'S ENOUGH!!"- Lith stopped showing what was next, and Blake sighed -"But that's quite absurd... I mean... you...did... me... you..."-

-"Why Blake is so mad?"- Joana asked, and Lith whispered to them, despite Blake was desperately trying to cover her mouth, she held him away easily. Then they opened their eyes wide for a moment, and Blake facepalmed himself

-"This has to be the most embarrassing moment of my life ever... I hate myself..."- He sighed and added -"Before you ask anything, I did NOT know... if I were aware at that time I wouldn't have freakin' let her to!!"-

-"I don't see what's wrong, Blake... she fed you because your mother wouldn't..."- Joana said

-"But she's NOT my mother... I have no mother... And that makes everything weirder... a human baby fed by a supernatural being... Mind blow anyone?"- Blake answered

-"Someone had to do it..."- Lith said, and Blake replied

-"There's a little something called "adoption"..."-

-"Blake, I have unknown powers, and Jasmine is the reincarnation of a goddess... it doesn't really disturb us..."- Jak said

-"I think it was cute. It means you do have a mom!! How many people can say a goddess is their mom?"- Jasmine said, trying to cheer Blake up

-"Pretty much all religions*..."- Blake answered -"Maybe she fed me when I was a baby, but I still have no mother..."-

-"That's why I took care of you... However, many things forced me to hold back from fully helping you... But I always watched over you..."-

-"Whatever..."- Blake said, who felt rather humiliated, and Lith resumed showing Blake's past...

Now, the screen-like thing showed a now 4 years old Blake, who was all the time with James, his father, because he knew the true intentions of his wife and her family. He wasn't a normal child, but was far from the lonely and traumatized guy he'd be. At least when he was with his father, Blake was, if not happy, very close to it. However, his mother's family kept speaking, and Lith showed them one day, that Blake was with his father at his work...

-"See? It's been nearly 5 years!! And what have you done, nothing!!"- The brown haired man said

-"I agree with him this time, Father... if you give him more time, he'll be able to at least escape, and he will come back..."- The blond man said

-"I had Lilith** watching the whole time, but James doesn't leave his child alone for a single second. Even when he sleeps, he wakes up easily at the minimal sound... I didn't want to make a mess, but you're right. We're taking both of them on!!"- The middle aged man said, and hit the floor with his cane (seemingly made of black wood, its tip was made of gold and also had several ornaments of gold. It had the family's shield and other symbols related to their lineage. It was said this cane was held by the family's heads for generations...)

-"We'll take care of this, the rest is dismissed..."- The middle aged man added, and only him, Lilith and her brown haired brother stayed. In matter of minutes, James arrived, Blake walking behind him, and he was received by a nearly fatal slash, that he barely dodged. James then saw his wife, and her father were surrounding him and Blake, who didn't know what to do. James, on the other side, did a risky move, stopped watching over Blake to draw their attention on himself, and started fighting the three at the same time. Blake hid under the table (You can't expect more from a 4 years old child...)

James moved quickly, as Lilith was armed with two knives, while her father and her brother relied on physical fight. Surprisingly, the middle aged man (which would be Blake's grandfather by maternal side) was exceptionally strong, and soon James took some damage. His mind wasn't fully on the fight as he was still checking on Blake. He knew that if he failed they'd kill him. Then decided to not care anymore, and landed a punch to Lilith's stomach, and disarmed her. He then blocked an incoming punch from her bother and spun around to dodge another incoming punch.

He realized he would lose the fight if he kept going, and decided to leave for his own and Blake's safety, so, he took Blake in his arms and escaped through the window. Lilith's brother went to chase him, but, James, who lived in streets a great portion of his life, was able to move a lot faster and with more agility through them than him. The middle aged man stopped him by pulling his arm, and said

-"If they get away and don't return, they are as good as dead... We only care for our family..."-

-"They WILL return. I won't trust time anymore. Now, you let them go, and we failed at killing them..."- The brown haired man said

-"I agree with my brother. We can't rest until we see that kid's dead body..."- Lilith added

-"Enough!!"- The middle aged man hit the floor with his cane twice, and his tone was more serious -"It's over, you return to your houses, and we won't talk about this subject unless it's necessary..."-

Some time later, after the middle aged man left and Lilith went to do her daily business, the brown haired man walked into a bar, and spoke with a few people, then they pointed at a threateningly looking man, who looked to be in his early 30's. A muscular latino looking one...

Blake clenched his fists tightly when he saw that man, although Joana, Jasmine and Jak couldn't understand why...

*No offense intended... just take the joke... family guy and other tv shows say worse things about that topic... No offense to those shows either...
** NOT to be confused with Lith, who is a goddess. Lilith is the youngest daughter of a family that took pride on being pure Spaniards, and this was the main reason for the hatred that they hold against Blake, who, despite being 3/4 Spaniard, was still called an impure...
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Blake saw things he would prefer he hadn't...

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The brown haired man talked to the latino looking one, and gave him a lot of bills. Then, the brown haired man left, and so did the other man...

Back to James and Blake, they were walking in the streets, James was trying to find a proper place to sleep(because of Blake)But, instead, 5 attackers appeared, James immediately turned in guard position and said

-"Blake...run as far as you can...now!!"- Blake refused to do it, he didn't want to disobey his father but he wouldn't leave him like that. He hid behind a trash box and watched from there.

The fight started, he dodged fists and connected punches and kicks, it was a fierce battle, they tried to use their numeric advantage against him but he proved to be stronger than them and got rid of 3 of them (he left two unconscious and broke one's neck with a kick, killing him). The remaining two were on guard, and ran toward him, but despite James was prepared, he got distracted by something, seemingly, something in his mind...

Then, one of the thugs' knee hit him in the stomach, snapping him back into reality, and the other attacker locked his arms from behind, leaving him vulnerable so the other man could punch him freely. James regained reason and hit the one who was holding him from behind with his elbow, thus, getting released, and then he punched him twice in the stomach and once in his jaw, leaving him knocked out, then he fought the other one and defeated him after many punches and kicks. Then he crossed his arms and said

-"You just are a waste of my time, I don't want to see you again or you'll regret to be born"- Then he turned around and went to get Blake, but a voice stopped him

-"Hehehe... yeah... those guys aren't worth your time...are they, James?"-

He looked around and found an unknown man...with short spiked up black hair and black eyes, which looked threatening. James asked, while remained in a fighting stance

-"Who are you? And what the hell do you want?"-

He just laughed and said

-"You should know it... bro..."- James' look changed, as he realized who was that man...

-"Why did you come?"- asked James, still on guard

-"I came here to kill someone, and I found you... and... what do we have in here?"- He said looking toward the little Blake

-"Don't you dare or you'll regret"- James threatened, the unknown man said

-"Here is the deal James...if you want to save your life I'll take this child's"-

-"I won't let you!"- James punched him on the face...he answered with some punches which James blocked and dodged, this time, they were fighting evenly, although James had taken heavy damage and was getting tired because of the previous fights, and after some minutes, the man said

-"You can't surpass me, Brandon!! I'll avenge my father and you will die!!"-

-"We'll see about that..." James answered and their fists clashed, so the kicks, which moved around very fast and hit each other many times. James connected a combo of 4 punches and 3 kicks but lost concentration for a split second, and Brandon took that chance, punching him several times in the stomach and face, then kicked him, then he hit James with his knee and threw him onto the ground. It started to rain, and Brandon said

-"It's over James, you can't stand up a chance against me, now I'll do what I came for..."- And deployed a gun which was pointed at Blake

-"Blake, run!!"- James shouted as he moved quickly and received the shot himself, falling down again...

-"Heh! What an idiot! You wanted to die before your son? Okay...he'll die anyway"- James was bleeding, and even coughed up blood, but stood up, saying

-"No...I won't let this happen, my son has a whole life ahead, and I will make sure he lives it... I will not let you destroy his fate!! You have no right to end his life this early!!"- He ran furiously and took off the gun from him with a swift move, and said

-"I'll never let you hurt my son... I'm taking you with me to hell!!"- He said as he fired the gun at Brandon's heart at point-blank, but he stabbed James in the chest in the same moment. They fell down to the ground, Brandon was dead, and Blake ran towards his dying father. He put his hand on Blake's head and said

-"I-I'm...s...s..sorry Blake...I'm sorry for...leaving you alone in this world...I know...that your mother hates you, we both know it... but... Blake... promise me...that you'll never give up... never... also..."- he coughed up some more blood, and then continued -"...Don't ever dare to get vengeance...what happened today was...because my best friend and me took revenge from the one who killed my father..."- James took a breath and continued

-"I'd have really liked to see you growing up...but I'm afraid won't be able to... after all..."- He coughed more blood, but added -"I'm dying...Blake...live a real life, not like mine... I failed at everything... everything but you... you're the only reason my life was still worth it... I never found love myself...but you...u-ugh...you will... someday..."- James stopped speaking as his hand slowly fell from Blake's head, pale, cold... and dead...

Blake said nothing, but laid next to his father's body, he closed his eyes, expecting to die as well, next to his father, and under the rain... a death fit for orphans, for people the world didn't care about...

The images stopped, Jak and Jasmine were shocked, specially Jasmine, but Jak was shocked as well, despite having an idea of what happened. Joana was even more shocked, and Lith said

-"No words can describe what Blake felt... but this was as close as you can possibly get to get an idea..."-

Blake remained silent. He was more surprised at his friends' reaction. He had always believed nobody else would care for such a thing, but it seemed that it affected them almost as much as it affected him... though while Blake considers his father's death as the most painful thing, maybe the others associated his family's hatred as the worst thing. Blake couldn't tell... he had lived without a mother, and honestly, didn't miss having one, although Lith left very clear that she took the most essential motherly responsibilities with him...

Joana, who was sitting on the bed near Blake (Jak was on Jasmine's lap), picked up Blake and hugged him very tightly, then, she sat him on her right breast, but Lith whispered something to her, and Joana put him on her left one instead... Blake asked

-"What was that for? What did Lith say?"-

-"I want you to be more comfy... and, Nothing really important..."- Joana giggled, and this time, Blake had no idea of what may have Lith told her...

-"All of this was a bit too much, you better take a break so you can... assimilate it...."- Lith said, and snapping her fingers, appeared a chair, which she sat on...
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Blake's most grievous moments...

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"I understand it now." Jasmine said.

"Yeah..." Blake said. "Can we please move on?"

"Yes." Jak said. I just wonder if-"

Then all of a sudden, Jak saw a flash of green and then started to clinch his head, as if he was having a headache.

"Jak," Jasmine said. "What's wrong?"

"It's nothing-" Jak said. "I don't think, I just had a hot flash or something."

"Alright..." Jasmine petted Jak's head, and wasn't so sure.

"Anyway," Jak said. "I still do wonder where that Zenn guy is."

"I couldn't tell you guys at this point..." Lith said. "But anywho, it's not of any matter...yet."

"Yet?" Blake said. "What do you mean by "yet''

"You'll find out soon enough." And Lith did her usual disappearing act, leaving Blake to wonder.

"I hate it when she does that..." Blake said.

"D-darn it." Jak suddenly said, seeing that same green flash. "I don't know what's going on."

"Jak..." Jasmine said, now cuddling him. "Are you sure your ok?"

"Don't know, Jas." Jak said. "But I have a bad feeling..."

"Of what...?" Blake said.

"Strange..." Jak said. "I have this strange feeling that Blaze, Nostory and Seth will comeback again looking for another fight...and pretty soon. And there's something that might takeover during the battle..."

"What do you mean?" Jasmine said.

"Nothing..." Jak said. "Let's all get some rest...It's been a long day...."

Jasmine didn't ask anymore questions, and agreed with her boyfriend as it was a long day, and so they bid a good night to Blake and Joana, and went into Jasmine's room to sleep. Jasmine nestled Jak in between her cleavage, and he feel asleep. She still pondered over what Jak said moments ago...

"And there's something that might takeover during the battle..."

The question is: what is it?
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: The beginning of another Darksider.

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Back to Blaze, Nostory, Seth, Aizen and Naraku, some hours earlier*... (Btw, here, italics will represent telepathic talk)

-"Dammit!! How could these guys find my pocket dimension?!!"- Blaze said, while rebuilding the place using his powers

-"You underestimated them, you white haired son of a...!!"- Naraku said while also repairing the place using his insect like parts as tools

-"Enough..."- Aizen interrupted him, while he sat comfortably not doing anything

-"Alright..."- Naraku replied grudgingly

-"Uhm, Blaze, why don't you say anything about Aizen?"- Seth asked with his mind, who was also working on repairing the place

-"Because he can be a powerful enemy. We better have him on our side..."- Blaze answered telepathically

-"Geesh... he almost believes to be the leader"- Seth said in his thought

-"WE are the leaders. Our top priority is to restore Omega and he will unlock my powers, enhance yours,and release the Demon Army!!"- Blaze said, again, in his mind

-"Alright..."- Seth said, although he didn't like Aizen's attitude, he knew Blaze and they could take him on if necessary, but Blaze preferred to have him on their side

Later, after they repaired the place, Blaze created some more rooms for them to rest while waiting for something to happen. Blaze tried to watch Blake and his friends, but it seemed to have heavy interference, and no matter what he did he wouldn't be able to see or hear anything, then he realized, and grunted

-"Dammit, Lith..."- He knew that only someone as powerful as her would be the cause of such interference. And she knew he'd watch, so, she would probably have interfered on purpose. He laid on the bed, not having much to do, waiting for the interference to disappear... He even allowed himself to fall asleep for a while (I won't say what he's dreaming, believe me, it's too creepy...). Until, he quickly opened his eyes wide and fell off the bed, as he felt a tremendous presence... no... two tremendous presences...

He rushed outside his room and readied two dark purple energy balls in his hands just in case, Nostory, Seth and Naraku also were outside. And two guys that looked somewhat like Ryan Kasshi and Ryan Shinonome appeared. Nostory and Seth readied dark energy in their hands, and Naraku turned his hands into pincers. Blaze spoke

-"Who the hell are you?!!"-

-"Blaze, are you serious?!! Don't you see that it's the guys who attacked us some time ago?!!"- Naraku said, and Nostory answered

-"He's right, Naraku... they aren't the same guys from before..."-

-"They aren't. And what's more, they look like them and their presence is tremendous..."- Seth added

-"We're your enemies' enemies..."- The 2 unknown guys said at once

-"You look too suspicious"- Seth said, and Blaze said to him

-"They do, but they aren't the same. Their presence is different. These are definitively other guys..."-

-"My name is Konabagu"- Said one of the guys

-"And I'm Soekiyogama"- The other said

-"Well, what has brought you here?"- Nostory asked

-"We're after the same guys. If we work together, we will defeat them!!"- Soekiyogama said

-"If that's true, then you're welcome. I'll make two rooms for you. There's not much we can do right now, someone has been interfering with out ability to watch what they're doing..."- Blaze said, while created two rooms with his dark power

-"Are you going to let them in that easily?"- Seth asked

-"Yeah. Not everyday some villain comes willing to join forces... It's an example for some people..."- Blaze replied, and looked at Naraku while saying that, who just grunted and crossed his arms (which went back to normal by the way)

-"However..."- Blaze reappeared behind the evil twins, and whispered -"I am the one planning the moves. Do anything stupid and/or suspicious and you'll regret the day you met us..."-

With that, Blaze walked toward his room, and closed the door. Naraku, Nostory and Seth went back to their rooms as well. The evil twins stood for a moment, and smiled evilly, then, they went to their rooms as well...

Aizen, who apparently hadn't even bothered to get up, was indeed, hiding behind an invisible field, like this http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20... and had watched the whole thing. He also noticed that Blaze kept his position as the "leader", and he laughed silently. He was technically more powerful than him, but his healing factor was a decisive advantage which would still give Blaze victory.

So, Aizen decided to play along, in the end, he still could impose his will because of his superior power. However, that wouldn't last much longer with these twins. Aizen could feel clearly that they were even more powerful than himself, twice at the very least...

After entering their rooms, Seth said to Nostory telepathically

-"Hey, now that I think about it, is Blaze his real name?"-

-"Why?"- Nostory asked

-"It sounds weird..."-

-"We ARE weird... at least by everyone else's standards..."- Nostory replied

-"Not weird weird. Weeeirrd..."-

-"Uh..."-

-"And the hair...What's with the hair?!!"- Seth asked

-"I don't know..."- Nostory was rather fed up with such a trivial talk

-"His obsession with that human is quite creepy if you think about it..."- Seth said

-"Meh. It's absolutely normal. It's a perfectly normal nemesis relationship..."- Nostory replied

-"Whatever... at least ours is a girl..."- Seth said, and Nostory cut the telepathic talk...


*In a previous chapter, they were surprise attacked by the Ryans and Powerman, and let some bombs explode there...
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Meanwhile... back to the villains...

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:

Zenn still holds his blades, ready to kill him if he needs to survive. Powerman fires a beam, which looks like a lighter version of the one Jaxx uses to shrink him. Zenn tried to jump away bit was too late. He felt it hit him and prepared to shrink further. But, to his surprise he began to grow. Powerman grew beside him and said,

"Come on. Let's take you in." He opens a portal and then walks through. Zenn falters, internally his every fibre of being said something very loudly. DON'T YOU DARE GO IN THERE! WHAT IF YOU DIE!? He stood there for nearly thirty seconds until finally looking at the mid-morning sun, stepped in.

Joana and Jasmine both started to circle him and Zenn chose not to use his powers, assuming that they had very little power beyond the forcefields and a few other light techniques. The shrunken boys kept their distance and watched. None of the three attempted to strike.

"I don't want to do this. We could just not figh-" Zenn was interrupted by Joana's hand hitting him in the face. "Ow. Alright then." Zenn followed with a punch to her stomach and then threw her into Jasmine. He backed up a bit, not allowing himself to get surrounded. The two girls came at him again. He ducked and punch from Jasmine and then blocked one from Joana. He still felt slightly jarred from Joana's punch and assumed she had augmented strength. Joana pointed to the spot on her cheek where he cut her. The girls continued to attack together, leaving Zenn only able to block for a bit. Finally, he found and opening. He kicked Jasmine onto the ground and landed a combo of four body blows and two facial hits on Joana. Jasmine nodded to Joana, who apparently got the idea from that nod. They both started to grow at the same time. They capped off at each a bit under twenty feet.

"Okay then. That was.... interesting." Zenn knew he could beat these two if he didn't let them grow their boyfriends back to their size. Zenn clenched his fists to catch the blades of fire he formed. "Let's get down to business, shall we?" Joana spoke up. "Blake, get your other body." one of the shrunken boys ran into the ship. Zenn thought about how he had found yet another of the names Jaxx had given him. The girls now attacked much more aggressively and Zenn kept dodging, until Jasmine landed a punch fully to Zenn's chest. He fell to the ground and seeing the incoming foot, blasted himself away with fire. While he flew, he threw a fireball that grazed Jasmine's side. He still didn't use his blades or try to kill them.

Something in him told him that they were not his enemies. He ran up about fourteen feet into the air with his platforms. The girls kept coming at him and he put his swords away, instead coating his hands with fire. He punched each of them quickly, throwing them down. He didn't notice Jasmine slip away towards Jak. Blake came back in his spare body, doing again that weird transformation, with his hair rising up, and golden glowing eyes, surrounded by a golden fire-like aura, and Jak was now at full size, he transformed as well, surrounded in a white aura... To make matters worse, both girls grew to about fifty feet.

"I don't like these odds...." Zenn was about ready to fire a huge fireball into them and run, until a voice sounded. The same guy from earlier.

"That's enough! He isn't here to fight us. But since you were willing to fight, I thought I could really see what Zenn here's made of. He held back, while you attacked him at full power."

Powerman stepped out of the forest. Zenn breathed a sigh of relief. Grudgingly, all four reverted to their original forms.
