"You make me sick, you make me sick, you make me sick!" Jak said, before delivering a kick to Nostory once more. Jak grew tired of Nostory and Seth. They were always ruining everything for Jak and Jasmine, whether it be them spending time with each other, doing school work, and then trying to go school events was out of the question. Simply sort, it sucks for Jasmine and Jak when it comes to doing things that normal teenagers would do.

"Why must you insist...on being....jerks!" Jak said.

"Why must you and your COW of a girlfriend, interfere in our plans?" Nostory said.

"It's my duty, I kinda let you into the real world, so I have to get rid of you.." Jak said. "But I do appreciate one thing you two have done."

"And that would be?" Seth said.

"Well, you introduced me to the girl of my dreams." Jak said. "The same girl who's been fighting for me for the past 3 years. That same girl that I enjoy waking up next to. But now, since I have these powers, she doesn't have to fill in for me anymore."

Jak's aura was rising more intently.

"Hey, I mean," Jak continued. "So thanks for giving a girl to love and care for."

Jak then quickly put his arms out and made a force by using his ki, and the sent Nostory and Seth flying. Blaze noticed the spike in Jak's power level, Blake, also felt it, but was still firmly focused on Orochimaru. Meanwhile, Joana and Jasmine were coming upon the battle ahead.

"Well, here we are..." Jasmine said. "We found the boys."

"But it still doesn't make sense....why are we all-" Joana started to hesitate. "Unless this is the work of Blaze and Nostory...."

"It can't be, it has to be another-" Jasmine hesitated and was watching the scene. Their boyfriends were fighting Blaze, Nostory, Seth, and the rest of the other bad guys. Joana and Jasmine were somewhat worried the villains found a way to have the four of them to fall asleep, and then attack them in their dreams. Jasmine started to slightly panic and freak out.

"T-this is nuts." Jasmine said. "We have to help them, I bet that Nostory or Blaze had something to do with us falling asleep!"

"Let's not jump to conclusions...but let's go help them." Joana said.

Jasmine and Joana grew to 200 feet, and dashed to the battle. Jak was being strangled by Nostory.

"You thought you were being heroic?" Nostory said. "Think again...."

Jak was charging an energy ball in his right hand, and kicked Nostory in the leg, and then he fired the energy ball into his gut, sending him away a distance.

"I think I've gotten a bit stronger, Nostory..." Jak said. "I'm not the same kid you bullied 3 years ago, I'm almost 18, and I have powers now!"

"You forget, there's two of us bo-" Seth was dashing toward Jak, but then a giant fist hit him, knocking him back very far.

"No, you forget, that he has a girlfriend who's always going to be near his side..." Jasmine said.

Jak smiled. "Blake, I think we have reinforcements."

Blake turned, to look, after deflecting the kunai that Orochimaru threw. "Well, I guess, we can get some answers....
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: What DOES the Scouter say about Jak's Power Level?

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
[AUTHOR'S NOTE: BEFORE STARTING, I MAKE SOME REFERENCES TO WHAT MIGHT BE CONSIDERED SPOILERS OF THE NARUTO ANIME, SO, IF YOU HAVEN'T WATCHED NARUTO VS PAIN'S FIGHT... GO WATCH IT ALREADY, DAMN IT!!

SERIOUSLY, IF YOU DON'T WANT TO GET SPOILED, YOU BETTER WATCH THE ANIME, EVEN IF IT'S SUBBED. ALSO, THE REASON I DON'T CALL THEM "DEVA PAIN" OR THE OTHER NAMES IS BECAUSE IT MIGHT BE A BIT CONFUSING, AND I PREFERRED TO BE A BIT MORE SPECIFIC DESPITE IT'S A ROUGHER WAY OF WRITING/TELLING]

Orochimaru noticed another giant girl towering over him with an angry look, then he looked at Blake, and said, laughing

-"I'll make things even..."- Then he performed some hand signs, bit his thumbs and placed his hands on the ground. There was a brief smoke explosion, and a giant purple snake appeared, with Orochimaru standing on its head.

-"Now the real fight begins!!"-

-"Hey, Orochimaru, why the hell did you call me?!"- The snake asked angrily

-"I brought you some fresh food... don't snakes like to hunt it themselves? You can have the giant girl..."-

-"What giant...girl?"- The snake turned around and noticed a brown haired and well endowed girl... at an impossible size for almost any human... -"IS THIS OTHER OF YOUR WEIRD EXPERIMENTS, OROCHIMARU?!"-

-"Shut up, Manda. It seems to be the boy's summon..."- Orochimaru pointed at Blake, who was now on Joana's shoulder

-"I have never seen such a summon..."- Manda said

-"They come from another world, and who knows, it's possible they have jutsus we don't know about..."-

-"You are seriously messing up reality..."- Manda added -"I don't mind, but you'll have to give me 200 sacrifices and the girl for my help!!"-

-"Yeah yeah, keep the girl, after I perform some studies on her..."- Orochimaru said a bit annoyed

-"Then it'll be 300 sacrifices..."- Manda looked a bit more and focused on Blake 'His presence feels strong, but it isn't chakra... it is truly something from another world...'

-"I would like to enjoy this fight, but unfortunately, I have business to do..."- Orochimaru then bit his thumbs, performed quick hand signs, and 4 caskets emerged, Blake stared at them as they opened, and with a wide eyed look, he said

-"You GOT to be KIDDING me..."-

The ones who stepped out of the caskets were Pain, Ulquiorra, Grimmjow, and Frieza. Blake noticd that only Pain stepped once more, indicating he would fight him first. Blake rushed toward him, and Pain quickly extended his arms, saying

-"Shinra Tensei..."- He created a force field, but it didn't repel Blake, as he stopped before getting into its range, and as soon as the force vanished, Blake landed a punch in Pain's face, sending him away a short distance. Pain quickly stood up and extending his arm, while pulling out a chakra blade (Pain's black blades) with his free hand, said

-"Bansho Ten'in"- Blake was attracted by a tremendous force, and was to be impaled by the chakra blade, but instead, only a metallic clash was heard... Blake used his sword to block the chakra blade succesfully. Pain opened his eyes slightly more than usual, surprised to see a metal object that wasn't shattered by his blade. The attracting force subsided shortly after, and Blake attacked Pain with the sword, the latter catching it in his hand, but it cut his hand a bit and bled somewhat. Blake then kicked and punched Pain several times but his attacks had little effect, and Pain managed to grab one of Blake's ankles and threw him away.

Blake then saw that Pain threw a chakra blade as a harpoon at him, and could barely dodge it. Blake felt that his current power wasn't enough to face him, and without saying anything, transformed into his light form.

-"What's that?"- Pain asked rhetorically, in a somewhat arrogant tone, however, Blake disappeared before his eyes, and heard behind him

-"Your doom"- Pain was quick to turn around, only to find nothing, and got kicked in the back by Blake, this time, sending him a fair distance away and crashing into several large buildings.

Blake then turned to look at Joana, who had already started her fight against Orochimaru and Manda... the resurrected villains didn't d anything though. 'With that snake is enough of a problem...' Blake thought... it was a good thing that while Joana wasn't fond of snakes, at least didn't fear them... scorpions on the other hand, were a different story....

-"You should pay attention to your own fight"-

Blake, without turning around, whispered

-"Purge... light of the heavens... banish from existence those who worship the wicked god..."-

He turned around and fired a very wide beam at Pain, who still blocked it with his Shinra Tensei, but barely made it. The beam still split after hitting the force field and destroyed some of the city's buildings. When the force field vanished, Pain was hit by a barrage of energy balls, and heard Blake muttering

-"Gold as the sunlight... the light that pierces through darkness... burn the enemy down to ashes..."- Pain opened his eyes wide for real, as he was hit by a golden beam, and couldn't block it because he needed a few seconds before using Shinra Tensei again. There was a large explosion, and Blake stared into the destruction

Pain had been caught in the blast, but he used Shinra Tensei to repel the flames that would've otherwise burnt him. Then, a bird's sound was heard, and a small girl with orange hair and the chakra piercings dropped from a giant bird with three legs and a strange beak, and while falling, she did some hand signs, and summoned other people... Blake already knew what it meant

-"In attendance, the Six Paths of Pain!!"-

-"Oh great"- Blake said annoyed, however, a small light bulb lit up in Blake's head, and he smiled -"Two can play that game"- He placed both palms on the ground, and there was a smoke explosion. Pain was a bit surprised to see a guy with no knowledge of ninjutsu do a summon, but he wouldn't show it. However, he showed it a bit as Blake's "summons" appeared, two humanoid cats, a humanoid dog, and a humanoid turtle, and they all seemed to be confused about where they were

-"Where are the infinite bones?! My happiness is all gone!!"- Rocky said, falling to his knees, while everyone looked at him with a WTF face. He cleared his throat and added -"Hey, a dog has dreams too..."- Then he looked at Pain, and then turned around to see Blake

-"Hey, master, isn't he the freaky guy from the ninja thing?"- He asked

-"Yep"- Blake couldn't help but laugh a bit at Rocky's description of Pain

-"You dare to call that a summon?"- Pain asked

-"I would like to ask you the same question... Let's see, I have two humanoid cats, a dog and a turtle, all of them with their enhanced senses multiplied to an unknown extent, thus, they are vastly superior to most people... and, what did you get? A bald cyborg, a small girl that summons large but useless animals, a guy that supposedly absorbs attacks, another that summons an ugly thing to rip out people's tongues, and a mind reading guy?... Guess who wins..."-

All of the Paths of Pain were angered, even more as each was referenced, but the straw that broke the camel's back was

-"And the summoner himself, a frustrated emo guy who plays with gravity, thinks he's a god, and can't even beat a 16 years old in a battle with a 6 vs 1 advantage... What makes you think you're even worthy of being a villain?"-

If Pain's bodies were alive, they would've all had their blood boiling and their forehead veins would've popped out. They all dashed toward Blake, but his pets also reacted very fast and went to fight them. Still, the main Pain and the attack absorbing one took on Blake, engaging into a melee fight. Blake punched the attack absorbing Pain very badly, but couldn't give a hit that took it down definitively, and kept annoying him while he focused on the main Pain.

Blake kicked the absorbing Pain away and disappeared, quickly reappearing behind the main Pain, kicking him in the back, and slashing him with his sword, however, the absorbing Pain tackled him, and locked his arms from behind.

-"I've already seen that"- Blake said, and silently, increased his power temporarily up to 7 times, and with a swift motion, he freed his arms and dislocated the absorbing Pain's, finishing with a quick slash with his sword, slicing him in two. Blake's power went back to just 2 times (normal light form) and he attacked the main Pain, who was surprised by that burst of power.

-"It seems that other worlds offer some challenges..."- He then used the bansho ten'in to attract Blake, and pinned him down grabbing him by the throat, Blake kicked him but Pain didn't let go and pierced Blake's right arm with his chakra blade, driving it into the ground, then, he stabbed him in the chest with another chakra blade, but instead of Blake seeing the Rinnegan in his mind, Pain saw two white, evil-looking eye, and felt some darkness coming out of Blake, then, a hand emerged from Blake's chest (without causing physical damage, more like coming out of a portal) taking out the chakra blade, and in a few seconds a guy that looked like Blake came out, but with darker grayish skin, his hair waving continuously upwards, and those evil eyes Pain has seen before. The guy also smiled, showing that he had fangs...
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: In attendance!! 6 annoying guys...

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
[Author's Note: Sorry about the delay: I'll be adding chapters from now on for as long as I can, though I'll try to write at least twice a week even in school time. I had to get used to the schedules and that stuff.

Another note: Demon Blake can suppress and increase his power at will with no problem, and without Blake's drawbacks when increasing too much. However he only does it as 'he feels' and not having fixed increases like Blake has. The only way to determine Demon Blake's state is by his appearance [and after advanced stages it can be misleading]. Currently, he only looks like Blake, with irisless eyes, and slightly grayish skin, as well as his continuously waving upward hair... in case you ask, yeah, Blake's dark side is still far superior to him by a lot, but it's because he incarnates instinct, while Blake needs skill and to learn to use his powers. Just as Blake can't currently fly yet Demon Blake is perfectly capable of...]

-"What is this?"- Pain asked, although his tone seemed rather calm after the initial surprise, something was telling him that there was danger in whatever it was. Blake on the other side had an annoyed look, and said angrily

-"You again?!"-

-"Hey, he woke me up!! I was having a good sleep!!"- Demon Blake replied

Blake sighed in annoyance, however, even he admitted that his dark side was very powerful, far more than himself, as it was him and not Blake who achieved such power that even Blaze feared...

-"So, you were fighting this wimp? Man, if you want a real fight I'm the one you're looking for!!"- Demon Blake said to Pain, smiling and pointing to himself

-"I was going to do that anyway..."- Pain answered and ran to attack him, while Blake decided to stay back, as he would only need to beat the remaining one, whether Pain or his own dark side, and Blake honestly didn't care if his dark counterpart got killed. However after a seconds of thinking he decided to go and help his pets. Blake was very surprised, as they had already beaten 4 of Pain's bodies, the last remaining one was the one that absorbed attacks, all the others had been utterly destroyed (and Blake didn't really bothered in finding out although there was evidence that his pets just used their natural abilities, such as Rocky's bone crushing bite... and the cats' claws).

-"Did we do well, master?"- Tabitha asked

-"Way better than I thought. You may leave, I'll take care of this one..."- Blake said, however, none of them felt like leaving, specially not after they noticed Joana was gigantic and fighting a nearly equally enormous snake. Blake, who was in his normal form (to save energy) quickly transformed to his standard light form and dashed toward the last of Pain's bodies (besides the one fighting Demon Blake) and using the shoshitsu technique for a great burst in speed, sliced it in two with no effort, as this Pain had no defense against physical attacks.

-"Well, that takes care of it..."- Blake sheathed his sword, only to hear a low booming sound, and felt two great forces clashing... just then, Pain got sent away very fast crashing into a mountain... Blake used shoshitsu to see what happened, and found Ulquiorra standing before Demon Blake, the latter had caught a punch from the former...

-"I've sensed a strange power in you. I shall be your opponent now..."- Ulquiorra said. Blake quickly used shoshitsu to reappear a decent distance away... he was aware Ulquiorra was on a higher scale of power, but couldn't really compare it to his own, although it seemed Demon Blake had finally found his match. Blake also was fully aware of Ulquiorra's abilities and that he hid far more power than he was showing right now. Still, even if it was a dream, it wouldn't hurt to get his inner demon's ass kicked to shut him up. Blake climed a nearby building to see how was Joana doing.

She was fighting the snake, and had landed some hits on it, but she was also cautious, the snake seemed to be angry, and Orochimaru was still watching calmly the battle from the top of Manda's head. Frieza was also there, doing nothing but watching the fights with a bored face. Blake gulped, as he couldn't really comprehend what kind of power Frieza would have if he were to face him... If it was just like in the series, then Frieza would be stronger even than Blaze, and by a great deal... it would render Blake's strongest forms useless. Just then, he heard the sound of a sharp thing flying very fast and barely dodged a black chakra blade, thrown by Pain, who was badly wounded but still alive, and seemingly, still strong...

-"I tought you were dead!!"- Blake shouted

-"I'm beyond your concepts of life and death... someone like you can't kill me, nor your inner demon..."-

'where have I heard that?' Blake mentally said with sarcasm, however he was surprised about Pain finding out Demon's Blake true nature

-"It wasn't difficult to figure out that that thing was the source of your power, not so well hidden within you... as I saw it with my Rinnegan..."-

-"Oh really?"- Blake got in fighting stance, and engaged into hand to hand fight against Pain, who now lacked the numerical advantage, but still proved strong enough to be more than a challenge for Blake. He had slightly underestimated Pain's power, and transformed into his light form once again...

-"You say that beast is the source of my power? Not quite. This power comes from something else, which I won't bother explaining you... The beast just happened to be there as well..."- Blake punched Pain in the face with great strength, sending him away and off the building. He looked at Joana again, who dodged Mande and kicked it in the head, keeping some distance between the two. For someone who wasn't skilled on fighting Joana was holding her own reasonably well, although Blake knew she had been only using her (newly found) sheer power so far, and that this fight in particular required a bit more than just that.

Meanwhile, Ulquiorra had been fighting Demon Blake barehanded, each time their fists and feet clashed they created tremors, and shockwaves, after some minutes of this, Ulquiorra dashed back a bit, and said

-"It's pointless to keep on. Show me your true power, otherwise you'll die..."-

-"I can say the same about you"- Demon Blake replied, wiping off a bit of blood from his lips' left corner, and dashed toward Ulquiorra, who stopped the incoming punch with an arm, and fired a green Cero with the other. Demon Blake took the full blast, but was barely harmed, then, he grabbed Ulquiorra by the face and slammed him against a building's wall, then, he fired a black beam, which Ulquiorra deflected with a hand, although it got slightly burnt

-"I've seen that sorts of things before. Try harder..."- As he spoke, Demon Blake had suddenly disappeared, and Ulquiorra was caught off-guard for a very brief moment, in which he took a full powered black beam from above at nearly point blank... The explosion that followed cracked several buildings around and shook the ground.

-"Is that enough?"- Demon Blake said arrogantly

-"Yes. You've proved worthless, and I have no more use in fighting you..."- Ulquiorra replied, and then he muttered -"Enclose, Murciélago..."- And transformed, gaining two large bat-like wings, his broken helmet-like mask now is fully formed with two long horns extending outward to the sides. toward the front. His clothes also looked now more like a robe, than like a jacket as before.

-"This is more than you can ever comprehend. However I'll let you see the form of your death..."- Ulquiorra said, and formed a javelin made of green energy, throwing it, and piercing through Demon Blake's right shoulder, and he fell backward to the floor, apparently dead...

-"Hmph... I shouldn't have bothered..."- Ulquiorra said to himself, turning around, only to see Demon Blake in front of him, staring at him with his irisless eyes, and a crazy smile

-"Just kidding!!"- He said somewhat happily, and added with the same happy-creepy tone -"I can play that game too..."- He got surrounded by a black aura, and the ground shook, the nearby buildings' windows shattered, and Demon Blake's fangs grew slightly longer, his skin turned darker, now evidently was dark gray, and the scar in his eye glowed in red. Then he added, with a more metallic-sounding voice -"Let's play"- He disappeared and almost caught Ulquiorra off-guard again. but he formed another green energy javelin and used it to slash him, although it missed. Then they started a high speed series of clashes...

'Their power is monstrous... it's nearing Blaze's power...' Blake thought as he watched the fight (although he could still match them with the higher level golden aura), despite what he thought, deep inside he wanted his dark side to win... on the good side, he would be heavily worn down after beating Ulquiorra, if that happened... and Blake should have no problem finishing him off.

He continued on watching Joana, until he got a bad feeling, and jumped from the building's top to another's, only to see it destroyed by a red beam... and saw Grimmjow
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Clash of the Demons?

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
-"Great..."- Blake muttered

-"The weird-eyes failed at killing you, so, I'll have to do the job..."- Grimmjow said, and unsheathed his sword, Blake did the same

-"Can't I get a break?"- Blake asked to nobody in particular

-"Nope. This is nature, and it's always in war. Either kill or be killed, it's been like that from the beginning and it will always be that way..."- Grimmjow replied

-"I can't let myself die yet"- Blake got into a fighting stance with his sword (holding it with two hands, despite he can wield it with no problem with just one)

-"Oh, you speak like you're going to kill me?"-

-"Take it however you want... if you attack me I'll fight back, that's all you need to know"- Blake anwered, and with that, both of them started the fight, their swords clashed, but immediately Blake felt the difference in strength... he wouldn't be able to take on him untransformed, and he immediately transformed into his light form (golden aura, spiked p hair, golden eyes) to counter...

-"I've seen that trick you do... do you really expect it to work?"- Grimmjow said while they were struggling with their swords, and quickly disappeared using Sonido to stab Blake from behind, but the latter was able to dodge by using his own high speed technique, shoshitsu, reappearing a few meters away from Grimmjow. Blake dashed at Grimmjow and their swords clashed again, however, this time, Blake was hitting repeatedly and didn't allow struggles, and suddenly, Blake hit him with more strength than before, then, he jumped backward and threw his sword at him (so that Blake's sword was spinning toward Grimmjow), which Grimmjow blocked, surprised by that unexpected move, he failed to see Blake above him, and the moment he looked up, Blake landed a powerful punch right into his face, sending him down and through the building, which collapsed. Blake slid along another building's wall to land safely.

Blake's pets were surprised to see him fighting like that. Blake definitively had more trouble against Blaze, although there was something in Grimmjow that none of them liked. Even when they were unable to truly feel their powers, they were still amazed by their speed and the damage they caused. And they could appreciate the fight more than a regular person due to all their enhanced senses. However, Blake maintained the transformation, as he didn't expect an easy victory, and knew that it wasn't enough to get rid of Grimmjow. Strangely, Blake had the feeling he could beat Grimmjow, even though it'd take some effort, while he also had the feeling that he wouldn't be a match for Ulquiorra.

Which by the way seemed to have a difficult time with Demon Blake, who just nearly equaled his own power. and after multiple high speed clashes, and several beam collisions, stood in the air, above the destroyed buildings. Both of them had gotten damaged and had bleeding wounds, just then, Ulquiorra formed two energy javelins and threw one, which missed, as Demon Blake disappeared and before he could react, Demon Blake had a hold on his right arm (the one he used to throw the javelin) and ripped it apart, then crushed it by clenching his fist.

-"That's what happens to anyone who messes with me, piece by piece..."- Demon Blake said confidently, but Ulquiorra swung the remaining javelin, cutting off Demon Blake's hand

-"I can say the same about you..."- Ulquiorra replied coldly -"However, you're fool if you think this really affects me..."- Ulquiorra regenerated his lost arm at an incredible speed, and opened and closed his reformed hand a few times to test it.

-"You were wrong if you thought that physical strength and power were my greatest abilities... My greatest power is this, instant regeneration... something most of my kind abandon in exchange for more power..."- Then he gave a cold stare at Demon Blake

-"You are clearly not human, not hollow, and not shinigami. Tell me, aberration, what are you fighting for? Are you protecting him?"- Ulquiorra pointed with his look at Blake, who was fighting Grimmjow -"Foolish. Either way he's dead, whether by Grimmjow or by me, or by Lord Aizen if he wishes so... Anything you do leads to defeat..."- Before he continued, Demon Blake attempted to punch him, causing a shockwave that cracked the buildings' (below them) windows

-"Protect him, you say? Nah. I just can't let the stupid die 'cuz I'm the only one who will destroy him, and absorb all his power for my own. I don't care if your friend bruises him a bit, I don't care if he feels pain. I don't care about his friends. I only care about his powers, which belong to me. And anyway, I felt like destroying someone, and you just offered yourself..."-

-"I see. You don't see through appearances, you don't understand that this is a lost battle and a lost cause for you. I'll do a single favor to you, I shall enlighten your pitiful existence, I shall make you know true despair..."- All of sudden, the air felt heavy within a kilometer, and the sky turned black, as Ulquiorra transformed into his Segunda Etapa (Second Stage), losing his long white coat and his mask, and acquiring a more bat-like appearance, as well as a bat-like ears and tail.

Everyone stopped by this moment, as everyone noticed the change, although Blaze, Nostory, Seth, Frieza and Aizen were unaffected. Naraku, Orochimaru and Manda did feel the air growing heavy and that worsened Manda's ability against Joana, who had kept at a decent distance and used ranged energy attacks to damage him, the wounds were getting worse, and he was growing exhausted, still, the giant snake refused to give up, and attempted to bite Joana, although he failed, and got stomped in the head by her, which created a small earthquake, and after which, Manda vanished, against his own will, he was too damaged to keep fighting. Orochimaru and Frieza quickly went to the same building top where Aizen and Blaze had been the whole time, and Joana turned around to see the source of the sudden change... Blake's dark side was standing before Ulquiorra, who had just transformed into his strongest form.

-"I certainly hadn't seen that form before..."- Aizen briefly commented

-"HA HA! Your subordinates lie to you..."- Nelson popped out of nowhere and disappeared just as mysteriously...

-"Let's pretend that never happened..."- Blaze added.

Back to Demon Blake and Ulquiorra...

-"I told you, two can play that game..."- Demon Blake said with his crazy smile, while Ulquiorra replied

-"You don't understand despair's meaning, do you? You still think you can actually fight me? That's so stupid it's not even funny to laugh at... You..."- Ulquiorra's speech got cut off when Demon Blake gave a tremendous metallic roar, and the black aura appeared again, and grew even more, as everything below was shaking, cracking and shattering by the sheer power he was releasing. Ulquiorra then watched how Demon Blake's skin turned darker, and his eyes, still white and empty, now glowed slightly in the darkness, the scar in his right eye glowed more, then, two bone-like things tore Demon Blake's back as they extended, still dripping with blood, they began to grow black feathers, revealing them to be 2 black feathered wings. Demon Blake smiled, showing that his fangs grew even longer this time (Probably they're like an inch long). He also had grown black claws, they were no longer nails.

-"So, even beings from other worlds seem to follow a similar course of evolution... I see that you're not a true individual of that kind, as there are a few things vaguely human left in you..."- Ulquiorra said, and Demon Blake's answer was a punch, which Ulquiorra caught, and proceeded to strangle him with his tail, while Demon Blake slashed Ulquiorra's chest with his claws, and then fired two black beams at point blank. The explosion wasn't as large as the previous one, but it was far more destructive. Both Ulquiorra and him reappeared using their respective high speed techniques (Rakurai and Sonido)

Back to Blake, as he watched the two demonic monsters transform and exchange a few hits, he thought

'That just seems insane... is that the power I fought Blaze with?' However his thoughts were interrupted by a red Cero blast which Blake dodged

-"What are you looking at? If you don't pay attention you DIE!!"- Grimmjow shouted, and dashed closer to Blake, their swords clashed again, although Blake used his more defensively and tried to distract him with the blade while connecting a punch or a kick, Blake jumped backward to another building's top and Grimmjow fired several red Balas which Blake was forced to block with his sword (which fortunately, is wide enough to be a decent shield). When the smoke dissipated a bit, Grimmjow was already in front of Blake, but instead of fear, what Grimmjow said was a confident look, and noticed Blake had his right palm on the ground...

[According to Naruto's info at the wiki, Orochimaru implants something on the revived ones with his forbidden jutsu which alters their personalities to varying exents. So, I think this explains why Ulquiorra would go all out despite being seen, as well as to justify whenever these characters act out of character (besides the obvious such as not questioning Orochimaru who is by the way much weaker than all those villains). I know, it sounds like a plot device, but well, this is semi-filler anyway >.>]
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Things get uglier?

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
-"Purify, soul vanisher... Bring the judgement of light...Consume the darkness, sentence to death... Incinerate, heavenly lights!!"- Blake said as a circled heptagram made of golden light formed below Grimmjow, and as Blake finished the spell, seven pillars of fire-like golden light emerged from each tip, which continued to grow, fusing into a single, wide light pillar, which engulfed Grimmjow, and rose up into the sky, piercing a bit of the darkness that surrounded everything (and the darkness did not regenerate, and it looked like there were tiny golden flames around the borders of the 'hole')

Blake had to jump to another building as the light pillars destroyed the building he was on. He had reverted to his normal form and was breathing heavily, as that spell took a lot out of him. Then he turned to see Joana who was done with Manda, and was watching him, she rushed toward him (still gigantic) and hugged him, Blake groaned in pain, both from Joana's strength, size, and that the spell he just used strained all his body. She let him go but picked him up and kissed him several times, then she said

-"There's still the others, I should heal you..."- Blake was standing on her palm as it began to glow in soft white light, and Blake himself got surrounded in a spherical field made of that same light

-"We should help Jak and Jasmine after this..."- Blake said, now that he could think a bit more clearly, Joana nodded. Blake was actually relieved about Joana coming to help him, as it soothed his almost instinctive fear to rape. Blake expected that the presence of these enemies would make Joana forget about her original purpose in the other dream. Unfortunately, he wasn't aware that Joana was able to perceive his thoughts, and mentally giggled. But she also got a bit more serious as she looked around

-"Are you sure about leaving your dark side on his own against Ulquiorra?"-

-"Yeah. Like I would help that jerk anyway. I'll just finish off whoever remains, and they are going to get severely damaged and worn down for sure..."- Blake said -"And perhaps, if I'm lucky maybe Ulquiorra gets rid of him for a good while..."-

-"I HEARD THAT!!"- Demon Blake shouted, although neither Blake nor Joana could see him, as he was high speed fighting Ulquiorra

-"I hate that guy. If Blaze weren't up to something really evil I would let him get away with him. I don't need a dark beast in my life"- Blake added

-"Lith said you needed him"- Joana recalled

-"What about the balance between the two forces Lith talked about?"-

-"Okay, you got me..."- Blake said with an annoyed ¬_¬ look -"Still, he deserves a good beating..."- After a few seconds, he was done with the healing, and Joana was about to walk toward their friends, when a blue beam came from the ground, aimed at Joana, who blocked it with a white light barrier, although her energy shield broke and the explosion afterwards was tremendous.

-"What...WAS...THAT?!"- Joana wondered

-"Gran Rey Cero..."- Blake and Grimmjow said at once, the latter emerged from the collapsed building, and rose up to Joana's hand level. He had gotten a great deal of damage, he was badly burnt and had several bleeding wounds. His clothes were also damaged.

-"YOU THOUGHT THAT WAS ENOUGH TO BEAT ME?!!"- Grimmjow said very angrily, and then, with his still bleeding hand, he charged up another Gran Rey Cero, this time, Blake quickly transformed into the light form x5 and fired a golden beam with his two hands together (opposed to Blake using his left one while holding its wrist with the right hand, which is how he fires energy most of the time), the two beams were fired too close and the explosion that followed pushed them away. Joana covered Blake in her hand so they didn't suffer any damage.

-"Grind, Pantera..."- Grimmjow said before transforming, getting a white segmented bone-armor as well as many feline traits, long hair, cat-like ears, teeth and a tail. All his wounds also were healed instantly.

-"And I thought the guy was already ugly..."- Tabitha commented while looking this new enemy transform into what to her looked like an insult to cats

-"Joana, I'll have to do this alone, go and help the others..."- Blake said in a slightly more serious tone than usual (which is mostly serious)

-"But, Blake..."-

-"He can cause massive damage, and your size would be a disadvantage against him. I'll fight him, and at least, hold him for long enough..."-

-"Hold me?! Heh. Your abilities have intrigued me, whatever you are. I don't feel like killing you yet, so, let's fight for the hell of it!!"-

-"It's one on one, and both are healed. But let's do this somewhere else..."- Blake said while giving him a cold stare, then, he jumped to a building's top and then to another, getting a fair distance away from Joana. However, Blake's pets also followed him and stood surrounding him

-"I feel the danger, master, we have to help"- Rocky said

-"Don't"- Blake said -"I also know he's dangerous. That's why I have to fight him alone. Make sure Joana is ok..."- The firmness in Blake's tone indicated them that he wasn't going to say that twice, and a bit reluctantly, the dog, the two cats and the turtle left. Grimmjow somewhat noticed that Blake was protecting all of these beings, and it sort of reminded him of his own Fracción, but he shook those thoughts away.

-"Fine..."- Blake said, and closed his eyes, then, his hair rose, and a golden aura surrounded him, however, this time, it changed to a more jagged version, instead of the fire-like aura Grimmjow had seen before, also, a few golden lightning bolts flashed around Blake, whose muscles tightened, and some veins became visible, then, as his power grew, the building's roof cracked. Grimmjow observed that Blake was releasing a great power but in amore controlled manner than his own or anyone else he knew... Blake then opened his eyes, which were golden and glowing this time.

Before anyone could even blink, Blake dashed and punched Grimmjow, the destroying the building's top in the process. Grimmjow clenched his teeth when he felt the sudden change, and attempted to slash him with his claws but Blake caught his hands, and kneed him in the stomach, then added two punches in the face, and an axe kick, which sent Grimmjow crashing through the building, which collapsed. This time, Blake jumped to another building and then jumped over the collapsed building, putting his two hands together, and closing his eyes for concentration, he said

-"Sacred flames...in the name of Chaos... delete this evil soul!!"-

Blake fired a crimson fire-like beam that struck the place, creating something similar to an explosion, but it wasn't, it was only that crimson fire what lingered. Blake slid along another building to slow his descent but he noticed 5 green crystal-like things, and remembered

Blake reappeared on the ground, and the moment Grimmjow emerged from the debris, their fists clashed with incredible strength, and Blake kept attacking very quick and fiercely, disappearing and reapearing very fast trying to catch Grimmjow off-guard, but he was holding his own, and also used Sonido to evade Blake's attacks. As they also fought going upwards Grimmjow noticed that each time Blake had to jump so he could take impulse from the buildings' walls, he decided to pat attention to this detail, and dashed backward, standing on mid air, Blake climbed by running very quickly and then took impulse to attack Grimmjow with a kick, which he also used for additional impulse to return to the building and get a grip.

Grimmjow had realized Blake couldn't stand on air, nor fly, which was an important weakness, he smiled, and dashed toward Blake to engage in close combat, only to slowly go backward, forcing Blake to follow him, however Blake was aware of his limitation and had seen the catch, and clenched his fists in frustration that Grimmjow had found out an exploitable weakpoint. Grimmjow, standing at a distance Blake couldn't reach by jumping, smiled and said

-"What's wrong? Weren't you going to fight me? Why don't you come over here?"-

Blake was a bit desperate, as every second that passed in his sevenfold light power used up a great amount of energy, and despite knowing it might be suicide, he decided to fight Grimmjow for as long as he could mantain his state. Blake stopped for a moment, thinking 'Wait a minute... if this is a dream, how come I have limitations?!' Now he was suspecting of Blaze really influencing his dream which probably meant he was blocking the "limitless mode" in the dream... Blake decided to investigate on this later, as he now had to beat Grimmjow and help his friends. He dashed from a building's top using shoshitsu, destroying it in the process. Grimmjow knew well what he was going to do, let gravity finish Blake off, but before he would be able to get away, Blake grabbed him by his feet, and dragged him closer, adding a punch to the face, and then, stood on his stomach, effectively falling on Grimmjow and forcing him to take the worst of the fall. His bone armor cracked a bit, and he laughed

-"You're such a pathetic bug, I shouldn't have bothered!!"-

-"This pathetic bug is giving you a run for your money, ain't I?"-

Grimmjow growled in response, and dashed angrily toward Blake, who drew his sword and slashed him swiftly in the chest, and Blake said

-"You have more powers and abilities than me, but if you only fight like a beast blinded by rage, your power means nothing..."- Blake said, as he swung his sword to shake off the blood and put it back in its sheath (worn similarly to Trunks'. I don't really know how else to describe it)

-"You speak as if you were superior to me!! You feel you're going to beat me?! I...CAN'T..STAND THAT!!"- Grimmjow dashed toward Blake who blocked the incoming punch, and this time both received some damage, Blake got some wounds by Grimmjow's claws and Grimmjow got his armor further damaged by Blake's punches and kicks, Blake dashed backward and began firing several energy balls, which hit Grimmjow until he began countering with numerous Balas. Blake suddenly disappeared and reappeared several times in quick sucession, attempting to confuse Grimmjow, and managed to catch him off-guard, starting a ver fast combo of punches and kicks mostly to his stomach, then, jumped above him and with his two hands together, he said

Blake was breathing heavily, struggling to keep the transformation, which was costing his body too much effort. Grimmjow aimed his hand at him, and began to charge up a Cero, while Blake struggled to break free, and in a sudden burst of power, he did break free, kicked Pain away and punched Grimmjow in the stomach, which interrupted his charging up, and nullified the Cero he would've fired otherwise.

However, Blake, aware of the danger of letting those two get away, kept the transformation, and dashed toward Pain, exchaging some punches, as Blake overwhelmed him with his strength, while also dodged attacks from Grimmjow, Blake's aura grew slightly and punched Pain hard in the face, who crashed into a building's debris. Grimmjow stomped on Blake's back, and pinned him down

-"Was that it? All you could do?! Is this as far as you'll fight, human?! You're changing my mind about killing you, if you're this weak, you aren't worth my time"-

Blake struggled to get up, but his body didn't respond, his eyes lost their glow, but regained it, and it became more intense, as Blake was forcing himself beyond his own limits, his aura turned more electric like, and his muscles tightened to an extent that made obvious he was forcing himself, the chakra blades that wee still piercing his shoulders broke to pieces when his power increased as well. Blake stood up, and fired a golden beam right into Grimmjow's chest, pushing him away a few meters. Pain, whose resilience had been proved to be impressive, fought Blake again, mostly barehanded, but when he pulled out more chakra blades Blake drew his sword, and they clashed. Blake forced his energy to keep the increase, even if it was damaging his body from the inside, and extending his arms to each side, he fired two massive golden beams at Grimmjow and Pain, and they hit their target, causing two large explosions. Pain was more damaged, but Grimmjow, who protected himself with just his arms, seemingly avoided most of the damage by brute force

Blake fell to his knees, sweating and breathing with difficult. His whole body was struggling to maintain the transformation (Blake's hair reverted to normal and regained its transformed form in quick succession, as well as his eyes, which flashed from golden to green [spare body's eye color. his original body has black eyes]) Blake's aura also seemed to extinguish, but then grew again.

'He can achieve incredible power, but it puts a heavy strain on his whole body... something to expect from such techniques...' Pain thought, his Rinnegan allowed to somewhat see Blake's energy flow, although not as clearly as typical, as Blake's energy was different from what he knew (chakra). Blake was clenching his fists, and managed to hold his own against the two villains, despite each second Blake grew more tired, and weaker. Yet, he refused to be defeated, as he stood up again, charging up energy in his hands, while his eyes revealed anger, angst, and desperation. -"Strike with lightning force, devastating disaster, carve two tombs in the ground, eternal grief, burn the souls down to ashes, a blood sacrifice... Strike! Sacred Twin Pillars!!"-

Grimmjow and Pain had been locked in place when the incantation began, and both were hit from above by two massive golden energy pillars, which didn't immediately explode, but rather dug deep in the ground, and then exploded, with insane power. Blake finally lost the transformation, and fell unconscious. Grimmjow and Pain emerged from the huge craters though, this time, they sustained major damage, but were still angry, and seeing Blake was knocked out, approached to him, but a giant foot stomped in front of them, that foot belonging to Joana, who picked Blake up while aimed her other hand at the two villains. She was also healing Blake.

'That spell took longer, and Blake could barely do it... maybe he was right when he said those weren't meant for humans...' Joana thought, while also keeping an eye on Blake, as well as on Grimmjow and Pain, who dashed toward her, attemtping to attack her, she escaped using high speed (Not shoshitsu. Just raw physical high speed, called Godspeed according to Blaze) and began running away. She easily got a fair distance away but Pain and Grimmjow managed to keep up and soon they were getting closer to her, she stopped running and fought them with kicks and a single hand. Pain got stomped twice by Joana, but Grimmjow dodged all her attacks, until she began firing energy, which was massive due to her size (200 feet).

Grimmjow roared angrily, and rose up to Joana's eye level, then, he did a slashing motion with both hands, and that formed giant claws made of solidified energy

-"My strongest attack, Desgarrón (Laceration). I didn't expect I'd have to use against someone like you..."- He did another slashing motion, and the giant energy claws effectively hurt Joana, slashing her skin, although she protected Blake with both hands. Grimmjow tried to slash her in the neck to finish her off, but...

Blake had been fully healed and regained his energy once again, transformed and used his sword to stop Grimmjow's Desgarr'n, and fired a golden energy beam that destroyed it. He immediately increased his power up to seven times, and before going into fight, he said to Joana

-"Thanks. I was right when I said I would be nothing without you..."- Blake used shoshitsu to disappear, and reappeared above Grimmjow, punching him down into the ground. Blake landed safely and waited. He sensed danger, and dodged Pain's chakra blades. Blake now realized that he had decayed very quickly because he let those things touch him, and he already had felt that they distorted his energy in some way he couldn't describe. His aura grew, and some golden lightning bolts flashed around him, as he added

-"It won't be like the last time..."-

Pain exchanged punches and kicks with Blake, who was stronger than him, but was still surprised because Pain had taken so much damage and still could stand up. Just then, Blake could barely side step to dodge a blue beam, another Gran Rey Cero from Grimmjow, which caused a tremendous explosion, and actually hurt Joana in the process. Blake's eyes suddenly flashed in a brighter golden glow than usual

-"You're dead..."-

Blake used shoshitsu and combined that great speed with a punch, which Grimmjow blocked, but completely broke his left arm's armor, as it resulted in a powerful hit. Grimmjow slashed Blake but it wasn't a deep wound, and began to do many spinning kicks, which Blake dodged

-"Come on!! The fight's not over yet!!"- Grimmjow laughed maniacally as he kept trying to attack Blake, until he realized Pain wasn't attacking, and heard

-"Chibaku Tensei..."-

-"What the h...?!!"- Blake got cut off as a black sphere Pain created with his hands rose to the sky, shone in a strong golden light as it aligned with the sun, and began to attract everything to it, debris, parts of buildings, trees, the ground itself, the earth below the concrete as well... and Blake... who was getting attracted because a large piece of the ground below him began to rose up, and Blake jumped off it, but as he landed another part of the ground rose, as well as many around him, Blake kept jumping off them yet it was futile, despite his efforts he was getting closer to the giant mass that now looked like some sort of mini planet. Blake used shoshitsu, and began to regain some distance, and noticed Pain was getting really strained from the technique, however, Grimmjow shot several Balas, which, attracted by the growing gravitational force, hit Blake and pushed him toward the new celestial body.

Blake slammed against its surface, and began to shoot golden energy beams at the incoming pieces of earth, debris and rock, but it proved useless as they still piled on top oh him, and compressed further. Blake forced a lot of energy out of his body as an aura to escape it by brute force, but he wasn't able to, and soon all he could see was darkness, all he could feel was cold.

Blake fired several beams, piercing the giant earth mass, but the were rather small compared to its size, and it kept growing, its gravitational pull was weakening the buildings that still stood in the damaged city... While Grimmjow laughed

-"Who would've said such trash could have such technique?"- He said, although Pain ignored him

-"Excellent..."- Blaze said from afar, but his satisfaction didn't last as Joana, who had seen everything rushed toward Pain's Chibaku Tensei and punched it, causing some damage, and she realized that to her, it felt fragile, and added some more punches to weaken the sphere. Pain coughed, as he was straining himself further, but was helpless against the giant girl destroying his jutsu.

Grimmjow rushed toward her but a golden beam pushed him away, as Bake managed to break free when the sphere weakened, and shooting another beam, hitting its core, the whole sphere exploded, breaking to pieces... Joana aimed her hands at Blake, and they glowed in white light, as they were refilling his energy and healing the minor injuries he got.

-"Impossible!!"- Pain exclaimed when he saw one of his most powerful techniques fall apart, he fell to his knees in exhaustion. Blake used shoshitsu and appeared in front of him, and aiming his hand at him, fired a huge golden beam at point blank, which made a large hole in the city, next to the much larger one made by Pain's technique. Pain was still there and stood up, although his clothes were badly burnt, as well as himself. Grimmjow appeared behind Blake, but he elbowed him in the stomach and fired an energy ball to him, sending him away. Blake returned to his normal state to save energy.

It was then when Blaze got desperate, and said to Orochimaru

-"Send Frieza as well! We can't risk losing this battle"- Orochimaru said nothing, but nodded, a bit reluctantly as he didn't like to take orders from Blaze, but if he was immortal for real, Orochimaru would just have to find a way to steal his secret for himself... Frieza flew rather slowly toward them (by the way he's in his first form). He quietly stood before Blake, Grimmjow and Pain, the latter two felt his immense power, and reluctantly, stayed away. Blake due to his inability to feel powers couldn't really tell, but he was aware Frieza was probably a whole lot stronger than these guys...

'If this were a dream where I could do anything this would be great... but limited to my real power, I'm not sure if I can even hurt him... I mean, he destroys planets like nothing!! I can barely blow up a building...' Blake thought, however, he stood in a fighting pose, while telling himself 'Just keep aware. Look at every detail... Don't lose your composure...' He transformed in his light form, his hair rose up and spiked upward, while his eyes changed to golden, and a flame-like aura surrounded him, which immediately became more electric-like as Blake increased his power 7x. His muscles tightened and a few golden lightning bolts flashed around him, and rushed toward Frieza, punching him in the face as he didn't react, and actually pushed him away a few meters, as he underestimated Blake, however, he was unharmed

-"Was that all you could do?"- Frieza asked, although the fact Blake had a golden aura surrounding him still made him uncomfortable, Blake's answer was two golden beams that hit Frieza, and exploded, but Frieza didn't have a single scratch. Blake put both palms on the ground and said

-"Purify, Soul Vanisher... Bring the judgement of light..."- A circle made of golden light formed below Frieza, and locked him in place, a heptagram symbol appeared within the circle as well, and Blake continued

-"Consume the darkness, sentence to death... Incinerate, heavenly lights!!"- Seven pillars of fire-like golden light emerged from each tip, which continued to grow, fusing into a single, wide light pillar, which engulfed Frieza, and rose up into the sky (This one was larger and more powerful than the one used on Grimmjow, because Blake used it at full strength). After the smoke dissipated, Frieza was still there, with only minor injuries

-"That's enough!!"- Frieza disappeared and before Blake could even blink, Frieza was behind him and as he turned around, he kicked him in the face, sending Blake away several hundred meters, and crashing though several buildings. Frieza appeared before him, and stomped on his head, pushing it further into the ground. Blake felt as if that single kick nearly broke everything inside him, and struggled to stand up, but he was unable to, as Frieza's power was overwhelming. Still his aura grew an he was puting all his might into trying to get up, but all his efforts were futile. Annoyed, Frieza looked at Grimmjow and Pain, who were heavily damaged and tired

-"And you couldn't take down this kid?!"-

Grimmjow growled angrily but refrained from attacking, as he felt Frieza's tremendous power, as well as that he had seen him defeat Blake with a single hit, while they fought evenly. Pain also kept from answering, as he could feel and somewhat see the immense power within Frieza. However, he opened is eyes wide as Blake managed to use shoshitsu to get away, although only a few meters, as he was quickly decaying... Blake was breathing heavily, bleeding, and in horrible pain, his aura shrank and it began to fade. He attempted another shoshitsu to escape but Frieza was already in front of him...

Jak quickly dashed toward Nostory, delivering a punch to his gut, and firing a energy blast to knock him back a little. Jak was surprised a bit, he had certainly gotten stronger in his Omega Form, and it almost seemed normal to him, as the strain from when he first used the transformation exhausting. But after training, numerous battles, and insane dreams, Jak was better prepared and ready to take on challenges.

Jasmine was handling Seth pretty well, and of course had more than 3 years of fighting two deamons. But now, secretly, Jasmine was a little happy that Jak could defend himself. She didn't have to fill in anymore for the both of them. But she always vowed to protect Jak at all times. And she was glad Jak understood why she would stay by that promise.


"I don't get what's going on?" Jak said. "Why is this happening, why is there a dream again?"

"Not sure why." Jasmine said. "It wasn't us again!"

"Did you guys get knocked out as well?" Jak said. "If you guys ended up falling asleep too, I have a feeling that something sinister is behind it this time."

"Y-yes." Jasmine said, fearing the worst. "We literally just woke up. And we weren't supposed to be asleep again. Unless Nostory and Blaze had something to do this." Jasmine fired a energy blast toward Nostory, who was going to attack Jak from behind.

"Nice one," Jak said. "Oh by the way, DUCK!" Jasmine immediately realized what Jak meant as he flew up to Seth and delivered a devastating knee to his face. And then Jak used a new technique to follow Seth without flying after him, as he instantly transported to where Seth was about to land.

"H-how?" Seth said. "You weren't supposed to be this strong! This isn't right at all!"

"You got to realize this, beat down was coming." Jak said.

Jak focused his energy into both his hands, kicked Seth upward, and stood there for a minute. Seth was able to recover in mid-air.

"You didn't pursue after me, boy!" Seth said. "You actually think you're well experienced?"

Jak then transported behind him. "Well, hey this is easier sometimes, and with a strong left hand punch, he sent Seth flying toward Jasmine. Jasmine then delivered a heavy kick, which was pretty painful, as we know Jasmine is about 200 feet tall, and that shouldn't end well. Then to top it all off, Jak, who hadn't used his right hand that was filled with energy, flew toward Seth at an amazing speed, and literally crashed into him, placing his hand on Seth's chest.

"This is impossible..." Seth said.

"Impossible is nothing." Jak said. "I call this one Drill Cannon."

Jak then unleashed a large current of energy point blank into Seth's upper torso. Jak also was flying upward as the beam was" drilling" (hence the name) Seth. After a few seconds of the blast being fired. Seth was barely moving, and was severely injured. Jasmine started to give Jak a round of applause.

"Bravo, Luigi-Boogums," Jasmine said, giving him a big hug and kiss.

"Well, you know..." Jak slightly blushed. "I've been trying to develop my own fighting style. But we're not done here yet."

"I know," Jasmine said. "I'll go assist Joana, you should probably help Blake with- Is that Frieza?"

"Don't be random, why would-" Jak then turned around and saw Frieza. "That's not a power to take lightly, even at his first form."

"Be careful." Jasmine said.

"You too." Jak said, smiling. "I promise I'll be fine. And by the way, I don't think Seth wasn't fighting me seriously, or at full strength."

"He didn't?" Jasmine said. "You roughed him up pretty bad, but we'll talk about this later. You just go help Blake."

Jak gave Jasmine a thumbs up and dashed toward Frieza and Blake.

"You sure are making this boring..." Frieza said.

Jak then side blinded Frieza and kicked him away a far distance. Blake face was O_O

"Hey there buddy." Jak said. "And Trust me when I say this. That kick I just landed was possibly the luckiest kick I'll get against Frieza. He seems to be quite strong in his first form."

"I'd say." Blake said.

"I know you've said you don't like to have an advantage when fighting, but I'm asking you as a friend here. Can I please help you fight Frieza?" Jak said. "I felt the power that he has before I got here, and plus I don't want Doctor Powerman to be spazzing out over your body again."

Blake thought about it...

-"Fight him, and somehow profit from it..."- Blake replied, throwing away the book. Then he and Jak transformed, Jak into his first Omega form, while Blake went all-out with the light form sevenfold. Then, both of them dashed toward Frieza as fast as they could. Blake and Jak disappeared right before Frieza, catching him off guard, as they quickly reappeared, Blake connected a fast punching combo and sent him away with a kick, Jak caught up and kept punching Frieza before he crashed into another building, then, Blake reappeared, and both fired a golden and a white beam, respectively, hitting Frieza, causing a large explosion and causing it to collapse...

Blake reverted to his normal form, and gave Jak a thumbs up

-"Team attack WIN!!"-

-"I wouldn't agree with that..."- Frieza's voice as heard, as he rose from the debris left from the collapsed building -"You really called that an attack? Even my weakest soldiers would be more than enough to take care of you..."-

-"Well, where are they, Mr. emperor of the galaxy?"- Blake mocked, guessing that if Frieza was revived from the dead he had long lost all his conquests, Frieza only gave them a death glare, and when he took a step forward, a golden beam struck Frieza from above, and just then he noticed Blake disappeared from being next to Jak. Blake added a lot of golden energy balls, and as he fell, he also fired several beams, all of them hit Frieza... however, he was only lightly burnt

-"This isn't good... I'm sure those attacks would've damaged Blaze..."- Blake said while landing safely, again, reverting from light x7 form to normal to conserve energy

-"I guess this is what happens when you bring beings from other universes..."-

Meanwhile, Demon Blake was fighting second form Ulquiorra, it was an even fight, but Ulquiorra began to tire out, as his constant regeneration was costing a lot of energy, and Demon Blake seemed to regenerate no matter what and retain all his strength and stamina. He started to get desperate, but wouldn't show it, and put his hands together creating a ball of green energy, then he said

-"Lanza del Relámpago"- he formed a spear made of green energy, and just then, Demon Blake appeared in close range to attack with punches, Ulquiorra dashed backward and threw the spear, which seemed to be going to hit Demon Blake, but he disappeared in the last moment... quickly reappearing, with an evil smile...

Back to Frieza and the guys, Blake transformed once again into his light x7 form, and Jak asked

-"Doesn't it waste lot of energy to keep transforming and reverting?"-

-"Nowhere near what it takes to keep this form, and let's not speak of the physical strain..."- Blake replied, and both guys remained silent for like a minute, then Blake said

-"Alright!! IT'S HELL, THE PAIN!!"- Blake shouted, and noticed a certain orange haired ninja popping out of nowhere -"Not THAT Pain...."- Blake added, and Pain disappeared -"Anyway, can we fight the bad guy now?"- Blake asked

-"DUCK!!"- Jak shouted

-"Jak, don't be random... what has a duck to do with th-OMGWT..."- Blake quickly ducked, as Jak did, and a spear of green energy flew past them, hitting Frieza, and causing a monstrous explosion...

Blake and Jak got up, watching the immense fire that followed the explosion -"Talk about luck..."- Blake said

-"Yeah..."-

-"THAT'S ENOUGH!!"- They heard Frieza shout, and before they could react, Frieza appeared, punching Blake and Jak in the stomach, and sending them hundreds of meters away from the tremendous force.

-"Hey, we didn't even fire that thing..."- Blake said, dusting his jacket off, Jak only facepalmed himself, and said

-"Will we fight the bad guy or what?"-

-"I guess..."- Blake said, transforming again, this time, he started to gather energy in his hands. Golden lightning bolts were flashing around them, as the power intensified

-"Do you have an idea about what you're doing?"- Jak asked Blake, but Blake didn't respond, and kept on charging for at least one more minute, after which he replied

-"No..."- Blake then fired a wide yellow/golden beam from his left hand, which Frieza didn't bother dodging, Jak then noticed Blake had disappeared and was behind Frieza, and fired another equally powerful beam from his right hand. Frieza was heard muttering something, before the enormous explosion drowned all other sounds. Blake disappeared and quickly reappeared next to Jak, reverting to his normal form

-"That had to be my luckiest attack on Frieza..."- Blake said, breathing a bit heavily from the effort -"Bardock would've been proud..."- Jak gave Blake a thumbs up and nodded

-"That saiyan? He was a weakling... but still was far better than that"- Frieza said, appearing suddenly before the guys

-"FRIEZA... Y U NO DIE?!"- Blake said [Check out the meme if you haven't already]. He then looked around, and realizing what he just had done, cleared his throat and said -"I mean... WHY AREN'T YOU FREAKING DEAD ALREADY?"-

-"It takes more to kill the Emperor of the Universe..."- Frieza replied

'Hmm... the guy goes for the same tittle I intend for myself... I'll get rid of him later...' Blaze thought, before dodging a punch from the still giant sized Joana, who decided to take care of him directly. Jasmine tried to kick him but failed, and destroyed a building in the process. Blaze disappeared and appeared on top of another building, saying

-"Ladies. You should think more of the environment before..."- Blaze was interrupted by a powerful sound, as he got caught between Joana's and Jasmine's open hands, crushing him like an insect.

-"Eww... Blake was right about calling Blaze disgusting..."- Jasmine said as she wiped the remains of Blaze off her hand

-"Still not as bad as scorpions..."- Joana said, wiping off her hand as well, while Jasmine stared at her with a confused look

-"I HATE scorpions..."- Joana said, but in her mind, she said 'I think they're damn terrifying...' Jasmine nodded, Joana not knowing she read her thought.

-"That wasn't very nice of you..."- Blaze said, on top of yet another building.

-"BUT WHAT THE...?!!"- Joana said

-"I'm immortal. GET OVER IT"- Then he cracked his knuckles, and said -"I guess I'll have to teach you some life lessons... before I kill you..."-

Back to Frieza and the guys...

Frieza was giving both Blake and Jak the most monumental ass-kicking of their lives, any attack they tried was useless, and Frieza didn't bother dodging their attacks, instead, showing them how useless they were by taking them and coming out practically unharmed. Blake and Jak also attempted to use their speed, but it was no match for Frieza's, and after crashing into many buildings, Frieza tossed Jak away, and began to strangle Blake with his tail, saying

-"There's something about you I just don't like..."- His tail tightened its grip on Blake's neck, and Blake remembered the fight in the anime, and proceeded to give a strong bite to Frieza's tail, who flinches and releases him from the sudden pain, screams

-"AGAIN?!"-

Blake spits and wipes off his mouth, saying

-"Who said anime didn't teach people how to save their lives?"-
