1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
[WARNING: There might be gore/gore-like content, although it was not the intention. By the way, I'm not sure if Frieza is out of character, but keeping in mind he's in another universe, I guess I'm just trying my best.


Blake dashed backward, slightly hurt from the near strangling he got from Frieza, and somewhat damaged from their struggle of a fight. Jak and Blake got knocked off their feet when the ground shook powerfully, although for just a mere moment, and, a few meters away from them, Ulquiorra had fallen to the ground, and cuased a large hole in it. Above, was Demon Blake, crossing his arms, with a wicked smile similar to Blaze's

-"Pretty good, at least better than Blaze and his lame lackeys..."- He said

-"Why you?!!"- Blaze, Nostory and Seth found themselves looking like the Y U NO meme, and then cleared their throats and muttered -"Let's pretend this didn't happen"-

-"Meh. Who's Next?"- Demon Blake added arrogantly, and looked at Frieza and the battle-damaged Jak and Blake

-"Aww c'mon guys, you can't defeat that cheap Alien ripoff? Seriously?"-

-"WHAT DID YOU JUST SAY?!!"- Frieza exclaimed angrily

-"Why bother talking to a mutant lizard?"- Dark Blake added, descending in front of Blake and Jak, facing Frieza -"Enough child play. The pros will fight..."- He said, to Blake and Jak

-"Are you freaking stupid? Not even you can fight Frieza!! He destroys PLANETS like nothing..."- Blake said

-"Yes, PLANETS!! Are you out of your mind?"- Jak said

-"Answer 1, meh, planet destruction is overrated... and 2, I'm not out of my mind, I'm out of his..."- Demon Blake replied, pointing at Blake, who facepalmed himself

-"Jak let's make a bet, if the idiot lasts less than than 5 seconds against Frieza, I get your PS3 and your games..."- Blake proposed

-"And if he lasts longer?"- Jak said

-"Then you get... ummm... Joana?"-

-"WHAT?!!!"- Joana's voice boomed

-"Just kidding..."- Blake said with a nervous smile, and whispered to Jak -"Ok you get my Wii and all my games if you win the bet..."-

-"Deal"-

Blake and Jak noticed there was a cinema behind them, and decided to get in, grab popcorn and sodas, and climbed to its top to watch the fight. Frieza had been dusting himself off, and prepared himself for the fight

-"Bring it on, freak!!"- Demon Blake said, assuming Blake's fighting stance, something never seen before.

-"I'll let you try your attack first, to show you how..."- Frieza was speaking arrogantly when Demon Blake disappeared, to quickly reappear in front of him, punch him hard in the stomach, quickly reappear behind him, and kick him with tremendous force, sending him crashing through several buildings, and yet again, reappeared above him to connect an impressive air combo at an insane speed, then, punching him, sending him downward with even more force, causing somewhat of a quake and a very deep hole in the ground. Not content with this, Demon Blake added a gigantic black beam that made an explosion that rivaled that of Ulquiorra's lanza del relámpago...

Demon Blake crossed his arms, smiling, and said

-"That's how a real pro fights..."-

Both Blake and Jak had o.O O.o faces

-"BUT HOW STRONG IS THAT BASTARD?!!"- Blake shouted

-"I don't know, but, one thing for sure, it'd suck have him as a neighbor..."- Jak said, Blake stared at him with a face that only could say 'Are you kidding me?'

However, Frieza's voice was heard, laughing

-"Did you think that would hurt? Maybe you're stronger than the two little fools, but you're still weaker than the bald saiyan monkey..."-

-"So... we're weaker than Nappa... seriously?..."- Blake said with a ._. face

-"Well, Nappa destroys cities..."- Jak added

-"WHAT?!! Nobody mocks me!!"- Demon Blake shouted, and charged at Frieza, who didn't bother dodging, and caught his fist, while the ground behind him cracked. Demon Blake began to glow into his black aura, powering up, but Frieza was still stopping his fist single handedly. Demon Blake grew angrier, and his dark aura became more flame-like, and then with black electric bolts flashing randomly around him, his muscles tightened and the veins became more visible, and added another punch with his other hand, only for Frieza to stop both, and the surrounding area cracked more, and began to break. Demon Blake forced even more energy, making his aura similar to Blake's light sevenfold state, that is, looking rather electric like than flame-like, and the concrete collapsed and sunk. But Frieza wasn't even bothering on increasing his power, after a minute, he grew bored, and threw Demon Blake away like a toy, with a force that made Demon Blake's previous hit look weak.

He crashed through a lot of buildings and in the last one, it collapsed as well. Demon Blake's aura grew larger, blowing away the debris around him, and stood, heavily damaged and angrier than ever. It even seemed that his healing factor was having trouble dealing with all the damage.

-"So, now you know who are you messing with, right?"- Frieza said -"I'm tired of this game..."- Frieza aimed his hand and fired an energy blast, which Demon Blake laughed at, and intended to wave away with his right hand, but, on contact, it exploded, and Demon Blake's entire right arm had been destroyed, and he had an utter confused-angry expression, while he stared at where it used to be his arm, now a burned hole, that still bled a bit

-"You thought you were powerful enough to just wave that attack away? You should have dodged. I hate the crybabies that excuse themselves for being disabled in a fight..."-

Demon Blake's face revealed some pain, but his arm reformed, although slower than previous regenerations, and it was briefly seen how the bones formed first, then the muscles, nerves and finally the skin. He even opened and closed his hand just to make sure. Jak remembered how in the fight against Aizen and Blaze, Dark Blake (Blake possessed by his dark side out of anger and desperation) seemed overpowered, took a lot of damage without flinching, and regenerated wounds like they were nothing... Frieza was definitively far beyond that level of power...

-"YOU...WILL...NOT...GET AWAY WITH THIS!!"- Demon Blake disappeared, but Frieza only moved slightly, dodging Demon Blake's incoming punch, and before he could react, he punched him hard in the stomach, and hit him with his tail, and appeared above him to finish with a barrage of energy blasts.

Demon Blake looked this time almost like a zombie missing part of his left side, and the right forearm, as well as horrible overall damage. But he healed back once again

-"You're beginning to become real annoying..."- Frieza said

-"Well, that's impressive... Demon Blake can take some punishment from Frieza and is still not destroyed..."- Jak said -"Hey, that means, I WIN YOUR WII..."-

-"Like I'd give away my Wii..."- Blake laughed, and Jak looked down

-"However, Frieza is not even fighting full powered and you know it... and I think Demon Blake might be destroyed if this keeps on..."-

-"Won't you help him or something? I thought you wouldn't let him die because he's a part of your soul and that..."- Jak said

-"Meh. He can burn in hell..."- Blake replied

-"Thanks for the appreciation..."- Demon Blake answered, although pain could be noticed in his voice

-"Go kill yourself already"- Blake replied

-"Umm, Blake... he's been covering us... he's taking on an enemy that we couldn't even hurt a little bit..."- Jak said, after thinking a bit more deeply about the situation, Blake thought about what Jak said, and remained silent

-"Come on, if all you can do is cause wounds then you'll never win!! Fight like a... whatever you are..."- Demon Blake stood in Blake's fighting stance, waiting for Frieza to attack, he just laughed, and disappeared. Demon Blake couldn't even feel where did it come from, but he felt an insanely fast barrage of punches, and kicks. Then, Frieza pierced through his chest with one of his fists. Still with his forearm through Demon Blake's chest, he said

-"Will you heal from this?"- Then he proceeded to blow away Demon Blake's head with an energy beam, finally letting the headless hollowed body fall down. -"By your looks I can tell that he was the strongest one on your side... so... can't you just give up and finish this?"-

Blake and Jak were shocked... even when Blake sorta wished for it, it was shocking to see someone who looked like himself die that horribly, and, since he always seemed to be an indestructible berserker, it didn't seem as likely that Demon Blake would reach his limits and die. Blake and Jak transformed, and looking at each other, Blake said

-"I guess it's up to us..."- However, Frieza appeared before them, and knocked them down with a swipe from his tail, then, aimed both hands at them

-"I'm not in the mood for more games, surrender or die"-

Blake and Jak moved swiftly, and fired energy balls at Frieza, who only dusted off his shoulders, and when he attempted to fire an energy blast, Demon Blake appeared, taking it himself, and exploding. Now all what remained was blood, and shapeless remains that were probably burned tissue, but it all reformed back into Demon Blake, and said

-"I'm not dead you idiot!!"-
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Frieza > Demon Blake, basic math...

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
-"I guess we have to take him down all at once..."- Demon Blake said, still not looking at neither Jak or Blake

-"Like we have a choice"- Jak replied

-"GUYS!! WHY CAN'T YOU UNDERSTAND FRIEZA IS STRONGER THAN US?!!"- Blake asked a bit angry

-"Umm, because if we don't fight, Blaze, Nostory and Seth will capture us and most likely kill us or use us for evil purposes?"- Jak said

-"I don't agree either, except for the evil purposes. But I'm nobody's pet!!"- Demon Blake added

-"Am I the only one with a working brain here?"-

-"Does it matter the answer?"- Demon Blake said, and Blake muttered 'No' as he looked down in disappointment

-"3 little bugs trying to gang up on me... why doesn't it surprise me?"- Frieza said, and charged at them, Demon Blake catching his forearms in an attempt to lock him, while Blake assumed the sevenfold light form and Jake the Omega form, and shot energy beams at the former galactic emperor. However he was still unharmed, and disappeared, appearing behind Blake, and knocking him down with his tail, and without looking back, blocked Jak's attacks only using the tail, then turned around and blasted him with an energy ball.

Demon Blake punched Frieza in the face, shaking the ground and cracking the concrete beneath them, but Frieza didn't even move an inch, and grabbed Demon Blake's right arm, and ripped it off, but taking a little advantage of the moment, Demon Blake shot a point blank black energy beam at Frieza with his remaining arm. However, Frieza was still unharmed, and still holding Demon Blake's arm, clenched his hand, crushing it. Demon Blake grew the lost arm back and dashed backward a bit. Instead of going for him, Frieza went for Blake and Jak who were getting up.

The 2 guys tried a combined beam but Frieza deflected it, hitting a nearby building, making it collapse. Then, aiming his hand at them. shot another energy ball, but Demon Blake appeared in front of them and took it himself. After the smoke vanished, it was seen that Demon Blake had lost both arms and was partially hollowed at the chest - stomach from the explosion. He regenerated it all, but was breathing heavily

-"This... doesn't seem like a fight... this seems to be rather an onslaught..."- He said

-"Finally you understand it. Even one of the humans I killed once time ago was far stronger than this..."- Frieza said arrogantly

Blake and Jak stared at him with blank faces, the human he was referring to was obviously Krillin... and now they fully understood how nightmarish was Frieza in his WEAKEST state

-"I guess all I have left to say is, it was nice to fight along you..."- Blake said, reassuming the sevenfold light form

-"Aww don't ruin the fun of this, you are supposed to be terrified before dying..."- Frieza complained, he then laughed and pointed his hand at them, ready to fire a lethal beam. However, he felt a sudden pain, it was Rocky, giving one of his strongest bites to Frieza's tail. Then, Tabitha, Max, and D'Artagnan arrived near Blake, Jak and Demon Blake. Frieza was comically trying to get Rocky to let go of his tail

-"A galactic emperor that destroys planets... struggles with a dog biting his tail...?"- Blake and Jak wondered, while holding their laughter, and Demon Blake began to laugh hysterically until he fell, rolling in the floor laughing. After a while, Frieza could, after several attempts, get his tail released, although it got a deep mark and bled a bit, Rocky jumped backward, near the others. Blake gave him a thumbs up

-"Good one"-

Frieza said nothing, but aimed a finger at them, and shot a thin beam, Demon Blake shot a wide black beam to counter it, but it was being pushed back by the thinner beam. Blake and Jak added their energy beams to aid Demon Blake, and with a lot of effort, they managed to win the energy struggling and hit Frieza, who this time had covered himself with his arms and tail in a defensive position.

Blake, Jak and Demon Blake were all breathing heavily, it had taken a lot of effort to beat Frieza's beam. Frieza dashed toward them, taking everyone by surprise, punching Blake, kicking Jak, and stopping Rocky from biting him, then threw him away and dodged Max and Tabitha's slashes, however, before he could punch them D'Artagnan kicked him from behind and also bit his tail, using it as a grip to throw Frieza away.

Jak got up, Blake, who had lost the transformation reassumed it, and Demon Blake stood up as well. Frieza dusted himself off, and said

-"More pests to take care of. This isn't fun anymore..."-

The desperation was clearly visible in Demon Blake's eyes, even when they lacked pupils and irises, and saying no words, went back into Blake, giving him his power. Blake looked almost like Demon Blake except he still had irises and pupils. The feeling of dark power within him wasn't one Blake was really used to, but he could feel his energy refilling, his wounds healing, and an immense, growing power. For the first time though, there isn't that evil influence trying to take over his thoughts. Jak had his jaw dropped when seeing all this

-"Desperate measures I guess. Knowing the jerk, probably this kind of thing will never happen again..."- Blake said, and stood in a fighting stance. A bit curious to test the dark powers near freely for the first time in his life. Jak decided to also increase the bets, and forced the muscled transformation to increase his power. Bake's pets quickly came to their side, but Blake said

-"Thank you. But I'm afraid only Jak and me can fight him..."- They knew Blake was serious about this, and obeyed. Blake's voice had a slight metallic tone to it though.

Blake and Jak charged at Frieza, this time, engaging into an exchange of punches and kicks, Jak got some lucky punches and Blake then kicked Friea into a building, destroying it, but knowing that wasn't enough, added a barrage of black energy balls. Frieza emerged from the smoke, and smiled

-"Who would've thought you could still deliver a bit of entertainment?"-

Frieza charged at Jak, but disappeared, going for Blake instead, who managed to stop both of Frieza's fists, and engaging into a struggle of brute strength. Blake decided to push his luck, and increased his power, more and more, and there was no strain. His power had gotten past the level achieved with the sevenfold golden aura, although not by too much. His muscles were tightening, and his black aura got black electric bolts flashing randomly around it. Even with this power increase, Frieza was much stronger, but Blake kneed him in the stomach, which caught him off guard, and Blake took the chance to get released from the struggle, and dashed a few meters backward.

Meanwhile, Blaze suddenly felt something strange, and turning to see, he noticed Blake was fused with his dark form, although not completely. He said, with some desperation in his voice

-"Orochimaru!! Tell your minions to take Blake down NOW!!"-

While Orochimaru said nothing, Pain, Ulquiorra and Grimmjow appeared in front of Blake, who extended his left arm outward and attracted his sword (which had been left on a building's top). Jak also quickly came by Blake's side, as well as his pets. This had gone past the hell category. Everyone charged, with Blake's pets taking on Pain, Jak taking on Grimmjow, leaving Blake against Ulquiorra and Frieza.

-"I have already fought your aberration of nature friend, and I'm mostly sure being merged with you tones down his powers... Why fight a lost battle? It's beyond my comprehension..."-

-"I could tell you why, but I won't bother..."- Blake said, disappearing*, catching Ulquiorra off-guard, and punching him with great force in the stomach, sending him away, he then swapped the sword from his left to his right hand, and attacked Frieza, who overconfidently, blocked the blade with his forearm, and got cut, and Blake's slashes actually did small cuts on Frieza, but he fired an energy blast, which Bake shielded from with the sword, and before exploding the blast did push him back a bit, allowing Frieza to get a bit away.

Blake then senses danger, and barely dodged a green Cero beam from Ulquiorra, Blake then fired a black beam at him, but Ulquiorra deflected it away with his hand, and said

-"Just like I said... weaker than the beast alone... fusing with you was a stupid decision on his part"-

'Agh!! That bastard!! Let me take over and I'll destroy every single particle of him!!' Demon Blake spoke inside Blake's mind

'No excuse for taking over will ever work... just give me your damn power without restrictions...' Blake replied

'You don't deserve to use my demonic abilities!!'

'Then we're both dead... and remember, you die if I do...'

'I hate you so much... still no...'

'Do you have any other idea?'

*Even when Blake is partially merged with his dark side, it still retains the full abilities from him, and as such, Blake still can't use the demonic Rakurai for fast movement, and still needs Shoshitsu. Also Blake still can't fly. Other than that, he has the strength, agility, reflexes, healing factor and high destructive dark energy attacks... by the way, if it doesn't seem obvious, Blake cannot perform spells in this state.
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Blake might dine in hell tonight...

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
'Actually yes...' Demon Blake replied, however, he was cut off as Blake dodged an incoming cero from Ulquiorra, who then aimed his hand at him, saying

-"In your univerese, you might be a being of darkness. However, it's weak. I will show you true darkness..."- He then muttered -"Cero Oscuras"- And fired the infamous black cero, which was too fast for Blake to dodge. The explosion was so immense everyone moved away from it, as it destroyed almost all of the city at once. Once it ceased, Joana, desperated, (still giant sized) rushed toward where the explosion's center had been.

Blake thought he was going to die, but he was still alive... although he was in a lot of pain, and his body was badly damaged. He then found that his whole body was badly burned, and could barely move, but began to regenerate.

'You owe me a big one... that's the kind of attacks only I can survive...' Demon Blake said, and ocne Blake was fully healed and his energy fully recovered, he defused from Blake, and said

-"I have an idea, but it will take a few minutes for it to work. I need you to buy time..."-

-"Are you FREAKING kidding me?"- I might hold my own against Ulquiorra for a bit, but against Frieza, I'm no match... and in the longer run, neither for Ulquiorra..."- Blake replied -"I need you to fight these..."- Blake stopped when Demon Blake disappeared, and shouted to the skies -"You BASTARD!!"-

-"Can you surrender without opposing resistance?"- Ulquiorra asked, but Blake answered with a punch in his golden aura x7 form. -"I guess not..."- He hit Blake using his tail, which he blocked, but still damaged his arm somewhat. Frieza appeared behind Blake, ready to attack, but a giant fist struck him from above. Blake looked up, and saw Joana, who was angry and worried.

-"I appreciate the reinforcements"- Blake said, but was lifted and got a near crushing hug from his girlfriend, and after a few seconds she let go of him, and he said

-"I know why you're worried... I thought I was dead too... the jerk actually saved me this time..."- Joana kissed him, and then he said -"Not to ruin the moment, but we have an insanely powerful bat guy and a planet destroying emperor wanting to kill me right now..."- Blake jumped from Joana's hand, and Frieza flew toward him, their fists clashed mid air, but Blake smiled and said -"Lol... Bye..."-, and kicked Frieza to gain impulse to jump to Joana's shoulder. Frieza was falling down, but he stopped, and before he could do anything, Joana kicked him away like a football.

-"Why you---?!!!"- Frieza said as he disappeared into the distance

-"Field goal win"- Blake added

-"Cero osc..."- Ulquiorra appeared in front of Blake, and was about to fire another cero oscuras*, but Joana swatted him down, saying

-"I hate bugs"-

Blake laughed and gave Joana a thumbs up. However, they knew it wasn't over, and Blake would better buy time for whatever crazy idea Demon Blake might have got to defeat these guys.

[NOTE: This chapter was intended to be the last part of the previous one... character limit prevented it... anyway, it got delayed because I got caught in exams week and my backup of this precise chapter was damaged, so I rewrote it from my own memory.]




*By the way, cero oscuras is gramatically incorrect in spanish lol. Cero oscuro would be the right translation for dark zero. Just saying XD.

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"Your strong...Very Fast, and you have decent power in your hits."

The voice came from Grimmjow, who was battling Jak. Jak didn't know what to expect. He just tried to play this slowly and comfortably as possible. Jak knew that his opponent has a extremely short temper, and is extremely violent.

"I try..." Jak said. "You're not too bad yourself...I admire your hand to hand combat skill."

Grimmjow smiled, and then punched Jak in the face. "Felt that one..." Jak thought as he went flying. After going through a few boulders, Jak was sitting down a bit to rest. Suddenly, Grimmjow appeared before him. And before anything could be said, Jak was kicked, and unfortunately, his right arm was hit...

"Was that your arm?" Grimmjow sneered. "That was your arm...what a shame."

Jak could only clutch it in pain, and it wasn't sprained, and it hurt like hell, but Jak had to buy time for Blake. Jak dashed toward Grimmjow, and vanished at the last second. Grimmjow was confused for a moment, and was delivered a blow to his face. Jak had caught the Arrancar off-guard, knocking him back a bit. Grimmjow was suprised, and angry at this, so he immediately teleported behind Jak.

"You insolent fool." Grimmjow said, angrily. "Do you who the hell-"

Jak immediately shot a ball of energy in his face. Grimmjow screamed, and then Jak kicked him in the chest, and this action caused the Arrancar to cough up blood, and Jak was starting to find his groove in this fight, and it seemed that he'd do just fine...until suddenly he found himself in a situation where Grimmjow used his Zanpakutō to fight now. Jak started to dodge a lot of the hits, ducking, flying, and even shooting energy beams at Grimmjow, but it was either dodged or deflected by this manic.

"You know, your combat skills are pretty good." Grimmjow said, "but my Zanpakutō skill is also excellent, as I've been trained well..." Then his hallow mask started to form around his face. "But now I think we've had enough playing around haven't we?"

Jak looked up and started to fly away, trying to formulate a plan to dodge this crazy guy. He was running out of ki, due to using it on Frieza and also had to fight Seth, and Nostory earlier. Grimmjow appeared before Jak again, now pointing the sword at Jak's neck. Jak started to close his eyes, and hope for the best, and then Jasmine kicked Grimmjow as she appereared on the scene.

"Jasmine?" I thought you were fighting the Seth and Shadow. "

"I was,but I need to make sure you were okay. Jasmine said, winking, "Besides when we work together,we do some serious damage."

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Meanwhile, with Jak...

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"Well, at least you're here now." Jak smiled. "But we have to careful around this guy. He's dual threat Jas. He not on;y has a Zanpakutō, but his hand to hand skills are amazing."

"You act like this is new to me," Jasmine said, and she opened her hand for Jak to jump in. "You're going to get better Luigi-Boougms. All it takes is time and practice."

Jasmine then kissed Jak, and suddenly the sourness and pain in his right arm went away. Jak smiled and then was given a big hug by his girlfriend. However, the loving moment wouldn't last too long, as Grimmjow was flying toward Jasmine, and he has hoping to catch her off guard. But Jasmine, being the spunky girl that she's been known to be, Jak found himself in her cleavage...

"Uh Jasmine..." Jak said. "I know we've haven't had time to-"

"Give me a minute," Jasmine said. "I wasn't finished with the hug."

Grimmjow was closing in fast, only to be hit by a gigantic fist, and he would have the O_O' expression along with saying "You stupid....." With his voice quickly fading out.

"This is why I love you." Jak said. "I guess you can finish the hug now."

"Of course," Jasmine said, embracing her tiny boyfriend once more. "That is how you also give a proper huge, Jak. You can't just HUG like you're trying to snap your boyfriend in half!" Jasmine yelled the last part super loud. Joana then slightly looked at Jasmine but continued her fight. Blake also sneezed for no apparent reason. Jak immediately laughed as well.

Grimmjow wasn't feeling it right now. He knew he had Jak done for, but this girl, to had came in and make him look like trash. However, Grimmjow wasn't going to allow himself to be defeated. Even if it meant pushing his power to the highest level.
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Jasmine is kind of a fighting deamons pro, Jak.

choices: What is Demon Blake's Plan, and what does it involve?
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Grimmjow was giving Jak everything he had, trying to eliminate him. Jak eventually settled down, and realized that he didn't need to win, but just stall for time. Blake and Joana were handing Frieza and Ulquiorra pretty well, since Joana hates bugs, and Blake, well Frieza was the only one to take on. Surprisingly, Jasmine was letting Jak take on Grimmjow by himself, and this was good for her, as she wasn't going to try and hinder him from battling, unless she absolutely had to.

"Go Jak!" Jasmine was cheering. "I'll be here if you need me!" She had the ^_^ expression.

"Thanks!" Jak said, as he smiled slightly, and then he continued to fight Grimmjow. And things were going well, until Jak saw a flying Frieza coming towards him. Jak dodged being hit by Frieza, as the self-proclamed Galactic Emperor crashed into a boulder.

"Sorry about that Jak..." Joana said. "Didn't see you there..."

"It's cool," Jak said. "You guys seem to be holding up well against Frieza..."

"Yup." Blake appeared alongside Jak. "I guess we can go back to working together, since we're both here."

"Swee- BLAKE DUCK!" Jak screamed.

"Jak, what is it with you and saying duck, I'm- HOLY CRAP, WTF" Blake ducked to avoid a flying Grimmjow, who crashed into Frieza. Blake, Joana, and Jak turned to see who attacked Grimmjow, and it was none other than Jasmine.

"Sorry guys..." Jasmine had a sweat drop. "I kinda got a little excited when Blake said we were going to fight together."

"No problem." Blake said. "Let's do this."

Jak and Blake stepped back a bit, powered up, and started firing energy blasts at both Frieza and Grimmjow. Joana and Jasmine also added a few fireworks by adding their own beams to the mix.

"So what's this crazy plan that your dark side is working on?" Jak said. "Surely he won't try and leaves us like last time?"

"No..." Blake said, but Jak raised his eyebrow. "Well, I don't know, but we need to count on him, even if might he leave again..."

"Joana, what happened to that bug-like guy you were fighting?" Jasmine said. "I just realized he isn't around us yet."

"I kinda stepped on him, a few times, and smacked him around and you know...I hate bugs." Joana said.

Meanwhile Ulquiorra was in a crater, with the O_o' expression, shocked by Joana's power. "How is she able to be so strong...this actually hurts. I guess you can never take women lightly anymore. I think I'm going to rest here til Frieza needs me...regain my strength. Not face that giant girl again...." He then peaked up and saw Jasmine as well. "There are two of them? Impossible..."

"Understandable, me neither, but I hate spiders the most. They kinda terrify me a bit..." Jasmine said.

Frieza ultimately rose from assault that the 4 teenagers were dealing him, and he flew high in the air.

"ENOUGH!!! I WILL NOT BE DEFEATED BY MERE BUGS!" Frieza screamed. "YOU ALL ARE NOTHING COMPARED TO ME! I WILL KILL YOU ALL! JUST LIKE I WIPED OUT ALL THOSE MONKEYS ON PLANET VEGETA!"

"Holy crap," Jak said. "We aren't even hurting him that bad, and he's pissed...."

"Temper, temper," Blake said. "But yeah, this isn't good. If anything, we better hope that-"

"YOU! WITH THE WAVY HAIR. I'M GOING TO MAKE YOU SUFFER THE MOST OUT OF ALL YOUR FRIENDS." Frieza was still enraged and annoyed.

"I'm assuming that he's still upset that you bit his tail..." Jak said.

"Hey, if Goku used it in battle, then why not?" Blake said.

Frieza then used his signature Death Ball, which was a huge energy ball capable of destroying planets, on Jak and Blake. Jak and Blake knew they couldn't hold that off, so they started to dash super fast. Jasmine and Joana quickly followed suit and ran along side them. Blake's pets, who had been fighting Pain, also left, running at a similar speed to that of Blake's dash.

"We have to get as far as possible." Blake said. "That thing is too huge for us to try and push back. But as long as we get away from it, we should be good."

"Didn't think he'd resort to that..." Jak said, then he was suddenly grabbed by Jasmine and stuffed in her cleavage.

"Well," Blake was also grabbed by Joana in put inside her cleavage. "It's Frieza, you don't know what to expect...Anyway, I wonder if Grimmjow has any idea that there's a red energy ball of death coming near him?"

"Good for us," Jak said. "He gets killed, that's one less guy to worry about!"

Suddenly, Demon Blake appeared. Blake powered up just in case his dark doppelganger was trying to pull a fast one.

"You better had come up with a good plan..."
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Frieza isn't hurt, but he's getting annoyed...

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
-"Who do you think I am? Of course I came with a perfect plan!!"- Demon Blake replied, and, after clearing his throat, added -"Umm, I need you to come out of her cleavage..."- Both he and Blake actually blushed, and Blake rushed outside, he said, after a brief uncomfortable silence

-"Anyway... what is it?"-

-"This!!"- Demon Blake showed him two potara earrings

-"Where did you get that?"-

*Flashback*

Somewhere, Goku and Vegeta were flying, searching for some villain, as they heard there would be some sort of huge assault.

-"Maybe we should ask someone if there's been something strange, don't you think?"- Goku said, scratching his head

-"Yeah right Kakarot... You just don't ask people about freaks!!"- Vegeta facepalmed himself, but Goku descended to the city. There, he found a guy, with a dark-weird look, but Goku, smiling, said

-"Excuse me, have you seen anything out of the normal today?"-

-"Umm"- The guy said, walking near Goku, then said -"Actually yes, I just saw Majin Buu over there"- Just then, there was an explosion, and Majin Buu (Gohan absorbed) came out, laughing maniacally

-"Thanks... wait... how do you know about Majin Buu...?"- Goku said, but the guy had suddenly disappeared -"Weird."- Goku added, and went to face the evil monster. Vegeta arrived next to him

-"Told you Vegeta, people can be helpful, now all we have to do is to wear the potara earrings and..."-

-"And?"- Vegeta asked, exasperated

-"I can't seem to find them... I swear I got a pair from the supreme kai"-

-"Are you kidding me Kakarot?"-

-"Nope"- Goku desperately fumbled in both of his leg pockets, but there was nothing, and then, Majin Buu stood before them, with an evil look

-"Crap..."- Goku said

*End of flashback*

-"And that's how I got these things... Now, all we have to do is fuse and kick Frieza's butt...err...tail, or whatever..."-

Blake and Jak gave him an 'Are you freaking kidding me?!' look

-"So... you FOUND freaking GOKU and VEGETA..."- Blake said

-"...and INSTEAD OF ASKING FOR HELP, YOU STOLE THE POTARA EARRINGS FROM THEM?!!"- Jak added

-"ARE YOU FREAKING KIDDING US?!!"- They said at once, while Demon Blake stared them with a poker face -"WHAT...THE HELL...WERE YOU THINKING?!!"-

-"Give me a break!! I rushed to save your sorry lives!! Sheesh"- Demon Blake said, and handed the earrings to Blake and Jak. He said

-"Anyway, WE can win with this..."- He returned to Blake, and gave him near full dark power again. Blake, still with the earring in his hand, stared at it

-"If you ask me, I'm not exactly comfortable with having my boyfriend wearing earrings..."- Joana said, Blake gave her a ._.' look -"But if that saves us, I agree"- She gave Blake a thumbs up. Jak nodded, and put the earring on his left ear, and Blake did the same with the right one. They were drawn together and fused.

-"And here comes...Jakle? Man, I need to work on my name... but there's no time for that right now..."- Jakle, the fusion of Blake and Jak, emerged from the light, differently from before, this time, he had Jak's skin tone, Blake's brown jacket over Jak's clothes, and hair that was a mix of Blake's and Demon Blake's. Also, one of his eyes was completely white, with no visible iris nor pupil.

He flew toward where the explosion had taken place. Frieza was there, and stared angrily at the newcomer

-"Who are you and what do you want?!!"-

-"I'm here to play videogames and kick bad guys... and since you destroyed all videogames in miles around..."- Jakle smiled, and disappeared, reappearing in front of Frieza, and kicking him in the face, with great force, sending him crashing into the remains of a building.

-"WHAT?!"-

Jakle walked calmly toward him

-"You've had your fun so far, haven't you?"- He then cracked his knuckles -"Game over"- He punched Frieza in the stomach, and fired a bluish energy beam to his face, the beam was actually wide enough to engulf Frieza before exploding. Frieza had a shocked and angry face, and rushed to punch Jakle, who took the punch in the face, but didn't move a single inch, although the ground around them cracked and sank from the punch's strength.

Frieza dashed backward and, while looking at him, Jakle noticed Blaze, Aizen, Nostory, Seth and Orochimaru were standing on a neraby building, which was damaged but hadn't collapsed. Blaze threw a scouter at Frieza, who caught it, and put it on, but before pushing the button, Jakle fired a thin beam from his finger, destroying it. Frieza had again the shocked and angry expression

-"Nuh-uh. No cheating"- Jakle then fires a beam that destroys the building Blaze and the others are standing on, and they disappear, but reappear to somewhere else nearby. 'I'll take care of these guys later. Big fish first...well, lizard, or whatever...'

Frieza charged at Jakle again, but he countered with a black beam from one of his hands and a white beam from the other. This beam pushed Frieza away some distance before exploding. Jakle then began to fire a barrage of dark energy balls along white non-elemental ones. Frieza, for the first time, took actual damage, and had some burns from the attacks he received.

-"Last time I hadn't gotten to use darkness. Cool"- Jakle said, looking at his hand, and Frieza appeared again, but Jakle, seemingly absent minded, backhanded him away with the other hand.

-"YOU...WILL...SUFFER!! I'LL CRUSH YOU, INSECT!!"- Frieza charged again at Jakle, but he caught his forearm, and aimed his other hand at Frieza's face, very close. Then, with a somewhat psychotic look, said calmly

-"I don't think I'll be the one suffering"- And blasted him away with a large black beam. Then, appeared before Frieza (Note: So far, Jakle has been using only raw physical speed, a.k.a godspeed), and unsheathing Blake's sword, slashed him, although Frieza disappeared, had only gotten cut, not very deep, but the cut was long enough to go across his whole chest. He put a hand on the wound, feeling his own blood, and with even more anger, he shouted

-"THAT'S IT, YOU ARE DEAD!!"- Frieza then

-"You mad?"- Jakle asked, laughing, then Frieza proceeded to transform, assuming his second form -"Oh..."- He said, and Frieza disappeared, reappearing behind him and attempted to punch him, however, Jakle blocked Frieza's fist with Blake's sword, and then, their fists clashed, creating a shockwave that further sank a large portion of the fround around them and damaged the surroundings.

Joana and Jasmine, who had walked toward them, but keeping their distance, watched how their fused boyfriends were beating Frieza.

-"It's amazing that just by fusing they can surpass someone that powerful..."- Joana commented -"Although I can't feel his power... it feels like if it were blurry. So far, I can only feel Blake's presence and power..."-

-"Well, Potara fusion is quite a powerful thing, no wonder it's much better than the fusion dance..."- Jasmine said

-"I thought they were about the same"- Joana said

-"You need to watch dragon ball and pay a bit more attention"- Jasmine said with a n_n face -"Potara is more powerful than the dance, and it's actually flawless... doesn't need to balance the powers, doesn't need to do the dance, and, has no time limit..."-

-"Wait..."- The last part rang an alarm in Joana's mind -"If it has no time limit...how do they defuse?"-

-"That's the point, they don't..."- Jasmine had said with just the same expression, but then, realized what was Joana's point, and said -"...wait...wait a moment......they DON'T defuse..."-

Both girls had poker faces.

Back to Jakle, he was fighting Frieza's second form, and despite Frieza was twice as strong as before, Jakle was still fighting near evenly, and maybe Jakle's only advantage was to keep cool and not blinded by rage, as Frieza, who is angered at the humilliation he's got, and that he can't stand the existence of people stronger than himself. Frieza then used energy blasts against Jakle, but he blocked most of them with Blake's sword, and countered with his own, using dark ones because it was a bit stronger than regular energy.

Frieza was growing angrier, and transformed to his third form, the power making air feel heavy in a large radius.

-"And I hated the Alien movie... this is just as bad..."- Jakle commented, and stood in a fighting stance...
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Jakle vs Frieza: Round 1

choices: Damn you author, couldn't you tell us who those figures were? *Problem?*
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Frieza, in his third (and particularly creepy) form, charged at the fused fighter, who could barely dodge him, and got hit by Frieza's tail, which sent him through debris with tremendous force. He got up, with only the ringing pain from the attack, but no other damage, and thought

-"Maybe I should be called Jablek... I dunno...GAH!! Why am I thinking about trivial stuff during a fight?!!"- Then he cupped his hands to make his voice sound tronger, and shouted -"Hey, I'm here, pirate copy of a Xenomorph!!"-

Frieza instantly rushed toward him, attempting to punch him, but Jablek(?)* smiled, and, after transforming into Blake's light form, used shoshitsu to disappear. and reappear above Frieza, firing an immense golden beam, that blew up all the debris around, and also created a huge fire. Jablek reappeared somewhere near but safe from the fire, and looking at his hands said

-"Wow. The basic light transformation works awesomely. Who needs steroids when there's potara fusion?!!"- He laughed, and saw how the angrier Frieza got out of the fire, with some burns, and began to fire a barrage of finger lasers at him. He began to dodge them using shoshitsu, but realized that the speed and firing rate was increasing, and undoubtedly, his power had to be increasing**

He then was hit in the left cheek by a laser, and it caused a small wound that bled

-"You HAD to hit me in the face..."- He said angrily, then, increasing the golden aura power to 5 times his base power, he flew, and punched Frieza in the stomach, and performed an insane air combo of punches and kicks, and aiming his hands at Frieza, he fired a whitish golden beam

-"Celestial Drill Cannon!!"-

And added to the beam being fired, he flew toward Frieza, drilling him down all the way until he hit the ground. The beam also made a nuclear-like explosion of golden fire. Jablek stared at the column of fire that reuslted from his attacks, and muttered

-"This is even more awesome... Drill cannon + golden aura x5 = epic win"-

A laser beam that slashed his left shoulder was what he got for an answer. -"Huh?"-

Frieza emerged in his final form, and Jablek, having a bad feeling, powered to 7 times, and prepared to counter attack. Frieza disappared, and so did he, they clashed at extreme speeds multiple times, and then, Jablek managed to hit Frieza with a golden beam, which made another large explosion. This time, Jablek didn't leave it just like that, and began to fire multiple beams. In difference of Blake, the sevenfold light form didn't strain Jablek, who was much stronger, resistant and had way more stamina and vast energy reserves. The energy usage wasn't an issue for him, even if he was using enormous amounts of power that would have drained Blake dry.

Jablek then charged up the next beam to make it stronger, but when he fired it, it hit some sort of shield, the beam dispersed upon impact.

-"Shinra...Tensei..."- Pain was the one who blocked the beam, and Jablek, knowing there was a delay between reuse of the shinra tensei technique, charged at him, but was forced to dodge Ulquiorra's and Grimmjow's Ceros (Cero Oscuras and Gran Rey Cero respectively). Frieza came from inside the flames, with only light damage.

-"Ganging up?"- He assumed a fighting stance, similar to Blake's, and said -"Come!!"- He fought Ulquiorra, Grimmjow and Pain at once. Blocking the incoming punch from Grimmjow, and punching him away, breaking a part of his chest bone armor. He also caught a Lanza del Relámpago thrown at him by Ulquiorra, and threw it back, effectively hitting him.

Pain, who had gotten enough time to recover chakra, used the Shinra Tensei to repel Jablek, but by pure strength, he was able to stand in place, and hit him brutally. Pain tried to stab him with one of his black chakra blades, but Jablek caught it, and by squeezing it, broke it to pieces. Pain tried again with two chakra blades, but Jablek shattered them with his bare hands, and took the chance to fire an energy beam right to Pain's chest, pushing him a great distance away and exploding.

Frieza then attacked Jablek, and they exchanged ounches and kicks. This time, as Frieza kept increasing his power, Jablek took more and more damage, although it didn't incapacitate him and kept fighting in the sevenfold state.

Jasmine and Joana watched the fight, but still had their poker faces upon realizing that the fusion was forever...

Jablek began to realize that despite he wasn't getting badly kicked, he was getting worn out from damage and from the energy he had been using up, although his enemies were suffering far worse damage, except Frieza who seemed to be even with Jablek, and his power still rising. He charged a death beam and fired it as a blade, then, he added two death cannons (energy spheres) which made two nuclear-level explosions along an electric aura around the explosion.

Jablek was heavily damaged from this, and was breathing heavily. He used shoshitsu to dodge a finger laser from Frieza, and after getting somewhat away, reverted back to his base form. Then, he was surrounded in a black aura, and assumed Blake's dark form. It also healed all the damage he had taken, and refilled his energy reserves. He said

-"Problem, Frieza?"-

-"YOU WILL DIE ANYWAY!!"-

Frieza charged at him, and Jablek kicked him, but received some punches from Frieza. Then, Jablek hit Frieza with two large golden beams. During the explosion he let the dark power replenish his energy once again. However, Frieza appeared behind him, and hit him with his tail, sending him to near the opposite side of the city.

-"The hell?"-

-"You had been fighting me at 1% of my power..."- Frieza laughed -"I have increased it to 10%"-

-"...the...hell...10 times stronger?!"- Jablek was unable to do anything else as Frieza again disappeared, and reappering above Jablek, added

-"20%"- And fired a barrage of finger beams. Jablek covered with his arms, but they got badly burned. He changed to near full dark mode, to allow the energy replenishing and healing factor to work all the time# and dashed to fight Frieza. Jablek forced as much dark power as he felt he could, and managed to land some hits on Frieza, who answered by powering up further.

-"50%... I can't believe I have to go this far against you tailess monkey..."-

-"Stupid Darwin and his evolution..."- Jablek mumbled 'Hmm... while using dark powers I begin to feel the urge to act pervertedly... stupid dark jerk and his influence...' He shook those thoughts away and focused on Frieza, who even toyed wit him, moving so fast there were 4 afterimages, and the 4 charged at him. Jablek couldn't dodge any of them, and Frieza punched and kicked him like there was no tomorrow. Grimmjow, Pain, and Ulquiorra emerged again, and while Pain threw chakra blades at him, Grimmjow and Ulquiorra charged their ceros (Gran Rey and Oscuras respectively). Jablek was nearly knocked out by this point, and as he fell to his knees, he said

-"Damn it... I thought the Potara fusion would make us invincible..."- He then laughed, saying -"If Frieza was this bad, I don't want to even imagine Cell or Majin Buu..."-

-"TOLD YOU!! YOU DIE!!"- Frieza charged a death ball, as well as yet another Gran Rey Cero and a Cero Oscuras from Grimmjow and Ulquiorra. Pain prepared his Chibaku Tensei... However, 4 mysterious figures appeared, neutralizing the attacks. After the smoke vanished, Jablek saw them, and could only have an amazed face...


*Name still undecided
**Blake and Jak still can't sense others' energies, so, there's no way Jablek can get that ability. The only one with the ability is Demon Blake but it's one of the abilities he has kept from Blake, along flight and rakurai (fast movement). Jablek gets his flying from Jak.
# Interestingly, unlike Blake, Jablek can still access at least shoshitsu while in dark form. Blake has to use godspeed (physical speed) due to him being unable to use either shoshitu or rakurai.
As a secondary note, yes, I know Frieza doesn't have the afterimage ability, however, in other animes it's a technique done by just extreme speed, and well, Frieza's power is abysmally above even Jablek's by this point so...no debates about particular anime physics in a universe where they are guest characters...
Last note... Jablek's phrase is indeed a reference to one of Vegetto's, although I don't know exactly where it's from, I heard it in a Baby Vegeta vs Vegetto fan video
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Jakle...Jablek? Meh... who cares anyway...

choices: Meanwhile... TEH AWESOME ANIME HEROES (and Luigi) VS The summoned villains...
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Jablek, still on his knees, was offered a hand to stand up, and he accepted it, but couldn't hide the surprise in his face.

-"Goku...AWESOME!!"- He then looked -"Ichigo... AWESOME!!...Luigi...INCREDIBLE!!"- He then noticed the fourth one -"Uhm...Naruto? Meh..."- (By the way, Ichigo is at Shikai, Goku and Naruto are in normal form)

-"How dare you...?! Why I'm the only one who is not AWESOME!! I'm the next Hokage!!"- Naruto reinforced his phrase by poiting at his coat, which was in fact Minato's

-"Yeah yeah whatever...Anyway YOU stole my idea... one of the guys that fused into me wears his father's jacket for way longer than you..."- Naruto had a -.-" face

Jablek and Naruto began to argue comically, but Goku told them to calm down. He then stared at the villains

-"We meet again Frieza"-

-"YOU AGAIN!!"- Frieza had a face very similar to the raisins meme ( http://k03.kn3.net/B1A0E2F6F.jpg )

Ulquiorra and Ichigo stared at each other, and Grimmjow said

-"DON'T...EVEN...THINK ABOUT IT!! Ichigo is MY rival!!"-

-"Good. We'll capture the Kyuubi as well"- Pain said, and Naruto's answer was to laugh at the damaged Pain. Luigi said nothing, but gave Jablek a thumbs up, and Jablek thought 'I feel the strong urge to have this guy's autograph...why, though?'

-"...Hey..."- Goku said, paying more attention to Jablek, and noticed he was wearing the Potara earrings -"So... that's where the Potara earrings ended up..."- Jablek gulped, having Frieza as an enemy was already bad... angering one of the strongest beings in all the universes has just no comparison, and all he could manage to pull off was to do a poker face, while thinking 'Damnitdamnitdamnitdamnit' followed by 'Stupid dark jerk and his idea of stealing the potara earrings...'

However, there was no anger in Goku, who had a n.n face, and added -"Vegeta achieved super saiyan 3 recently and decided to take vengeance on Buu himself"-

He then looked at the city, and that Jablek had healed all of the damage -"I have to give you merit. A human fighting Frieza to such level. I'd bet Vegeta would be mad"- Goku gave a thumbs up to Jablek, who had an overly amazed face. Ichigo had been mostly silent at first, not really too surprised of someone being able to fight Ulquiorra or Grimmjow, but, when he noticed Frieza's presence, it was overwhelming, somewhat neutralized by Goku's. The he noticed what Frieza would be capable of.

Then they charged at each other, Naruto went for Pain, Ichigo went for Grimmjow, and Goku for Frieza. Jablek stared at Ulquiorra

-"I guess I get to beat you..."- However, Luigi stepped forward, signaling he would fight Ulquiorra.

-"Are you sure? He's somewhat strong..."-

-"Oh yeah"- He replied.

-"Nonsense. What can a italian plumber do to fight? Nevermind, I'll just kill y..."- Ulquiorra was cut off by Luigi's Super Jump Punch, which sent the 4th Espada rocketing in the sky, and seemingly vanishing as a star, even with a slight blink sound. Everyone had O.O faces except for Grimmjow who just tried to attack Ichigo, but had to cover from a Getsuga Tensho.

Luigi waved at the sky, saying -"Bye Bye"-

-"That was a lot easier than I thought..."- Jablek said

However, they heard a low sonic boom, and Ulquiorra was standing before them again

-"That was certainly annoying"-

Jablek was quick to draw Blake's sword, but then heard another voice

-"You should check better who are you fighting with..."- Blaze was standing behind Jablek, who quickly dashed away and turned around.

-"You're pretty stupid to come and fight me..."- He said, and they charged at each other, their fists clashing, cracking the ground below them.

Back to Luigi and Ulquiorra...

Ulquiorra fired a Cero Oscuras but it missed, as Luigi dodged it, shooting his green fireballs. And they engaged into a high speed combat, even more surprisingly, with Luigi being able to keep up with Ulquiorra's speed*.

Meanwhile, Grimmjow, who was in his Resurrección form already, fired a Cero at Ichigo, seemingly hitting him, but after the smoke vanished, he emerged in his bankai state, and charged at him. Goku confronted Frieza in his normal state, seemingly having an even fight**.

Ulquiorra used sonido to get behind Luigi, and was ready to fire a point blank cero oscuras from behind, but Luigi's eyes glowed in white, he put his hands together, and chanted something while doing a strange dance, and suddenly they were surrounded by a green force field, and Ulquiorra felt a crushing weight that prevented him from moving... similar to Aizen's reiatsu when he punished the Espada...

Luigi then started a fast combo of punches, kicks and fireballs, while Ulquiorra was unable to move. His wounds also couldn't regenerate while inside the field. When the force field began to vanish, Luigi used another super jump punch, sending Ulquiorra high in the sky.

-"Phew!"- Luigi wiped off a bit of sweat from his forehead, and waved 'bye bye' again to Ulquiorra.

Meanwhile... Blaze's plan wasn't going too well... In fact, he was being badly kicked and punched by Jablek, who did so almost effortlessly

-"Ha!! I knew you weren't anywhere near Frieza's level... You suck Blaze!!"-

Blaze's usually covered eyes glowed in bright red, and he shouted -"I...SUCK?!!"-

-"Yes. A lot..."- Jablek replied

-"..."- Blaze growled in anger -"Screw releasing Omega!! YOU...ARE...DEAD!!"- Blaze charged at him, with two dark purple energy balls in his hands, and surrounded by a dark purple as well aura. It seemed that Blaze was putting all his power in this attack, and ground the two energy balls into Jablek's chest, causing a large explosion, and a tower of purple fire-like darkness rose afterward. Blaze disappeared and reappeared some distance away from the explosion's remains.

-"Who sucks now?!!"-

-"You..."- Jablek replied, laughing. He was only slightly burned, and even his clothes were barely damaged.

-"W-What?!!"-

-"HEH!! I knew grinding an energy ball into someone is plain stupid..."- Jablek said

-"You SHUT UP!!"- Naruto shouted from the distance

Blaze was more damaged by his own technique than Jablek. And he was breathing heavily

-"What kind of sorcery is this?!!"-

-"Potara earrings. Pretty awesome, aren't they?"-

-"I hate you..."-

Both Jablek and Blaze felt the ground shake, as Joana and Jasmine rushed toward them after the explosion

-"Bla...Jak...Blejak...Ah!! Whatever your name is... are you ok?"- Joana said

-"Jablek please... and yeah... this guy did nothing more than lift up some dust..."- Jablek replied (he flew up to her face level)

-"Wow..."- Jasmine added -"By the way...Jablek... How are you supposed to get defused?"-

-"Defused?"- Jablek scratched his chin thoughtfully, not understanding the question... a minute later, he had a poker face, and the girls realized about this as well

-"Um... If you don't defuse... how are you...we...supposed...?"- Joana mumbled

One of Jablek's eyes turned completely blank, and he laughed

-"Don't worry ladies... There's enough Jablek for both of you...Not at your current size, but still..."- Jablek punched himself to interrupt the perverted lapsus -"Sorry... jerkish influence kicked in for a moment, but I'm alright... Anyway, I have no idea... I guess we can ask Goku after the fight's over..."-

Then, Aizen, Nostory, and Seth appeared in front of them

-"I guess you can't take this guy down by yourself. I shall join the fight to ensure success"- Aizen said, unsheathing his zanpakuto

-"Yeah. I want to kick this guy's ass anyway"- Seth added

Joana and Jasmine stood in their fighting stances, with Jasmine saying

-"It'll be 3 you'll have to take down..."-

-"It's not like I'm going to let any of you hurt my half-boyfriend"- Joana said, and mentally laughed at her own phrase.

-"Fine"- Blaze said

And so... yet another battle started...

Jablek charged at Blaze, and Nostory, kicked the white haired villain, while firing off a large wave of energy at the Deamon. Blaze would be knocked back a bit, and Nostory would weave under the energy wave.

"You fool," Nostory said, as his sliver mask shined. "You know good and well, that me and Blaze aren't to be toyed with. Just because you two are fused doesn't make you un-"

"Whoa whoa whoa..." Jablek said. "Listen, Toy Story, did you see what I did a few minutes ago? GIRLY BOY here struggled!" Jablek then laughed for a brief moment. "Like you're going to do any better!"

Blaze's response was a demonic roar, flashing red eyes, and he would deliver a punch to Jablek's face. The impact of the hit was so strong, that a shockwave was felt. A huge crater was made in the middle of the spot where Blaze and Jablek stood. Everyone's eyes turned to see what had occurred. Jasmine and Joana instantly got worried about their now-fused boyfriend.

"Yeah, how's that for a punch." Blaze said. "Now do you regret saying that-"

"Nah not really," Jablek said, Blaze's fist still in his face, "But isn't it funny?"

Blaze's face: O_O
Nostory's face: O_o
"H-how-" Blaze got kicked in the face in response, and went flying though the air. Jablek then pursed after Blaze to lay a beating. Nostory would fly after Jablek and fire a energy ball at him, but it was deflected. Blaze stopped flying though the air and would charge right at the fused fighter.

Meanwhile, Joana and Jasmine were fighting against the team of Aizen and Seth. Joana was handling Aizen, merely standing and using her fists to attack and elbows to defend. Jasmine was of course handing Seth, and she was under heavy fire from a storm of dark purple energy balls shot by the deamon.

"Hah." Seth said. "Come on Jasmine...You finally ran out of batteries haven't you? I really don't blame you. Fighting us for many years make take a toll."

"Hey Seth!" Jasmine said, smiling. "Here's your gift back...there were too many pieces of it."

Jasmine had broken though the raining energy balls, and her fist was glowing with light inside of it. "So here's a full package!" Seth took a heavy blow. Seth stood there, in shock, but continued to fight on, with Jasmine and him continuing to exchange kicks and punches.


Joana was also handling Aizen with ease, punching him in the air, and knocking him around, literally like a pinball. Aizen pondered. 'I see why Nostory and Blaze place the highest priority on these girls. They are very powerful...I guess we should take them a bit more seriously...'

Aizen then seemly stopped Joana's barrage of punches with just using both his hands to hold her right first. Joana immediately fired a blast at Aizen with her left hand. Aizen's eyes widened and he braced himself...

Meanwhile Goku and Frieza were going at it, just like in their classic battle that happened at Namek. Goku used his Kaioken briefly to punch Frieza with more power and speed. Frieza stepped back and started to fire his Death Beams, and in a rapid fire like fashion, but Goku dodged all of them, teleported in front of Frieza and fired a Kamehameha wave at point blank range, and the former galactic emperor widened his eyes as the blue beam hit him...

Luigi and Ulquiorra were going back and forth, trying to stay even and not giving an inch, with Luigi firing a barrage of his green fireballs at Ulquiorra.

"Not bad for an a plumber..." Ulquiorra said, kinda of shocked. "But enough of this nonsense. Lanza del Relámpago..."

Ulquiorra then held a Javelin like blade made of energy, and promptly threw it at Luigi, and sensing the danger of the attack, Luigi dodged the blade, and it flew near Ichigo and Grimmjow, who both were fighting very intently, both of their Zanpakutōs clashing, suddenly there was an huge explosion in that spot where the two were fighting.

Naruto and Pain were dueling, with Naruto just using the Big Ball Rasengan on Pain. The Akatsuki Leader dodged one, and the other one hit him, sending him in the air flying.

There was beams flying everywhere, it was pure chaos, and everyone was fighting hard...

[NOTE: Sorry about the short chapter... since it was interrupted by things out of my control and left half written for several weeks... I wasn't able to do a full chapter as I usually intend (on writing.com's character limit or very near). I came up with something to complete it and leave it finally to Friendly Thinker. Well... have fun... or not?]


Jablek charged as a response to Blaze's incoming attack, and their fists clashed, and both hurled an energy ball from their other hands, creating a large explosion.Blaze wasn't able to do anything as he was beaten at lightning speed while remaining unseen because of the smoke, by Jablek, who also grabbed Blaze by his left foot, and performed a spin throw, finishing with another Celestial Drill Cannon. The explosion was enormous, and left golden flames lingering aftewards- Nostory charged at Jablek from above, but his kick had no effect on the fused hero, and was elbowed in the stomach by him.

Meanwhile, Naruto, who had been fighting evenly against Pain, entered Sage Mode, formed 2 big ball rasengans with the help of 2 clones and attacked Pain with them. Goku used a Kaiokenx20 Kamehameha on Frieza, and Ichigo used his hollow mask and unleashed a massive Getsuga Tensho on Grimmjow. Luigi used the Negative Zone (his final smash in Brawl) to paralyze Ulquiorra and sending him high i the sky with a perfectly done Super Jump Punch.

Aizen managed to stop an incoming punch from Joana and used shunpo to come near Orochimaru, on top of a building. Orochimaru said

-"These idiots have forgotten about one thing... The ones revived through my jutsu are immortal!!"-

-"Blaze, Seth and Nostory aren't under that effect..."- Aizen remarked

-"Who cares?"- Orochimaru replied

As Orochimaru spoke, Grimmjow, Ulquiorra, Frieza, and not only Pain but also the other 5 paths appeared, completely uninjured.

-"YOU'VE GOT TO BE KIDDING ME"- Jablek exclaimed

-"And here you are surprised by such a trivial thing like regenerating... didn't you have Blake's memories?"- Blaze said in his sarcastic-arrogant tone, appearing as well. However Blaze had his clothes damaged and only himself was healed.

-"It's not the same thing your freaky self-healing than this absurdly overpowered regeneration"- Jablek said

-"FREAKY?!! HOW DARE YOU CALL ME, THE ULTIMATE CREATION, FREAKY!!?"-

-"Freaky freaky freaky...Aaaand GIRLY... SO GIRLY..."-

-"You are dead..."-

Blaze charged at Jablek, and the villains did so against their rivaling heroes, who were somewhat worn down from battling.

Aizen resumed his fighting with Joana after drinking a cup of tea, which he got out of nowhere...

Jasmine kept fighting Nostory and Seth, and had managed to stomp Seth flat under her foot. Nostory on the other side was moving very fast and was harrassing her with barrage after barrage of energy balls. Until Jablek appeared in front of him and punched him in the stomach

-"Oh... thanks... I guess...Jebl...Jabl..."-

-"Jablek..."- And he flew to her hand, kissing it kinda gentleman-style

-"HEY!!"- Joana shouted from some distance away

-"Relax... technically she's my half girlfriend..."- Jablek said to her

-"That sounded so disturbing and weird..."- Jasmine commented

-"Maybe, but it makes sense in this context..."- Jablek then seemed to be lost in thoughts briefly, he suddenly said -"Whoah... to be a fused guy is kinda complicated... at certain times one of the halves kinda kicks in, you know?"- He waved goodbye and flew to where Joana was, and also helped her to fight Aizen.

However fighting Aizen was much more difficult. Aizen was armed, so Jablek had to call Blake's sword. Also, he kept his guard on because of the potentially fatal danger of falling into Aizen's hypnosis. AND also Aizen was an extremely skilled fighter, with knowledge of many kido spells and impressive strength and speed. Still, Jablek managed to punch Aizen away through a building, and Jablek himself flew to Joana's shoulder

-"Seriously to be fused is messing me up a bit... You're also a nice girl. Your boyfriend is very lucky. Heh, I am half as lucky"- He joked. After that he also gave her a kiss on a cheek, and went to continue fighting, while also telling her to rest a little.

-"Hey, Aizen-nerd, Girly Blaze, and you two stupid morons whose names I don't care about enough to even remember... COME!!"- Jablek was indeed cocky, but on purpose. He really didn't want neither girl, Joana nor Jasmine, to be harmed by these bad guys...

-"How unoriginal... I don't even wear glasses anymore..."-

-"Hey Nostory, remember the fist-sandwich we owed that kid? This one wants today's special. Supreme fist burger with triple fist shoved down a throat, accompanied by kicks..."-

-"I have the feeling you are just hungry..."- Jablek said to Seth

-"Let's just split this guy in half so we are over with this..."- Nostory said

-"I swear that if you call me girly ONE...MORE...TIME...I WILL KILL YOU!!"-

-"Uhhh......................................GIRLY!!"-

As powerman appeared, zenn was with the other ryans, their friends, and family.

-“Those four should know better than to jump to conclusions.”- ryan k. said as his friend nodded

-"Zenn, we too are also ryan so not to confuse you; the ryan you just met is powerman, I’m ryan k., and the other ryan is animan.”- ryan k. explained to him and zenn nodded

-"Zenn, you came in on our domain and we have some rules for you to follow.”- ryan k. said

-“You can go anywhere of the ship, but you have to use your manners and don’t judge our friends.”- ryan s. said as zenn nodded

-“That is fair.”- he said

Animan felt some feelings from zenn and he knew the feelings all too well. Animan took zenn to the training field and he has an angered look on his face.

-“You need to drop those feelings and change your way of thinking about friendship and do things on your own.”- animan said

-"You won’t change my mind.”- zenn said

Animan smiled as zenn took his defensive stance and his fists are in their position.

-“Let’s see if you can beat me.”- animan said still smiling

In that minute, animan vanished and punched zenn in the chest resulting in zenn sliding back some feet.

-“You must be strong.”- animan said

Animan charged at him at full speed and he threw a punch, which would have landed in zenn’s stomach; but zenn caught it and started to do a big combo with massive damage. Zenn launched his opponent into the air before sending him into the ground. Zenn is back into his defensive stance while animan was getting up and healing his wounds, but the smile never left his face.

-“Well, you know when to strike big and your defensive is good for a normal fight; but we both know that we have powers and it’s time to use them.”- animan said as he started to raise his power level

Zenn followed suit and summoned his fire swords quickly, which are 2’1/2” feet long and one is slanted where the blade is tip is next to his head while the other one is nearly touching the ground.

-"So this is going to be a fire fight, then I better take it up a level.”- animan said as the swirled around him fiercely and the howling wind can be heard

Karina looked at her scanner and she was surprised to see animan’s power level raising where zenn power level is at 18,000. Animan’s power went from 0 to 20,000 in seconds flat and it is still raising; but who knows when it will stop.

-“He must be trying something.”- powerman said watching the fight, but he is concentrating on his brother

-“Our creator ran away from everything when his mother passed away and I was trying to bring him out of his depression. I used almost everything to get him out, but it only worked to a certain extent.”- he said

-“What haven’t you tried?”- Claire asked him

-“The one thing that worked; I used force and rage to take over and I had to be Ryan Hostetter till we had gotten to this point.”- powerman said with a frown

-“He had given up on everything and just worked on getting out of high school before taking a year off before starting college. During that year, he was depressed and that was when ryan and I tried breaking the grief and guilt that he was feeling; but he was able to finally push those thoughts away.”- he added with a sad smile

-“He truly cares for his mother and her death did so much damage to him, but no one can stop death only delay it.” He said as he walked toward animan’s family

He used a hand to caress animan’s mother and his sister’s face before he caught a fireball from animan who was still gathering power.

-“He still feels that pain and he hasn’t learned to let go even though I have learned to let go, but he has a problem of letting go of the past.”- he said as he absorbed the fireball

He turned to their ashley and the other girls from animan’s homeworld.

-“He had a feeling of protection towards all of you and he wants to protect you, but he never said a word about caring for you.”- he said to them

Karina looked back at her scanner and noticed that animan’s power level stopped at 100,000.

-“He is showing no strain or tiredness.”- she said as she was looking at animan

-“That’s nothing.”- powerman said looking at the scanner

-“Ryan and I must have stopped at 500,000 or higher; but that was only when we were dealing with some strong monsters and they were after aizen. Naraku on the other hand kept using his demon puppets to escape death while that snake orochimaru used other people so he could live forever, but we won’t have to worry about him anymore.”- he said

Everyone turned back to the fight and animan was cracking his joints before making his body relax. He revealed his zanpakuto and he charged at his opponent even faster than before.

-“Zenn, you can make friends and then have true friends who will never stab you in the back.”- he said before he clashed swords with him

Zenn pushed him back before throwing fireballs at him and he merely absorbed them easily, but zenn started another combo attack on animan. He broke the attack before zenn could do more damage to him and started to do some real damage by using his speed and zenn finally got some cuts on his face and on his chest before he could get away.

"People are corrupt and twisted. You don't know the real face of the world." Zenn ran alongside two fireballs, quickly reaching Animan. He dodged the fireballs, but received a hard kick that sent him into the air. Zenn jumped after him, only to be smashed down by Animan.

"You've met bad people. We can show-" A beam from Zenn interrupted him. He slid a bit, and Zenn took a few swings at him. Animan dodged them, kicking Zenn onto the ground. Animan moved to step on his chest and restrain him, but instead met a solid wall of fire. Zenn threw it up, throwing off Animan's balance. He kicked into his chest with both feet, forcing Animan back a few yards.

"It seems like there aren't good people. We're all corrupted. You think you aren't? Or anyone with powers isn't? Give someone power and they use it for their own gain." Zenn spoke only what he had found to be true.

"You haven't had time to get to know any of us." Animan attempted to hold his ground, but Zenn's problem ran deeper than he had thought.

"I won't even get a chance! I could be in another world tomorrow! I don't have any control of it! Jaxx. Stole. My. Life." with each of these four words, his power flared up. He hovered around 75,000. He fired a beam that Animan barely sidestepped. He clashed with Animan again, his blades getting much hotter, with flares of blue flame. Animan was burned around his wrists and arms, while Zenn was barely holding his ground with Animan in a contest of brute force. He finally broke away, unable to hold ground any longer.

Zenn began showing strain from extended time above normal state. Animan however, looked fine. His burns began to fade. Zenn made another charge, clashing with Animan in a true duel. Animan fired a beam from point blank, which exploded on Zenn's chest, sending him rolling away. Zenn looked at Animan, breathing heavily. He threw his swords into the air and watched them disappear. He fell back to normal state and started walking away.

"You win." Zenn walked away and left Animan in the training ring.

Blaze used a spell to create energy chains, and used them to restrain both of Jablek's arms with Nostory's and Seth's help, then Aizen unsheathed his zanpakuto and charged at Jablek, intending to impale him in the chest. However, it didn't... as Aizen's zanpakuto met a white-transparent energy shield, protecting Jablek, who laughed and said

-"Sorry to disappoint you... but I have a guardian angel, you see..."-

Joana was standing behind (and towering over) Aizen, who had no time to react as she stomped him. Surprisingly, Aizen was strong enough to hold up Joana's foot although with difficulty. Blaze, Nostory and Seth were surprised, and didn't notice Jasmine crouching, and taking Nostory and Seth in each hand, and squeezing them, Blaze stepped back, and said

-"Uh... guys... we can talk about this... maybe if y..."-

Jablek punched Blaze in the stomach, and said

-"DENIED"-

However, he began to suspect... Blaze wouldn't just back out, and then heard Blaze's typical maniacal laugh, while he was chanting

-"Eternal flames that rise from hell... Darken everything, burn their souls down to ashes... The name of the Devil... The mark of the ancient beasts... Ten thousand dead claiming for blood, ignite the light and extinguish it forever... Obliterate, Flames of Tartarus!!"-

Aizen, Nostory and Seth quickly disappeared from where they had been, letting Jablek, Joana, and Jasmine get caught by Blaze's spell, which shot dark purplr flames that extended all over the place. The flames rose tens of meters high into the sky, and din't seem to be exintuishing anytime soon

-"HEH!! So you still wanted to act like the big hero and take all the damage yourself? You suck!! And now you're in no condition to protect those overgrown girls anyway..."- Blaze said. Jablek only gave him a very angry glare, and disappeared.

Still, Jablek got up, willing to fight, and Blaze answered by creating hundreds of clones of himself to attack, while Naruto angrily shouted from afar

-"HEY!! THAT'S MY JUTSU!!"-

Jablek defeated the clones effortlessly, but they seemed to be infinte, Aizen asked Blaze how many clones could he make, and Blaze answered

-"As many as I want. It'll be near impossible for him to get me tired from just making clones..."-
