1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
'This is bad...' Jablek was trying to think of a plan, but was still being pressured by the Blaze clones. "FREAKING CLONES! DIE!" Jablek would fire a piercing beam that would take out most of the clones. But Jablek knew that he, even with this incredible power, couldn't keep this pace up... especially with four bad guys all targeting him. He then turned and looked toward Joana and Jasmine.

"I don't know what to-" Jablek was interrupted by a punch from Blaze, sending him flying upward.

"There is nothing you can do, loser." Blaze said, laughing. "It's all over..."

"Shut up, Girly-" Nostory intercepted the fused warrior in the sky, kicking Jablek in another direction.

"Didn't I tell you not to get too cocky?" Nostory said, then went ahead to cross his arms. "You can't handle of the weight."

"I..SHUT-" Seth then drop kicked Jablek, and this caused the warrior to fly toward the ground.

"Silence..." Seth said. "It'll be over soon...you are weak and weary. You should have been able to win...but you had to protect those girls..."

Jablek then crashed into the ground, creating a small crater from the impact. He looked up, and wondered...

"I just want to live in peace...is that too much to ask for?" The fused warrior said.

"Let's welcome Chaos..." Aizen said, walking toward the crater. "Gentlemen?"

Nostory, Seth, and Blaze were starting to close on Jablek.

Jablek was struggling to get out of the crater. He knew that he needed to wake up his girlfriends. He also wanted figure out who was behind this whole dream...and why? 'Well, this is a dream....I guess I could end this.' Jablek thought. 'I've had enough of this...but to wake up the giant sleeping beauties...'

"Ok..." Blaze said. "Finally, the moment is at hand! We can finally use him!"

Nostory then posed a question. "Wait, what about Jak? He's fused with Blake."

"Shouldn't matter, either way." Blaze said..."His power will be of great use..."

Blaze, Nostory, Seth, and Aizen started to charge beams in their hands, and were about to blow Jablek sky high....

"GUYS!" Goku said, screaming, "CLOSE YOUR EYES!!!"

With every single good guy realizing, (except Naruto) they did so, without question.

"Why are we-" Naruto said. "GAHHHHHHH"

"SOLAR FLARE!!!!!" Goku said, blinding all of the bad guys, and Naruto, who of course, started to complain.

"HOLY CRAP!" Naruto said. "I CAN'T SEE A THING!"

Goku punched Frieza which sent the tyrant flying, and sent a Kamehameha wave to ensure he could buy some time. The Super Saiyan then flew near Jablek, and started to converse with him.

"Here, take these...." Goku revealed two Senzu Beans, which were inside his Gi. "This will fix you up nicely..."

"Thanks." Jablek said. "But I don't need it..."

"You sure?" Goku said.

"I'll take them," Jablek said, starting to stand up. "I know who I could give them to."

"Alright, well hurry!" Goku said. "They won't stay blinded for long!"

Goku then powered up in his gold/yellow aura, and flew away to combat Frieza once more. 'If this weren't filled with bad guys...this would be the best dream ever...' Jablek thought, 'But never mind that, I have to get these to the girls!" Jablek then flew over to Joana, and she was still knocked out. 'I guess I have to put this in her mouth...this is kinda weird, but yet it's pretty cool at the same time...' Jablek then threw the Senzu Bean into Joana's mouth, and then charged up a beam.

"JOANA!" Jablek said, firing it at her, "Wake up!"

Joana started to show signs up coming back fully, and she started to chew on the bean. "AWESOME!" Jablek then looked up at the four main villains that were targeting him. 'No time, have to get this last one to Jasmine!' and he dashed right over to her. 'I hope she's ok...if all of me was here, she'd be happy. But never mind that!' Jablek used the same method in order to wake Jasmine up.

"JASMINE!" Jablek then fired a beam, "You have to wake up!"

Blaze then appeared in front of Jablek quickly.

"H-Huh?" Jablek said.

"Trying to wake them up, I see?" Blaze said, then he quickly delivered a punch to Jablek's gut. "Hmm. Not so fast..."

Jablek then coughed up blood, and stepped back a bit, then found himself on one knee. Nostory, Seth, and Blaze appeared beside Blaze.

"N-no...." Jablek said. "I'm not going to die. You won't use me Blaze..."

"What can you do?" Blaze said. "You literally have no energy left to spare."

Jablek knew this was a big risk...but he flew up into the air, and started to power up....

"You can't do anything," Jablek was then covered in a orange aura. "I'm doing this for the sake of the world...if it means stopping you, then so be it..."

"You wouldn't..." Blaze said, eyes widening. "You're bluffing..."

"I think you're in over your head..." Nostory said, his mask shining.

Electricity sparked around the fused warrior, and everyone realized that Jablek was making a bomb.

A bomb out of himself.

Jasmine and Joana, were starting to stir a bit...and they were fully healed...

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Back in the real world...

The air around Animan started to become distorted as he started to use his alter power and made the ground around Zenn melt, making him sink a few feet before he
teleported over to him.
"Believe it or not, but we have more business to talk about and you need to trust me." Animan said to Zenn with absolute seriousness.
"You need to learn a lesson from me about the truth of friendship Zenn." He added before pulling him out of the quicksand puddle. Zenn simply began walking again.
"I think I'll take a rain check on the lesson. Maybe we can reschedule." He was stopped by an invisible wall.
"You will be staying here. A random portal won't just appear." he said. Zenn looked over at him.
"You might be right, but most likely I'll be gone before the end of the month. You can excuse me for not getting too close, It makes it easier to move on to the next "lesson". I'm sure the people here are great, but unless Jaxx is taken care of, there's no good reason to throw my trust to anyone who comes my way. Please let me through. I'll be out of your hair soon enough."
The walk began again, both of them getting annoyed.
"Didn't he say that you need to learn a lesson or two from us?"
"He said the last world I went to would be a break. I don't usually consider a war against giant psychopaths a break." Zenn looked to him. "Thank you for letting me stay, I appreciate it, but getting buddy-buddy with me isn't a good idea." One last time, Zenn turned away. Animan let him go this time. He sighed and watched as the boy walked off.

Zenn found himself a quiet spot to relieve some stress. He put barriers around the place he found, ensuring that no fire would spread and started shooting fire. Between streams of flame, he began to think. At first, he reassured himself that this was the best way. He would only make it harder on himself if he let himself care about the people. He'd been stabbed in the back a few times. Worse, the genuine people seemed to drop dead around him. Very few made it to the day he was forced to disappear. Despite it all though, he doubted if he made the right decision. Was shutting everyone out the best thing? It kept them safer, but these people seemed more than competent in a fight, unless they have spontaneous heart attacks. After that thought came one that he realized. He had likely burned bridges already. He had fought one of them, slashed one in the face and he doubted he'd be able to make up for either. An especially large pillar of fire came after that before he fell back, tired and unhappy. He was still torn. His brain fought itself for awhile. He wanted friends, but he wasn't sure he would even be able to make friends. It turns out that burning people's friends and fighting with them isn't actually the best way to start out a friendship. Then again, maybe he could at least make up for what he did.
"Shit. Maybe I could use some help." Zenn laid back against the ground looking to the sky. "Looks like I'm going to take some friendship lessons." He laid there for a bit, resting from his stress relief. He rose to his feet and headed back the way he came. Maybe he'll put on some Dora the Explorer to help teach me how to make friends.

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Ichigo's answer from that combo was a powerful Getsuga Tensho, which Blake dodged although it did some damage to the environment. Ichigo formed another Getsuga and launched it after using shunpo to appear in front of Blake. An explosion of blue flame-like fire was all that was seen, and then, smoke, and no trace of Blake.

-"Did I overdo it?! Man, for someone capable of fighting Aizen this guy was sure a fragile one..."- Ichigo said as he sheathed his zanpakuto with its bandages. Then he felt a sword's sharp edge barely touching his neck from behind

-"Guess who?"- Blake said, although his tone was serious and it wasn't clear if that was a joke or sarcasm.

-"So you have finally decided to use that thing"- Ichigo mocked Blake's actually strange sword. The two stood in guard for a moment before disappearing and al that could be seen was rapidly moving color flashes, as well as the ground cracking in random points as their swords clashed. Goku had no trouble seeing the fight though.

Ichigo was surprised that a seemingly ordinary human could match the shinigamis' power and speed, but was confident on the fact that they appeared to be even, and he had still a card up the sleeve. Ichigo used a Getsuga Tensho while clashing his sword against Blake's intending to have him take the full attack, but instead, the sword took it all and sustained no damage.

-"What the hell is that sword made of?!"-

Blake smiled and he struck Ichigo's blade with such strength that he made it vibrate a lot. Ichigo decided that it was time for no more games and extended his right arm forward while holding Zangetsu, and grabbed his right wrist with his left arm

-"Bankai..."-

The wind changed from calm to very violent around Ichigo, and he was surrounded in black flame-like fire. After the flames extinguished, Ichigo has slightly different clothing and zangetsu was now a seemingly normal black katana instead of an oversized cleaver. Ichigo appeared and disappeared so much that multiple Ichigos could be seen

-"And this guy can do Afterimage technique? I seriously have to talk to Master Roshi about this..."- Goku commented

Blake stood still and smiled, then, Ichigo tried to attack him from behind but Blake blocked it with his sword and quickly transformed into his basic light form (x2). His hair rose and his eyes became golden, he was surrounded by a flame-like golden aura, and was prefectly capable of blocking Ichigo's enhanced attack without moving a single inch. Blake then gathered golden energy in his free hand and said

-"Celestial Light, Crown of stars. Glory of the Heaven, Bind the Darkness Forever, Tie! Halos of Repentance"- He then fired 3 rings made of golden light, which bound Ichigo's shoulders, arms and feet.

-"And here I thought you weren't one to learn annoying spell crap"- Ichigo complained, remembering the very first day he met Rukia and how she bound his arms with a Kido spell.

-"They're fairly useful"- Blake replied and laughed a bit, but got serious again, and started to charge energy in his right hand while grabbing his right wrist with the left hand. He fired it at nearly point blank and there was a large explosion. Once the smoke dissipated, Ichigo could be seen, he had taken considerable damage but had managed to break free and block some damage with tensa zangetsu.

-"That was more bark than bite"- Ichigo remarked and the 2 resumed their high speed combat. Blake noticed that his strength almost matched Ichigo's but his speed had vastly improved. Blake got some light cuts as he could only manage to dodge once the blade touched him, however, Ichigo was already seeing his dodging patterns (Blake almost always tried to counter-attack during the vulnerable moments after swinging the sword) and during one of his attempted counters, Ichigo landed a point-blank Black Getsuga, which Blake blocked with his sword but it still pushed him away and shortly after exploded into black flames.

Blake emerged with just superficial burns, but his aura now flowed faster and was more jagged, as he was now using 5 times his regular power. Blake disappeared and reappeared behind Ichigo, just to disappear again to reappear in front of him and punch him in the face as well as quickly firing a golden beam at point-blank. Ichigo had some visible damage but still charged at Blake and created another black getsuga but didn't launch it and retained it in his zanpakuto while attacking Blake, who kept blocking the hits with his sword. Ichigo realized that every time their swords clashed he felt the damage from the impact, Blake was significantly stronger than him and just as fast if not faster, however, he had an incantation free technique that could be used almost limitlessly, and thus, he concluded he had nothing to fear.

Ichigo added more power to his Getsuga, making it massive and launched it at Blake. He blocked it but was struggling, and Ichigo dashed to hit him while he was busy, however, before he reached Blake he felt a sharp pain in the stomach... Blake had thrown his sword at him, and was holding the black getsuga with just one hand. Then, Blake did some gestures with his free hand as he said

-"Stab his heart, burn him to nothing, explode, mighty blade!! Erase the evil by using my soul!!"-

Jak and Jasmine were impressed. They had already seen Blake use that spell against Blaze, and it had nearly destroyed him. However the 2 of them wondered if Blake wasn't overdoing it.

Blake's sword, firmly stuck to Ichigo's stomach, started to glow and erupted into golden flames. Blake commented

-"I hope not to have overdone it. The time I used this on Blaze i was using my power at seven-fold"-

Ichigo's scream could be heard, but it was less of a scream of pain and one more of anger or madness. His voice had acquired a strange echo to it, and Ichigo emerged from the flames wearing his hollow mask. Blake's aura changed into electrical-looking, flowing very fast and even more jagged. They charged at each other and started to punch and to attack each other with their swords. Again, they seemed to be evenly matched, though Ichigo had a slight advantage in speed while Blake had an advantage in physical strength.

Both fighters got some severe wounds and were breathing heavily

-"Ok guys, that's enough. I can sense that whatever you use to increase your power to that extent also strains your bodies to unhealthy levels"- Goku interrupted the fight while both guys were catching their breath

-"However. If this had gone on, Ichigo would have lost. Blake was preparing to cast spells at full power, and Ichigo's only chance would have been to wear Blake down enough to run out of energy before himself. It was a good fight regardless"-

Goku gave both guys a senzu bean which they immediately ate to heal, and shook hands. Blake thought it was a little awkward as he never fought for sport, only to defend himself, attack those who are a threat and during training. Still, it felt good to have stood on nearly even grounds with a hero. Shortly after that, Blake was again hugged-suffocated by Joana, although she wasn't so worried this time.

Goku told them to rest a bit and catch their breath before they fight him. He also told the girls that they could join the fight, as he could tell both girls were hiding great powers. Meanwhile Naruto was like o_____o" as his chakra sensing ability couldn't tell as much stuff as Goku's, but he concluced that maybe their energy forms could be more similar.

And so, our heroes along the guest ones went to the empty game store for a break, soda, and possibly videogames.
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Substitute Shinigami vs Angel Descendant

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"How many times have we been in this store?" Jak said, slightly laughing. "It's been destroyed on multiple occasions as well."

"Doesn't matter. All the matters is that we get to play PS3." Blake said.

The empty store didn't really have anyone working in it, of course, was outfitted with an HDTV, two gaming chairs, a Xbox 360, PS3, a endless collection of games and was pretty much gaming paradise. Jasmine and Joana rolled their eyes a bit, and didn't understood their boyfriends' obsession with gaming...but figured it comes with dating them.

"What should we play first?" Goku said. "There's a lot of games here-"

Goku stopped and spotted a copy of Raging Blast 2, seeing himself, his son Gohan, and many of the other Z Fighters on the case. Goku was at a loss for words, as he was little shocked.

"I didn't know they had games based on our battles!" Goku said. "Broly, Buu, they even have Frieza!"

Vegeta simply scoffed. "Freaks all of them. If they were around now, I could kill them now. If Frieza was around he would feel the wrath of my SUPER SAIYAN RAGE!"

Naruto ran into a copy of Ultimate Ninja Storm 2. "Heh heh, it seems I'm popular too! This is awesome! We should play my game, my cover looks the coolest anyway!"

No one was paying attention to Naruto, as the Heroes were watching Goku and Vegeta fight as themselves on Raging Blast. Jak and Blake were simply amazed. Their anime idols were dueling each other, and they were competitive as usual, screaming at each other, but it was clear that Vegeta was a natural at playing the game. He was beating his follow Saiyan in the game, and for Vegeta, this would be a huge win, even though it was just in a video game.

"I got you Kakarot! No escape! I'm going beat you here!" Vegeta shouted with excitement, He was in his Super Saiyan 2 transformation. Goku was a Super Saiyan 3, and was shocked that Vegeta was going to defeat him.

"No way! Not fair!" Goku said. "There's no way you're going to beat me like this!"

"BIG BANG ATTACK!" Vegeta screamed. The attack would connect with Goku, and in the end Vegeta won. Goku had a "O_o" expression. He was puzzled.

Jak and Blake knew what was coming next. Knowing how Vegeta was, he would start to gloat and become cocky (as if he needed any more reason to be more cocky) but for them this is exactly how they pictured this. It was great and amazing to see two great characters compete against each other in a friendly manner.

"HAH! I WON. I BEAT THE CLOWN. AND HE WAS AT A STRONGER STATE THAN ME!!! I, THE PRINCE OF ALL SAIYANS IS THE KING OF VIDEO GAMES. I CHALLENGE ANY OF YOU WEAKLINGS TO TAKE ME ON!"

Goku didn't expect any less out of his rival, and simply thought that Jak could quickly shut his gloating down. Ichigo and Naruto immediately started to point at Jak. Jak noticed this right away...and quickly realized why he was being chosen by the two heroes.

"Why me?" Jak said, still being hugged onto by Jasmine. "I mean, I could probably beat Veg-"

"WHAT WAS THAT!?" Vegeta said. "YOU REALLY WANT TO GO AGAINST ME?"

"Yeah," Blake said. "You can totally beat him Jak. You own the game anyway, and I'm sure you'll make quick work of Vegeta."

"You can do it Luigi-Boogums..." Jasmine said. "You're too good, and this is a chance to play with one of your favorite idols."

"Well fine..." Jak said. "Yes. I challenge the Prince of all Saiyans to a duel in this game. I'm sure I'll be able to quickly end your streak."

"Really..." Vegeta said. "If you can beat me, I want to test your strength outside of these games. You intrigue me earthling...your willingness to battle me is interesting."

"Awesome!" Jak said. "This'll be fun!"

And so, the Heroes would continue their small break time from training. Blake had ordered 10 pizzas, Naruto also made a quick run to get some ramen. Jasmine placed her head on top of Jak's head, and Jak didn't mind at all. He was already locked into the matter at hand, and that was to defeat Vegeta at least once...
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Video Games with your favorite Idols.

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Vegeta and Jak started up the system and chose their characters. Jak was a veteran in most of the DragonBall Games. He went with his usual go-to, which was Cell. This shocked a few of the heroes, especially Jak’s opponent.

“Why!?” Vegeta said. “Why play as that weakling?”

“He’s my best character.” Jak said. “His moveset is pretty cool, and I love his play style.”

“Fine…” Vegeta said. “Either way, I can avenge my defeat to Cell! He wouldn’t stand a chance against me now.”

“This’ll be interesting…” Goku said. “When Cell regenerated, he seemed to be on the same level as Gohan when he was a Super Saiyan 2.”*

Jak and Vegeta then began to engage into battle with their Characters. Jak started to use a few energy attacks to slow down Vegeta’s pursuit of him. He knew that in order to win, he had to transform into the Super-Perfect form of Cell. He usually did a little hit and run, so that he could fill his gauge.

However, Vegeta had dashed and closed in on Jak. He started to pound on his opponent, knocked him away and then used his signature Galick Gun blast. Jak quickly used the afterimage ability to avoid taking any more damage than he needed to.

“Heh.”Vegeta said, laughing. “Good one earthling, but don’t think you’re out of the clear yet.”

“Here we go…” Blake said, clearly into this battle. “Looks like Jak will be in trouble.”

Blake was right, as Vegeta would transform himself into a Super Saiyan. Jak was waiting for the transformation to be completed. However, once it was completed, it wasn’t what he expected…

“Crap…no good.” Jak said. “I need to transform myself and quick!”

Vegeta bypassed the first transformation of Super Saiyan, and went straight to the next level. Jak knew that Cell’s character wasn’t able to do the same thing, as he would manually have to do it by absorbing each android. Jak had formulated a plan, and he’d have to execute it quickly.

Jak started to fight with Cell, using energy attacks and blasts to keep Vegeta at bay, at least to build his gauge faster.

“Awesome!” Jak said, realizing he had enough to transform into Semi Perfect Cell, and in this situation, he knew that the drain life ablity would be a regular attack too. So he could turn it into a case to where he could get some life back.

“Impressive…” Ichigo was sipping on a soda. “Maybe this’ll be more fun.”

“I DON’T GET ANY OF THIS!” Naruto said. “What’s with the Blonde hair going on and off?”

Once again, no one turned to play attention to the Leaf Village’s prankster ninja.

A little later into the bout, Jak was able to transform into Super Perfect Cell. But had to work for it. He was on his last bar of Health. Vegeta happened to be on his yellow bar, it was halved. Jak knew he had to be nearly perfect (Pun intended) on this run.

Going quick, Jak used Cell’s death beam blast, which wiped out Vegeta’s yellow gauge and sent it to red. They both were on equal ground now. The battle would be decided shortly.

“DAMN IT!” Vegeta said, transforming into a Super Saiyan. “I WONT LOSE, NOT HERE!”

“Here we go…” Goku said, with a sweatdrop.

Jak was a little pumped up too, so he started to stand up. Dashing away, he allowed himself to charge up his Ki gauge to Max Power. Jak decided he was going to end this on a Solar Kamehameha blast.

“BIG BANG ATTACK!” Both of the Vegetas screamed in sync. “EAT THIS!”

“SOLAR KAMEHAMEHA!” Jak said, and he was excited and transformed into his Omega Form.

Jasmine who was near Jak, got blown back instantly. She was taken off guard and was knocked back into a wall. Joana immediately ran over to make sure she was ok. Blake had the “O_o” expression.

Both of the beams collided, and Jak and Vegeta started to spin the Analog Sticks on the PS3 controllers extremely fast. Both the Saiyan and the Omega Powered Teen screamed, their golden and white auras clashing and electricity sparked.

And then, there was a great flash.

When the smoke cleared, Cell was victorious, and Jak had won. Vegeta had thrown down his controller, looked at Jak. Nodded to him in respect. Then simply said, “Let me know when you’re ready to battle earthling. I like your spirit.” The Prince of all Saiyans then flew away.

“Too Cool!” Jak said, still transformed. “I never have had so much playing this-“ He then turned around. “….oops.”

Jasmine said, “I’m fine…Luigi Boogums….”

“Didn’t mean to-“

“It’s ok. You were excited…” Jasmine said. “You’re so cute when you get into a game.”

“Well…” Blake said. “I guess Jak and Vegeta will battle a little later…But I’m sure others want to battle.”

“I want to see what these girls can do!” Goku said.

Jak and Blake gulped. They didn’t want to know what they could do. And hoped that their ladies would be content with just watching….

Jasmine and Joana were slightly more cuirous about their boyfriends’ anime idols, so they wanted to ask questions…..

* Cell is my favorite DBZ Villain, fun fact. I do play with him in almost every DBZ game.
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: SO. MUCH. EXCITEMENT. VIDA. GAMES. A crazy battle.

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Everyone walked outside, and Blake commented

-"You know... We used freaking Potara and we barely held our own against Frieza... IN HIS FIRST FORM..."- Blake commented

-"Yeah I know if Vegeta were to go all serious we and this world would probably go kaboom... but, I don't think he'll use more power than necessary so he might as well do the entire fight in his normal state"- Jak commented, laughing a bit nervously

-"It's not like Luigi-Boogums is going to take on him alone, right?"- Jasmine said, then noticed Blake's look -"RIIGHT?"-

-"I guess"- Blake scratched his head

-"It seems like we could also use the challenge"- Ichigo commented

-"Hell yeah! No way the next Hokage will lose!"-

Everyone stared at Naruto like ._. and in silence

-"Anyone who dares say I'm weak is getting a face full of Rasengan"-

Blake had been thoughtful for the whole time and then he commented

-"Well, if you think of it... We're being a bit unfair with Naruto... It's true he might be..."- He noticed Naruto made a clone and was starting to make his signature technique -"Not as strong as others... But he still kicked ass in his own universe. How he defended his village is something respectable..."-

-"I OBJECT"- Ichigo blurted

-"If I recall correctly you left your city defenseless"-

-"Because I had to rescue Orihime!"-

-"We're getting nowhere..."- Jak pointed

-"Hey, Goku, are there enough senzu beans?"- Blake asked

-"Of course! Never battle a villain without these!"- Goku showed them the bag with said beans and made a thumbs up gesture, which somehow ended up seeming like a tv ad.

-"Only in HIS universe..."- Everyone said with a disappointed tone

-"Well. I think I could give it a shot. Naruto, if you want to save your reputation, fight me with all you've got..."-

-"What..."- Joana was baffled

-"What do you mean with all he got? Didn't he fight properly before?"- Jasmine asked

-"I hadn't stopped to think of this but Naruto didn't use his full strength against Jak. Reason one: He could barely gather any natural chakra so his sage mode wasn't going to last long. Second, Rasen Shuriken expands when arriving at target location to trap the enemy, the one he threw at Jak vanished in a puff of smoke..."-

-"That was just a transformed kunai..."- Naruto said while laughing. Jak had a -_- face -"The real Rasen Shuriken does cellular damage. I would only use that on villains"-

-"I will give you time to gather enough sage chakra and use your real moves. I've already fought Ichigo so I want to see how do I hold up against you..."- Blake said end immediately Joana grabbed his arm and dragged him nearer to her

-"Are you crazy?! Cellular damage!"-

-"It's a dream. And even if I got some damage, I have someone who can fix it up"- Blake casually replied

-"I am NOT your personal nurse!! That's what that woman is for anyway!"- Demon Blake's metallic voice sounded from Blake's head but everyone heard it

-"The hell was that?"- Ichigo asked

-"It's just a dark entity of sorts that lives inside my soul or something. Nevermind, he's just a jerk. But can be useful at times"- Blake replied, and noticed the "I know that feel" look in Ichigo and Naruto himself

-"Just hurry up and charge up your sage chakra"-

After a few minutes while sitting in a meditating pose, Naruto's eyes changed to toad-like, and Blake caught the hint, assuming his fighting stance. Joana, Jak and Jasmine were a surprised that Blake wasn't transforming right away, and they observed Naruto dash at great speed to attack Blake, who could only block the incoming punch. It hit with enough force to sink and crack slightly the ground beneath them. Naruto dashed back and stood still, recharging sage chakra.

-"Well, that hurt"- Blake commented

-"You told me to go all out, why aren't you doing your shiny weird flashy lights?"- Naruto asked somewhat mockingly

-"Unlike you guys I can't sense others' presence or tell how strong they are, the only way for me to learn that is to fight them. But you're right, I underestimated you"- Blake said as he transformed into his light form, getting surrounded by a gently flowing flame-like golden aura, his hair rising and spiking up, his eyes turning to golden. Then, he dashed at Naruto and they started a very fast exchange of punches and kicks. Both managed to land hits on each other but it was a punch from Blake the one which seemingly broke the exchange, as he dodged Naruto's fist but still got punched.

-"Frog Kata... I can't believe still fell for that"-

-"Huh?! How do you know?!"-

-"Long story. To make it short, your story is somewhat popular so I know up until defeating Pain"-

-"Damnit"- Naruto was a bit frustrated that he didn't have the element of surprise

Blake charged at Naruto again, but upon punching him, it vanished, as it was just a shadow clone, and meanwhile, Naruto had readied a rasengan in each hand and hurled them into Blake's back, pushing him away with tremendous force. Naruto noticed that while it destroyed part of Blake's jacket and shirt, his skin was just bruised. Blake turned around and resumed fighting, knowing that close range was still his environment while Naruto probably had an edge on mid-long range. He punched Naruto twice in the face and kicked him in the stomach, but had his leg caught. Another Naruto appeared charging at him with a rasengan, but Blake fired an energy beam at him, piercing his chest, after which it vanished.

-"I don't fall for the same tricks more than once"- Blake then transformed briefly into his light x7 form and swung his leg, sending Naruto crashing into a nearby house. He quickly reverted to the regular form (x2). When Naruto emerged, he had a clone alongside him and they formed a larger Rasengan, to everyone's surprise, Blake gathered golden energy into his left hand and formed a sphere with it, and charged at Naruto with it, both energy spheres clashed and there was a large explosion.

Naruto had slight burns and scratches but was mostly ok, although shocked to having his signature skill countered, that is, until Blake became visible once the smoke dissipated. Blake himself was about as damaged as Naruto, which wasn't very much, but his hand had deeper wounds and was bleeding.

-"To think a simple energy ball can do that much..."- Blake said -"I admit i had wanted to test this since a while ago..."-

-"SIMPLE?! IT WAS FRIGGIN HARD TO LEARN!"- Naruto was a bit angered

Blake formed another energy ball with his damaged hand, and charged at Naruto, who had no time to counter. There was a small explosion, and Naruto had some more burns.

-"What you're doing is not even close to Rasengan. It's ball shaped but it doesn't have the spinning force or the density"- Naruto commented as he managed to see it from up close this time

-"Well, that just means I can't go around hurling energy balls at my enemies. It's not like it was my usual tactic anyway"- Blake dashed at Naruto while firing golden energy balls

-"Me and my big mouth!"- Naruto shouted as he was dodging the energy attacks, until he noticed Blake wasn't in front of him anymore

-"Halo of Repentance!"- Blake suddenly appeared behind Naruto and fired a golden energy ring that bound Naruto's arms. Blake then aimed his hands at Naruto while saying -"Gold as the sunlight, the light that pierces through darkness, burn the enemy down to ashes. Burn to oblivion, Solar Beam!"- Blake fired a powerful golden beam that hit Naruto in the chest and pushed him away until he hit a nearby lamp post, and the beam engulfed him like high pressure water before exploding with both normal and golden flames. When the smoke dissipated, Naruto was still bound by the golden ring and was also burning with golden flames.

-"Anyone smells ramen?"- Naruto mumbled before noticing he was burning, which prompted a comical scream while trying to blow the flames on his shoulders

-"Shouldn't you tell him that those flames aren't fire but light?"- Jak commented

-"Nah"- Was Blake's answer, as he was amused. However, Naruto managed to break the golden light ring and tossed aside his red coat.

-"How come he could break that thing? Didn't the spell summon 3 of those anyway?"- Ichigo said

-"I'm not skilled enough to use that spell without the proper incantation. Skipping it summons a weak, incomplete spell, and I still required the name to cast it..."- Blake replied -"At least it held Naruto long enough for a full Solar Beam"-

-"Speaking of which... He's not there anymore..."- Goku said

-"Huh?"- Blake then heard something like a high pitched razor

-"Wind Release: Rasenshuriken!"- Naruto threw the chakra shuriken at Blake, who stepped aside to dodge it, and then, the Rasenshuriken expanded

-"Crap..."- Blake muttered as he was caught

-"Blake!!"- Joana was in hyper panic mode now, Jak and Jasmine were having a hard time trying to restrain her and remind her that it was just a dream. Goku laughed at the resemblance of Joana's behavior to his own wife's. Ichigo frowned at Naruto

-"Think you overdid it?"-

-"Oops?"-

-"Hold your horses. This isn't over yet..."- Blake emerged from the explosion. Everyone was shocked when they saw Blake was missing an arm, the left one

-"I think we can call it quits"- Goku said

-"I'm alright. Round 2 starts now..."- Blake said, apparently calm despite bleeding
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Blake vs Naruto ROUND 1

choices: Now the fight you were actually waiting for... or not...
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Blake charged at Naruto, using shoshitsu to disappear and reappear in different places until he got in front of the Konoha ninja and punched him in the face. They started another high speed close combat, and surprisingly, Blake was keeping up with just one arm, using it mainly to block and attacking with kicks.

-"Now that I think of it, this isn't the first time Blake fights with just one arm..."-

-"HUH?"- Jak and Jasmine were surprised

-"2 years ago, Blake was just a more ordinary human, he always had amazing fighting skill, strength and endurance but on formerly believable levels, on par with martial artists... One day, some gang of bullies caught Ayrton, one oh his best friends, off guard and gave him a horrible beating, leaving him barely conscious. He managed to get near Blake's locker by the time school was over, and Blake took him to infirmary after taking a note that was taped to his back. The bullies told Blake to show up for one final showdown to either end their gang or Blake himself, and if he didn't show up, they threatened to do the same they did to Ayrton to the rest of Blake's friends and me... So he went. When he arrived he found all of the gang members brutally murdered from physical wounds, some had holes in their chests, and one even had his heart ripped out. Others had broken necks or gouged out eyes, and there stood a certain guy with pale skin, long white hair and an evil smile..."-

-"I'm 99.999% percent who it is... so that's how they became enemies..."- Jak commented, he didn't know what had been Blake's first encounter with Blaze

-"Blaze told Blake that he has been watching him and that it's time to test his strength and skills, and challenged him to fight. Blake at first refused because he only fights to protect himself or others, but Blaze threatened to attack his friends and probably me as well, forcing him to fight. They fought and appeared to be somewhat even, except that Blaze wasn't breaking a single sweat drop. After about an hour, Blaze told Blake that he was disappointed, and that he was much stronger than he had been led to believe, and, demonstrating part of his power, disappeared using raw speed, a technique he calls Godspeed, and appeared behind Blake just to scare him.

Blake wasn't scared but was falling into despair as he had never fought something supernatural, and there was no escape. He kept fighting the much stronger Blaze, who single handedly broke one of his arms. Blake kept fighting with all his might despite having just one working arm, but he was growing tired, by this point, Karina arrived after finding Ayrton in the infirmary and learning that Blake probably went alone to face a gang. Blake didn't even know that the gang intended to ambush and kill him, as their leader had gotten a gun."-

Jak and Jasmine had o___O faces

-"Now I see why Blake was such a good fighter even without transforming"- Jak added, feeling like his own school problems weren't anywhere near as scary/creepy/dangerous. Jasmine sort of read his thought just from seeing him and hugged him

-"Blake didn't want Karina to get involved, but also admitted that she was the second best fighter after him, and Blaze was not an ordinary human, so, they took him on together. They fought with everything they got, even Karina was amazed that Blake could still fight with just one arm and broken ribs. However, Blaze laughed at them and overwhelmed them with his superhuman strength and durability. He took several kicks from Karina to the face and wasn't the least bruised, not even from neck breaking kicks, or from Blake's punches... in past fights, Blake was able to even rupture someone's spleen with just one punch, but Blaze took no damage. He thoroughly beat Blake, breaking every single bone in his body after knocking out Karina. Then he shrunk Blake and vanished after telling him to survive in the now tougher world, and if he managed to survive, find him in 7 days to challenge him and regain his size. Apparently, he also knew Karina had received a prototype healing machine to use, because otherwise Blake would've died from those wounds... That's how he got shrunk for the first time"-

-"And I just found myself in a shared dream where I was giant... wow... That Blaze guy is wicked as hell"- Jasmine said

Meanwhile, Blake was holding his own well against Naruto despite his obvious disadvantage, dodging another Rasenshuriken. However, after that attack, Naruto was breathing heavily and lost the sage mode. Blake stood normally and said to Naruto

-"Regain your sage chakra. This hasn't finished yet..."-

-"What about your arm? Can Senzu Beans heal that?"- Naruto wondered

-"Actually yeah. SENZU B...!!"- Goku said and was about to shout 'senzu bean' and throw it at Blake but said no with his remaining arm.

-"That would be cheating. I have a way to get this fixed..."- Blake said before closing his eyes and entering a sort of meditating state...

'Hey, what are you waiting for? Fix this!' Blake said inside his mind

'You have grown quite cocky lately, haven't you?' Demon Blake replied

'We have no time for petty arguments, just regenerate the freaking arm'

'And why should I?'

Blake remained thoughtful for a moment before getting an idea 'So... I am to remain one armed? Fine by me. Don't complain when you ever get some time with Joana...' Blake was no pervert but realized of a good reason to get the dark jerk to do what he's told

'OH DAMNIT I HATE YOU!!'

Blake's arms started to grow back until it fully regenerated. He opened and closed his hand a couple of times to test it.

'Good as new. Was that so difficult?'

'I ONLY regenerated that arm so I can get MY hands on the girl you have neglected so much. Those soft b...'

'Yeah... Not happening lol'

'WHAT?!!'

Blake stood in his fighting stance and ignored his dark side's ranting and yelling until he got tired and just stopped. Naruto regained his sage mode and they resumed their fight. Blake already knew he probably wasn't going to get anywhere with just his regular light power, so, he changed to his light x5 power form and dashed at Naruto, disappearing before Naruto could land either a punch or hit with the frog kata. Blake reappeared behind Naruto, and the blond ninja turned around, noticing Blake smiled, then, all of sudden he felt many of punches in every part of his body at an insanely fast rate.

-"Godspeed barrage... That was the move Blaze finished Blake with 2 years ago... It still amazes me he could copy it..."- Joana commented

Naruto was pretty battered now, but didn't want to give up, creating 2 clones to form another Rasenshuriken and throwing it at Blake. This time, Blake transformed to the light form x7 and fired a beam with both hands, the beam clashed with the Rasenshuriken but their clash didn't result in an explosion, but a struggle. Blake was pushing the Rasenshuriken away. While he was busy, Naruto prepared his second and last Rasenshuriken to hit Blake from behind, however, Blake smiled and laughed slightly, freeing one oh his hands to fire a beam that Naruto could barely dodge, disrupting the creation of the second Rasenshuriken, Blake then stopped pushing the Rasenshuriken away and used shoshitsu to punch Naruto in the stomach plus the hyper speed momentum.

Then Blake smiled and said -"I told you I don't fall for the same tactic more than once..."- He disappeared just right before the first Rasenshuriken struck Naruto himself. All that was seen was the circular explosion of white chakra. Joana hurried to hug Blake before scolding him for being crazy in that fight, but was interrupted when Goku appeared using his instant transmission, with an almost knocked Naruto on one of his arms.

-"That sure was dangerous"- Goku said before placing Naruto on the ground, then he gave a thumbs up to Blake -"Brilliant tactic to have him struck by his own attack."-

-"You did that against Frieza but yeah, thanks for the compliment"- Blake replied, feeling a bit tired as well as feeling Joana's hug increase in tightness

-"Blake, I don't know if to slap you or kiss you..."- Joana said

-"How about neither?"- Blake said doing the how about no gesture

'THE KISS!! PICK THE KISS YOU IDIOT!' Demon Blake shouted inside Blake's mind, again, heard by everyone, which prompted a good laugh. Goku gave senzu beans to Blake and Naruto, and they shook hands.

-"Good fight. I'll have to train more if I ever happen to face more akatsuki guys that are on your level"-

-"You fought well too. I'm not underestimating energy based techniques again"- Blake commented

-"Well, are we all set to go fight Vegeta?"- Jak asked

-"I guess, but it seems Vegeta would have liked to face you one on one at least for a while, so, I leave that up to you, think about it while we're going..."- Blake said as they started to walk
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Blake vs Naruto ROUND 2 + Bonus retelling

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"Did someone call for a natural born badass..." Vegeta said, teleporting in front of Jak.

"Whoa..." Jak said, backing up. "I didn't think you'd be ready." Jak then turned to this girlfriend, as he immediately sense her worry. "I'll be fine, remember it's just a dream."

"I know." Jasmine said, shuffling her feet in the ground. "I...just want you to be careful. You haven't really experienced enough combat yet and I just don't want you to get hurt."

"Come on earthling." The Saiyan Prince said. "Let us battle in the mountains."

Vegeta started to fly off north and Jak followed. The others started to head in that direction. Jak was a little nervous. He didn't know how he'd be able to handle his opponent. However, his use of energy was starting to develop nicely, Jak wondered if he could try to damage Vegeta in an efficient way. Either way, Jak went ahead and shook those thoughts. He figured, just have fun and enjoy the experience.

They soon landed in an area that was very barren and isolated. There were many rock formations, and the sun was beating down on the two...Jak then took a breath, and then he let it all in.

"Alright. I'm ready." Jak said. "Whenever you are."

"Alright then. Let's do it." Vegeta dashed at Jak.

Jak was taken off guard, but quickly got into the swing of things. He chose not to transform, and to go at Vegeta normally. They were exchanging blows, all the while dodging their fair share of them. Jak was surprised, as before he hasn't been able to keep up with anyone at his normal state. Vegeta was very appreciative of Jak's effort, and it showed, as he was hit by a few blows, and it dealt decent damage.

Jak then started to change things up by using his patented combo, by charging at Vegeta, going for a kick, punch, and then energy blast. Vegeta was able to block the kick, the punch was blocked, but grazed the Saiyan's face, and then Jak focused his energy into the blast, which caught Vegeta off guard. The blast sent Vegeta a fair distance, as he crashed to the ground. Jak slightly pumped his fist, but realized he wasn't done and continued to pursue Vegeta.

Vegeta was shaking off the rubble, but before he could fully finish doing that, he had to avoid another punch from Jak. Jak got nothing but the ground, but then focused his energy, landed on the ground, and then immediately flew up to Vegeta again at a very high speed. Vegeta's eyes widened, as Jak was able to get a fairly clean shot of Vegeta's face.

This sent Vegeta crashing into a mountain, the impact taking down the rock formation. Jak was surprised at how well he was performing in this battle so far. He didn't make any assumptions quite yet. If anything, he knew that this was far from over.

There was rumbling...and an golden like aura sprang from the desolated rubble of the mountain. Vegeta returned the favor quickly, as he started to pound on Jak. Jak was of course, taken off guard...and was getting beaten down by Super Saiyan Vegeta. Vegeta ended his beatdown with a elbow to Jak's back, sending him down quickly. Jak immediately hit the ground and before he crashed, he transformed into Omega Form...

"Finally..." Vegeta said. "He powered up."

Jak looked up at Vegeta. The familiar aura from the form engulfed him, and his dark brown eyes changed to the green-blue color he's become used to. Hair didn't change, but Jak blamed that on the nature of his hair. The teen charged, and so did Vegeta. However, Jak would pull a funny on his opponent.

"VEGETA!" Jak said, talking in a gruff, funny, sounding voice.

"What?" Vegeta said, stopping and having the O_o face.

"I can fly..." Jak said, and started to laugh.

"...Um." Vegeta said. "I can see that...earthling."

"Sorry about that." Jak said. "I had to. Let's continue."

Vegeta brushed the strange remark, and the two continued to fight. Jak...however was struggling to keep with with Vegeta, even in his Omega Form. The Saiyan seemed to be a few steps quicker than his opponent. Jak was going to struggle bus if something didn't change.

Blake, Joana, Jasmine, and the anime heroes were coming across the battle. They decided to just walk over and not really get far ahead to watch the fight.

"See?" Joana told her younger friend. "Didn't walking here and talking to me and the others get your mind off Jak?"

"It did..." Jasmine said. "I'm sure he's doing fine."

"Yeah!" Goku said. "Hopefully it isn't to the point where they're both hurt severely."

"Um guys..." Ichago said. "Isn't that-"

Jak crashed in the area where the heroes were arriving...and he just so happened to crush right in front of his girlfriend. Jasmine eye widened and she started to do her usual worrying of her Luigi-Boogums.

"OMG ARE YOU OKAY!?" Jasmine said.

"Come on, I expected more from you out of this form, earthling!" Vegeta said, landing on the ground. "You're really making me doubt you."

"LEAVE HIM!" Jasmine said, covering Jak. "This fight is over!"

Vegeta got a somewhat twisted idea to motivate Jak.

"Yeah..." Vegeta agreed. "I agreed, this fight should be over.."

"....Hm." Blake had some idea of what Vegeta was going to do but didn't stop it. 'I'm sure Jak will instantly get back into this' he thought.

Vegeta then walked over to Jasmine. The teenage goddess got uncomfortable.

"What are you doing." Jasmine said. "I said he's through, dont yo-"

Vegeta backhanded Jasmine to knock her out.

"VEGETA!?" Goku said. "Why would you do that! Boy you're crazy."

Jak's vision was a bit blurry as he opened his eyes, but he saw Vegeta standing over his girlfriend...

"Trust me, it's for the best." Vegeta said. "We'll see something-"

The wind suddenly picked up, and dust started to form. This was occuring around Jak, as he quickly stood up, and something was different...the energy level that Jak was giving was unreal. The aura was accompanied by white lighting bolts, and the power increase was apparent. Jak felt it again...he knew that this was a more enhanced type of his Omega Form. He used it before, to escape from Jasmine in once instance when he and Blake were flying around the Deathray and then outside. But he didn't care. he wanted Vegeta to get away from his girl.

"Hey." Jak said, "Step off. Get away from her. Did you do this."

"I did." Vegeta said. "It was the only way to-"

Jak dashed at Vegeta and as he dashed, Vegeta found himself flying at a extreme speed. Jak didn't even touch him, but he went flying. Jak then teleported and delivered a hard punch to Vegeta's back. This made the Saiyan cough up blood. Jak took the opportunity to kick him into the air. Vegeta would go flying once again, but stopped and charged up his power.

"BIG BANG ATTACK!!!!" Vegeta screamed, and fired his signature blast at Jak. Jak didn't flinch, and just flew towards the blast. The blast seemed to engulf Jak, but after a while, a white blast over powered the orange blast. And Vegeta's eye's widened as the blast covered him.

Jak then suddenly reverted to his normal state, as he wasn't able to quite hold the powered up Omega Form once again. 'MAN! I need to find a way to hold that. Felt almost unstoppable. Seems to be triggered by my emotions...'

Jak tried to aim his landing near his girlfriend, as he slowly fell to the ground.

"Incredible!" Goku said. "His power increased by lot!" He then looked over at Vegeta who teleported next to him.

"Give me a Senzu Bean, Clown." Vegeta said. "He gave me trouble when he powered up again...Reminded me of Gohan when he battled Cell."

"It did...but leave him be for now." Goku said. "Him and his girlfriend are out cold because of you!"

"Natural badass." Vegeta said. "But it's amazing. If he trains more, I'm sure he'll be able to sustain that powered up form he assumed, with training of course."

"So, what next?" Blake said, who was quiet...
1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Jak Powers up Again!

1211111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
-"I believe you are angry yourself over your friends' defeat"- Vegeta said with a laugh

Blake clenched his fist in anger, although he kept a straight face. Goku scratched the back of his head -"I think he's right..."-

-"Attacking Jasmine went over the line, she wasn't even prepared..."- Blake stood in his fighting stance, and Vegeta smiled

-"Let's see what Earthling #2 can do"-

Blake however kept his position, and Vegeta realized he wasn't going to strike first, so he dashed himself instead, he tried to punch Blake, but his arm failed to even reach him as Blake himself counter punched him in the face (roughly 8 inches or more in arm length difference, Blake is 6'3" tall, Vegeta 5'5"). Slightly surprised by this, Vegeta was caught off guard, and Blake punched him in the stomach, and tried to knock him down with a low circular kick, however, Vegeta didn't fall, and merely floated in the air before disappearing and reappearing behind Blake, he punched him in the face this time, sending him crashing into a bunch of rocks.

Blake got out from under the rocks rather quickly, and dusted himself off, while Vegeta frowned -"Why are you not using your full power?"-

-"I had to see how would I do with just my normal strength"- Blake commented, and stood ready to fight again, Vegeta's eye twitched a little 'This Earthling is even holding back during a fight... AGAINST ME!' he thought annoyed. Blake simply disappeared and reappeared in front of Vegeta, he tried to punch him in the stomach but Vegeta caught his fist, but in the meantime, Blake punched him in the face, making him release his hand, and he added 2 spinning kicks to his face and one to the stomach, he sent him a good distance away, and hit his back with a rock, although it didn't break, it cracked noticeably.

Vegeta growled a bit and dashed at Blake, blocking his punches while landing a powerful kick to his stomach, although Blake still punched him in the face, but Vegeta caught his arm and smashed him to the ground and started walking away -"You're not using you full power, this battle is pointless... Maybe I have to hit your girlfriend as well to see if y-"- Vegeta was cut off in the middle of his taunt as a full powered light form x7 Blake punched him in the face with tremendous power, sending him through the rock from before, and further away into a large boulder, which collapsed on him.

Vegeta stood up, and wiped a little bit of blood off the corner of hi slips -"Now that's something, comparable to the other Earthling..."-

-"He's actually a bit stronger, Vegeta"- Goku commented, as he sensed Blake's power 'However, it flows violently, it doesn't look like a stable release of power' he thought while observing the battle.

-"That's just better"- Vegeta then disappeared, but Blake followed suit, and the two started an insane high speed battle, with powerful shockwaves every second at different locations, and the ground shaking and cracking. Blake was actually holding his own very decently against Vegeta, and landed a few good punches, however, Vegeta caught on something Blake seemed to lack. To confirm his suspicion, he fired an energy ball, which Blake countered with one of his own, making a small explosion. Then Vegeta flew up and stayed in mid air, Blake started attacking him with energy balls and beams.

'It appears this guy hasn't gotten the hang of flying...' Vegeta thought, and simply deflected or countered Blake's attacks, but remained flying, and decided to taunt him -"What's wrong? Can't fly?"-

Blake clenched his fist in anger while Vegeta laughed, however even his laugh was cut short when Blake crouched, and did a powerful jump, kicking Vegeta in the face, as well as punching him several times as they fell, Vegeta tried to fly away but Blake grabbed his neck with one hand while punching him with the other one, and Vegeta started kneeing him, but Blake wasn't letting go, and Vegeta's face started becoming blue. Goku had a hearty laugh at his current predicament, and, as angry as he was, he was still forced to land safely on the ground, with Blake, who promptly let go, but only to kick him in the stomach and crash him through a few large boulders.

Vegeta growled angrily and cracked his knuckles, and flew up and then towards him, but he noticed Blake was performing some sorts of hand signs while muttering

-"Sacred Power, Gold as the sunlight, the light that pierces through darkness, burn the enemy down to ashes. Burn their sins, destroy the evil..."- As Vegeta approached, Blake said the rest of the incantation -"Strike three times, holy beams of light!"- Blake fired with both hands 3 powerful golden beams that spiraled around each other, and Vegeta was totally caught off guard with this kind of technique, he used one hand to stop it, but the energy was engulfing it, and he used both to try and stop it, but it was still pushing him away, and he could hear Blake again

-"Shards of sunlight, pieces of heavenly force, made into knives, piercing the enemy, stab to death the wicked and evil, slice the darkness, Light Knives!"- Blake said with his hands clasped together, and a bunch of roughly 50 knives, all made of golden light, appeared above him, and they immediately went after Vegeta, who was still trying to block the triple beam, the knives struck him and at the same time, the beams exploded at him. Naruto, Ichigo and Joana had all completely baffled faces, while Goku had an impressed look.

-"If anything, it seems a bit too long to chant those techniques, but they look worth it!"- He said giving Blake a thumbs up, he just smiled and gave a thumbs up back, however, the smoke dissipated, and a noticeably burned Vegeta floated in the air, he smiled though

-"I hadn't seen this kind of technique in all my years of fighting. You used them wisely"- He floated down until he landed on the ground -"However, you used up quite a bit of your ammo with those shots"- He said, observing that Blake was breathing heavily -"Just like with the other guy, you need endurance, you can't be sure just a few powerful attacks can defeat an enemy, in the worst cases, you'll have to keep firing your best attacks"-

Blake raised an eyebrow at Vegeta giving him actual advice, but then he remembered that it had been a long time since he was evil, and just nodded -"We're fairly early in our training, but yeah, I'll keep those things in mind"- However, by the look in Vegeta's eyes, he knew the fight wasn't over yet, and they charged at each other, exchanging fast punches and kicks, and then they dashed away from each other.

-"Your size does help you a bit, hmph, longer reach of punches and kicks is just as annoying, regardless of the power level..."-

Blake himself laughed at the mention of his own size being even relevant in a fight, considering his girlfriend and Jak's took that to a much greater level. He noticed that Vegeta powered up for the first time in their fight -"I shall honor your power, by using at least the super saiyan form!"- Vegeta said, and Blake had a small sweatdrop in the back of his head, still remembering that he, fused with Jak using the Potara earrings still failed to beat freaking Frieza.

Vegeta turned into a Super Saiyan, and even chuckled at the resemblance of their auras, although Blake's was plain golden, while his varied from yellowish to a more gold like tone. He disappeared, and when he reappeared, Blake fired an energy blast from his hands at point blank at his face, but when he dashed back, Vegeta was already next to him and kicked him into another boulder, and started firing a quick series of small energy blasts (Vegeta's characteristic spam tactic). Blake put his arms in an X shape to protect his face and vital organs and slowly advanced forward, taking many of the shots Vegeta was firing at him. Even the proud saiyan was impressed, and stopped firing, allowing Blake to dash at him and try to attack him, but Vegeta caught and blocked every single punch and kick, until he heard him muttering again...

-"Celestial Light, Crown of stars. Glory of the Heaven, Bind the Darkness Forever, Tie! Halo of Repentance"- Blake fired from his hand 3 powerful rings made of golden light that homed in on Vegeta and bound his legs, arms and mid section. He started struggling to break free and observed Blake putting his hands on the ground

-"Purify, Destroyer of souls, Bring the judgement of light..."- He said, and a golden circle appeared on the ground beneath Vegeta -"...Consume the darkness, sentence to death, Incinerate, heavenly lights!!"- Blake finished the spell, and a golden heptagram formed within the circle, and then, pillars of light started rising from each point, and they converged into a single powerful pillar of golden fire-like energy, which caught Vegeta completely.

-"Whoah..."- Goku said, impressed by the attack

-"I can tell that had to cost a ton of energy"- Ichigo commented, while Naruto nodded

-"That's the kind of heavy artillery one can only use a few times"- The ninja said, although Goku raised an eyebrow, remembering he could do Kamehameha quite a lot of times, but his super saiyan 3 form actually drained energy from him quickly, and the spirit bomb took very long to charge...

The pillar eventually dissipated, and Vegeta was still burning with some golden flames on him, his clothes had somewhat severe damage and he had burns all over his body, but didn't look weakened...

Blake was breathing more heavily, but he still maintained his current power, while Vegeta put out the golden flames with his hands -"I hadn't seen something like this either, it's not fire, but it burns as well"- Then he charged energy in his hand -"Big Bang Attack!"- He shot a powerful blue energy blast at Blake, who summoned his sword and held it sideways (that is, with the edges facing right and left, to be used as shield since the blade is fairly broad) The energy blast clashed against Blake's sword and continued to drag him away, although Blake's feet sank a bit into the ground while leaving an increasingly deeper trail, however, even this was impressive to everyone, a seemingly mundane sword being capable of repelling the powerful energy instead of getting engulfed by it. Blake tried his best to push it away from him but it was too powerful, and it ended up exploding. Joana gasped at the immense explosion, but she sighed in relief when she saw Blake's silhouette standing up.

Vegeta's eyes widened suddenly, and he dodged Blake's sword, which had been thrown at him and sliced easily through the rocks behind, and because he turned to see the sword, he didn't see Blake appearing in front of him, who delivered a few powerful punches to him before Vegeta regained his rhythm and started blocking... Only now he noticed that Blake had been punching him with his right arm, the left one was burned deeply, and he guessed he used that one to block most of the damage. Blake managed to land a punch to Vegeta's jaw, but Vegeta kneed him in the stomach and kicked him against a rock. Blake's hair stopped spiking upwards, and his golden aura vanished.

-"It was a good fight. I want to see how they develop in a few years"- Vegeta said dusting himself off, Goku went and brought the now unconscious Blake in his arms

-"Vegeta is a little crazy and tends to be carried away, but he enjoyed these battles, your, uh... husband... whatever, fought well. When these guys wake up I could give them some classes and maybe a sparring match"- Goku said to Joana, and handed her senzu beans for Blake, Jak and Jasmine.

Meanwhile Naruto and Ichigo were shuddering -"What kind of power WAS THAT?"- Naruto asked angry at nobody in particular

-"That guy makes the Arrancar seem like nothing..."- Ichigo said -"That guy Blake is not to be taken lightly either. I already fought him, and I can tell for sure that he's used to fighting opponents stronger than himself. His abilities all seem focused on overcoming his own limits to equal or surpass the enemy's power. I thought we were on about the same level, but he used that same level and managed to keep up with that other guy, and used powerful attacks that at least did some scratches on him... Maybe he would've put up a fair fight to the Arrancars I've battled if not outright beating them"- Ichigo said, and walked to where Joana was

-"He also has friends to protect, perhaps we're not so different"- He said with a slight laugh

-"Uh... I'm his girlfriend..."- Joana replied

-"HUH?!"- Ichigo was taken by surprise, but then just laughed and scratched his head -"Well, all the more reason to fight, to protect someone so special to him. Congratulations you two"- He said, although he felt a bit awkward, as this slightly reminisced him of Orihime, but he shrugged off the thought.

-"So, not only he has those powers but he also has a girl... I'm starting to believe life isn't very fair..."- Naruto said with a frown

-"Well, he's actually had it really bad since he was a kid, and I can barely help him... For someone who's been through a lot for 18 years, one good thing wouldn't hurt"- Joana said although she blushed a little, and fed Blake the senzu bean while caressing his hair

-"18? I thought he was the same age as me"- Ichigo commented with a ._. face

-"Yeah, people say that a lot. Except for being taller, he hasn't really changed much since I met him, and that was when he was 12"- Joana added, smiling

Joana fed him a senzu bean while resting his head on her lap, and she observed that his injuries all healed quickly, but still, perhaps by reflex, she focused power in her hands, gently infusing her own power into him. Vegeta apparently sended this, and turned around, observing her

-"I wouldn't have thought Earthlings could have a healing power like that of those Nameks..."- He said, and focused a bit into sensing Joana's power -"You're stronger than you let us think before. But I'm guessing that boy wouldn't like it if I were to battle you, at least for now"- He said with a very subtle laugh and turned around once again

-"What are you gonna do Vegeta?"-

-"I thought of going to grab a bite of something, haven't eaten since we arrived to this place"- He said while walking away

-"Huh, food? Hey Vegeta! Wait for me!"- Goku ran after the proud saiyan prince...

-"For some reason, I am not surprised..."- Ichigo said, remembering that quite a lof of shinigami like Yoruichi and even humans like Orihime could eat quite a lot themselves -"How do they even fit all that much food in their stomachs?"-

-"It's pretty easy when food is delicious"- Naruto replied while laughing a bit and scratching the back of his head -"I could empty a good Ramen store before I got full"-

-"Figures..."- Ichigo said, still baffled

-"Hey, you, uh, is there Ramen in your universe?"- Naruto said to Joana, who giggled

-"Actually yes, and it's even one of the stereotypical foods for young adults... We don't eat it often because Blake or me can cook other stuff"-

-"That guy looks like he can beat up people, but I wouldn't have thought he would cook..."- Naruto commented

-"He does, and while he knows less recipes than me, his seasoning is better. And you haven't ever tasted the pizza he makes..."- Joana smiled, imagining it, without realizing she drooled a little, and some of it splashed on lake's face, waking him up.

-"Huh..."- Blake groggily woke up -"It's raining?"- A little bit more of drool hit him in the face, and he felt it was warmer and kinda stickier than water he touched it with his hand, and examined it, intrigued, however, then he looked up and saw Joana looking distracted and that some of her drool was what fell on his face, he immediately sat up with a jump from the shock

-"Holy hell!"-

Joana finally snapped out of it, and got startled by Blake's sudden reaction, while Naruto was laughing, and Ichigo stayed baffled, he mumbled

-"So, healing saliva, again?"- Ichigo scratched his head in confusion

-"Scratch healing, but yes..."- Blake said, and he started to very quickly and thoroughly wipe his face with his jacket -"Seriously, what the hell?!"- Joana wiped her mouth dry

-"You're overreacting"- She said, trying not to laugh but she was having some difficult

-"You weren't the one woken up by freaking drool on your face!"- Blake replied annoyed

-"I agree, it was not nice..."- Ichigo said, looking a bit paler than usual

-"See?"- Blake said

-"These guys..."- Naruto mumbled but he couldn't help and started laughing frantically

-"Blake, we've been boyfriend and girlfriend for 3 years so far, and by this point, that should be the last of your concerns"- Joana said with a flirty look and before he could react she pulled him for a passionate kiss

-"Now that's a counter argument I hadn't seen before..."- Ichigo said, feeling even more baffled, but he noticed Naruto was still laughing -"How come am I the only sane person even with people from other universes?"- He muttered

-"Nah, she's actually kind of right..."- Naruto said after he stopped laughing

-"...what..."- Ichigo said, not even looking at him

-"It's boyfriend and girlfriend things, heh, I should know..."- Naruto said

-"...YOU have a girlfriend?"- Ichigo asked even more baffled

-"Yeah, Hinata. She's a pretty girl, a little shy, but yeah..."- Naruto answered, and observing Ichigo and his baffled 'I don't get this' face, he laughed again -"You're telling me you're still single?!"- He then laughed even more uncontrollably

-"I'M JUST 16 DAMNIT!"-

-"ME TOO!"-

-"I HATE YOU!"- Ichigo crossed his arms, slightly frustrated, meanwhile, Joana let go of the kiss, and smiled at Blake

-"Ok, I did overreact, but still, why the hell...?"- He said

-"I just got distracted when thinking of the pizzas you make"- Joana giggled

-"Next time give me an umbrella"- Blake joked, and Joana playfully frowned, and shrunk him before he could do anything else, the 2 anime heroes had been arguing comically but they noticed what happened and stopped in their tracks. They were baffled beyond anything they had seen before as she dropped the now shrunken Blake into her mouth

-"Holy crap! You ate him?!"- Naruto said in disbelief

-"Hey, Maybe I don't know stuff from other universes, but come on, you don't do that to a good guy"- Ichigo said, subtly griping his sword

Joana merely grabbed Blake's notebook, which she took before shrinking him without anyone seeing and wrote on it 'I did not eat him. Let's just say this is a different variant of kissing. Don't worry, I take care f him with my life, but sometimes I like to mess with him. Also, I was driving my point about his overreaction'

Ichigo and Naruto just had ._. faces and looked at each other -"Uh, alright..."- They said in unison, and decided to follow the saiyans to go get something to eat as well...

Jasmine who was given the Senzu Bean first woke up. She looked around and saw that Goku and Vegeta were gone, but the rest still remained. "Huh? Where's Ja-" She stopped and realized that she was literally on top of him.

"Here, you may want to give him this." Joana smiled, also revealing that Blake was in her mouth. "This'll get Jak healed up. the battle was pretty serious..."

"Why this does this always happen to me..." Blake said, while Joana smiled even more.

Jasmine smiled. "Aww, you two. Always being cute." She then turned to Jak and fed him the Senzu Bean, and he started to come to. Jasmine nudged him a bit. "Jak, you ok?"

Jak was moving around in his sleep. "I don't want to go to class today, there's a test on Algebra and I didn't study." Jasmine giggled a bit at this, then shrinking him to about four inches and putting him inside her cleavage, although his head was still poking out. Jak continued to snuggle and sleep. Jasmine then licked Jak, getting a reaction and waking him up.

"Whoa!" Jak said, finding himself covering in saliva. "Ew...Did you lick me? Oh, sometimes I wonder about you." Jak smiled. "So...yeah. Sorry if I concerned you...thought it'd be a chance to show my strength." Jak was referring to the fight.

"It was fine, up until Vegeta knocked me out." Jasmine said, annoyingly.

"I'm sorry... I didn't expect him to do that." Jak looked down.

Blake noticed Jak's expression and vouched for him. "Jasmine, for what it's worth... Jak did fight for you, he powered up and started to turn the tables on Vegeta. Almost beat him for you..." Blake gave Jak a thumbs up, while still stuck in Joana's mouth. "All these years, and I even still can't figure you out...." Blake commented.

Meanwhile, Ichigo and Naruto looked at the two couples.

"So strange...and here I thought my life was abnormal." Naruto said.

"They're different that's for sure." Ichigo said, smiling. "But they have heart, courage, and strong wills."

Jasmine heard Blake and pulled Jak from out of her cleavage. "I couldn't let him get away with hitting you like that," Jak said. Jasmine looked at him with her gigantic blue eyes, and she then grew him back to his normal height and jumped on to him.

Jak blushed a bit, and was confused, as Jasmine hooked her legs around Jak's torso, while he was holding her. "I just wanted to show anyone what'd happen if they touched my Goddess of Awesomeness, and I just lost it, but I do car-"

Jasmine then leaned in for a long french kiss, causing herself and Jak to fall down, but they proceed to go on with their kissing session.

"GET A ROOM!" Naruto yelled.

Joana looked on and smiled. "Maybe it'd be cute if you called me little names like that." She said to Blake.

"Curse you Jak! How many switches of Joana affection mode are there?" Blake blushed as well, but then smiled himself.

And so...the Goddess and her Dreamer finished their kiss in the rocky terrain they were in, both smiling and blushing a lot. Jak then looked up at Joana and Blake.

"So guys...what's next?"

Powerman walked to the main simulator and stepped into the pod before starting the upload.

Ryan took everyone else that was present over to a multiple set of screens that is hooked into the simulator and turned them on.

151.content:
Some day in March, the time for Entrance Exams.

Blake had been spending time with his girlfriend Joana and when it was about getting a University, he asked his friend Max to do the paperwork for them, as they were busy with many team homeworks. Max accepted, thnking that anything was better than doing homework, and because of that, Blake would put his name in all works as he had worked with them. Blake gave him few instructions about the school, leaving it to Max's judgement.

Days later...

-"Hey dude, I got good news!!"- Max rushed into Blake's department, not knocking the door, Luckily Blake and Joana were just studying for the exam. Blake smiled and asked

-"What is it?"-

-"You won't believe it, we got admitted in AAC!!!"-

-"AAC? What the hell is that?"-

-"The school!!! And we need no exam, what's more, we got in there for free!!"- Joana stopped her typing and turned her chair around, not believing it

-"For...free? No exam?...Max...what did you do this time?!"- She rose an eyebrow and looked at him suspiciously

-"I did nothing this time, believe me!!"- Blake rose an eyebrow and asked

-"What does AAC stand for?"- Max took out a pamphlet and read, mumbling

-"Hmm...then this is it..."-

-"What?!"- Both Blake and Joana exclaimed

-"Anthro Autonomous College...So that's why a cheetah was the secretary then..."-

-"WTF?! You got us in an all anthro school?!!"- Blake exclaimed and added

-"If our school's bullies were already a problem imagine a real bull...or an elephant...a rhino...or a shark anthro!! They are gonna kill us!!"-

-"I thought you could kick bullies' asses like always..."- Max said

-"HUMAN bullies...anthros almost have superstrength and other stuff...they're far stronger than a human!! And we'll be their snack!!"- Blake replied

-"Don't worry, it's an all girls school..."- Both Blake and Joana fell to the ground face first when heard that, then Blake, after getting up, asked

-"Even worse...What THE HELL did you do?!! I'm not gonna wear girl's clothes...and I'm not gonna borrow yours"- He said the latter looking at Joana who was laughing, then she said

-"You lack chest and hips to wear mine"- Blake closed his face with his left hand and Joana kept laughing until Blake said

-"Well...if you go in that school it'll be almost like we went to a male school...anthro girls will have you for lunch"-

-"Aww c'mon, don't be like that, I think there are good anthros, anyway they don't need to eat us..."-

-"Well, whatever, how the hell did you get us into an all girls school?! I can understand Joana got in there, but why did you have to lie, man, there were plenty of open schools!!"-

-"They had a special promotion, it was in a big sign inside the attendance office, it said 'For the first time, we admit humans for free and with no exam' "-

-"But how did you get us among all people?"- Joana asked

-"WE were ALL PEOPLE. Nobody else had come to there...and I asked about it to the secretary, a cheetah, she was very nice to me, and told me that even human males were admitted, but females would have priority"-

-"And you got us in there just like that? I guess I can't complain...there are no currently open schools...that's what I get for leaving something to your judgement..."- Max patted him in the back and said

-"Cheer up man!! There will be plenty of girls!! And I'm sure there will be several niiice ones...rawwrr"- He mimicked a tiger, and Blake knocked him in the back of his head, he asked

-"What was that for?!"- Blake replied with an *Ahem!* and pointing at Joana with his eyes

-"Uh...sorry...No problem, more for me heheheh!!"-
